trans-unit.source: And [also] those who spend of their wealth to be seen by the people and believe not in Allah nor in the Last Day. And he to whom Satan is a companion - then evil is he as a companion.
trans-unit.target: In [tudi] tiste, ki preživijo svoje premoženje obravnavati ljudi ter vernik v Allah ne niti v zadnji dan. In on komu Satan je spremljevalec - torej zlo je bil kot spremljevalec.

trans-unit.source: And what [harm would come] upon them if they believed in Allah and the Last Day and spent out of what Allah provided for them? And Allah is ever, about them, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: In kaj [škode bi prišel] na njih če vernik v Allah in zadnji dan in preživel od Allah priskrbljenega zanje? In Allah je koli, o njih, poznavanje.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not do injustice, [even] as much as an atom's weight; while if there is a good deed, He multiplies it and gives from Himself a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Res, Allah ne krivice, [tudi] je toliko, kot je atom maso; pa če je dobro delo, je vrednost pomnoži in daje od sebe veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: So how [will it be] when We bring from every nation a witness and we bring you, [O Muhammad] against these [people] as a witness?
trans-unit.target: Torej, kako [bo] Ko dosežemo, da iz vsakega naroda priča in mi prinesete, [O Muhammad] proti ti [ljudje] kot priča?

trans-unit.source: That Day, those who disbelieved and disobeyed the Messenger will wish they could be covered by the earth. And they will not conceal from Allah a [single] statement.
trans-unit.target: Ta dan, tiste, ki so verjeli in upošteval navodila sel želijo, so morda prekriti z zemljo. In jih ne bo prikriti od Allah [eno] izjavo.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not approach prayer while you are intoxicated until you know what you are saying or in a state of janabah, except those passing through [a place of prayer], until you have washed [your whole body]. And if you are ill or on a journey or one of you comes from the place of relieving himself or you have contacted women and find no water, then seek clean earth and wipe over your faces and your hands [with it]. Indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, ne pristop molitev prebiti vi ste vinjen, dokler ne veste, kaj govoriš ali v stanju janabah, razen tistih, ki poteka skozi [kraj molitve], dokler imate oprane [vaše celotno telo]. In če ste bolni ali na potovanje ali od vas prihaja iz kraja o lajšanju sam ali stik ženske in našli brez vode, nato poiskati čisto prstjo in obrišite čez svoje obraze in roke [s]. Res, Allah je koli Pardoning in tolerantna.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture, purchasing error [in exchange for it] and wishing you would lose the way?
trans-unit.target: Si videl tiste, ki so imele del Svetega pisma, nakup napake [v zameno za to] in želim ti bi izgubili pot?

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of your enemies; and sufficient is Allah as an ally, and sufficient is Allah as a helper.
trans-unit.target: In Alah je večina vedo svoje sovražnike; dovolj je Allah kot zaveznika in dovolj je Allah kot pomočnik.

trans-unit.source: Among the Jews are those who distort words from their [proper] usages and say, "We hear and disobey" and "Hear but be not heard" and "Ra'ina," twisting their tongues and defaming the religion. And if they had said [instead], "We hear and obey" and "Wait for us [to understand]," it would have been better for them and more suitable. But Allah has cursed them for their disbelief, so they believe not, except for a few.
trans-unit.target: Med Judje so tisti, ki izkrivljajo besede, iz njihovega [pravilno] rabe in reči, "smo slišali in kršijo" in "slišati, vendar ni slišal" in "Ra'ina," sukanje njihovi jeziki in obrekovanja vere. In če so rekli [namesto], "smo slišati in ubogati" in "Čakati pri nas []," bi bilo bolje za njih in primernejše. Toda Allah je preklet jih za svoje nejeverno, tako menijo, da ne, razen nekaj.

trans-unit.source: O you who were given the Scripture, believe in what We have sent down [to Muhammad], confirming that which is with you, before We obliterate faces and turn them toward their backs or curse them as We cursed the sabbath-breakers. And ever is the decree of Allah accomplished.
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki so imele Sveto pismo, verjamejo v tisto, kar smo poslali po [da Muhammad], potrjuje tisto, kar je z vami, preden smo zabrisati obraze in obrniti proti hrbet ali jih prekletstvo, kot smo preklet sabbath lomilci. In kdaj je na odlok od Allah, doseči.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not forgive association with Him, but He forgives what is less than that for whom He wills. And he who associates others with Allah has certainly fabricated a tremendous sin.
trans-unit.target: Res, Allah ne odpusti skupaj z njim, vendar je odpušča, kaj je manjša od tiste, za katere je oporok. In tisti, ki povezuje druge z Alahove je zagotovo izdelani strašen greh.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who claim themselves to be pure? Rather, Allah purifies whom He wills, and injustice is not done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside a date seed].
trans-unit.target: Si videl tisti, ki trdijo, da Pure? Namesto, Allah čisti koga je oporok in krivice ne poteka, [tudi] toliko kot nit [znotraj datum seme].

trans-unit.source: Look how they invent about Allah untruth, and sufficient is that as a manifest sin.
trans-unit.target: Poglej, kako jih izumiti o Allah neresnico, in dovolj je, da je očitno greh.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who were given a portion of the Scripture, who believe in superstition and false objects of worship and say about the disbelievers, "These are better guided than the believers as to the way"?
trans-unit.target: Si videl tiste, ki so imele del Svetega pisma, ki verjamejo v vraževerje in lažno predmetov čaščenja in reči o disbelievers, "To so bolje vodeni kot verniki, da je način"?

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones whom Allah has cursed; and he whom Allah curses - never will you find for him a helper.
trans-unit.target: To so tisti, katerim Allah je preklet; in je, ki kletve Allah - nikoli ne boste našli zanj pomočnika.

trans-unit.source: Or have they a share of dominion? Then [if that were so], they would not give the people [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.
trans-unit.target: Ali imajo delež v gospostvo? Nato [če bi bilo tako], ne bi ljudje [celo kar] drobec na datum seme.

trans-unit.source: Or do they envy people for what Allah has given them of His bounty? But we had already given the family of Abraham the Scripture and wisdom and conferred upon them a great kingdom.
trans-unit.target: Ali so zavist ljudi za kaj Alah jih je dal njegov nagrada? Ampak smo že zaradi družine Abraham, pisma in modrost in jim dodeljene, Velika Britanija.

trans-unit.source: And some among them believed in it, and some among them were averse to it. And sufficient is Hell as a blaze.
trans-unit.target: In nekateri med njimi so verjeli v to, in nekateri med njimi so bili nenaklonjen nanj. In dovolj je pekel kot plamen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve in Our verses - We will drive them into a Fire. Every time their skins are roasted through We will replace them with other skins so they may taste the punishment. Indeed, Allah is ever Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Res, tistim, ki verjamem v naše verzi - mi pripeljemo v ogenj. Vsakič, ko svoje kože so pražena skozi smo bo jih nadomestiti z drugimi kože tako da lahko okus kazen. Res, Allah je kdaj vzvišeno v oblast in pametno.

trans-unit.source: But those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide forever. For them therein are purified spouses, and We will admit them to deepening shade.
trans-unit.target: Ampak tiste, ki verjamejo in ne pravičen dejanja - bomo priznati jim vrtovi pod kateri rek tok, pri katerem se ravnajo večno. Zanje v njej so prečiščeni zakonca, in mi bo priznal za poglabljanje odtenek.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah commands you to render trusts to whom they are due and when you judge between people to judge with justice. Excellent is that which Allah instructs you. Indeed, Allah is ever Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Res, Allah ukazi, nuditi skladov komu zapadejo in kdaj sodite med ljudi, da sodnik z pravosodje. Odlično je to kar Allah daje navodila. Res, Allah je koli obravnave in videli.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, obey Allah and obey the Messenger and those in authority among you. And if you disagree over anything, refer it to Allah and the Messenger, if you should believe in Allah and the Last Day. That is the best [way] and best in result.
trans-unit.target: O ki ste verjeli, Allah ubogati in ubogati sel in tiste v organ med vami. In če se ne strinjate nad nič, zadevo predloži Allah in sel, če bi morali verjeti v Allah in zadnji dan. To je najboljši [pot] in najboljši rezultat.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who claim to have believed in what was revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you? They wish to refer legislation to Taghut, while they were commanded to reject it; and Satan wishes to lead them far astray.
trans-unit.target: Si videl tisti, ki trdijo, da so verjeli v kaj je pokazala, da vam, [O Muhammad], in kaj je pokazala pred vami? Se želita sklicevati zakonodaje za Taghut, medtem ko so bili ukazal, da zavrne; in Satan želi, da jih vodijo zašel daleč.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Come to what Allah has revealed and to the Messenger," you see the hypocrites turning away from you in aversion.
trans-unit.target: In ko je dejal, da njih, "Pridi kaj Allah je pokazala in sel," vidiš, hinavci, ki se obrača stran od vas v odpor.

trans-unit.source: So how [will it be] when disaster strikes them because of what their hands have put forth and then they come to you swearing by Allah, "We intended nothing but good conduct and accommodation."
trans-unit.target: Torej, kako [bo] Ko nesrečah jih zaradi kaj rokami so iztegnil in nato pridejo zaprisege z Allah, "Smo nič namenjeno ampak dobro vedenje in nastanitev."

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones of whom Allah knows what is in their hearts, so turn away from them but admonish them and speak to them a far-reaching word.
trans-unit.target: To so tisti, za katere Allah ve, kaj je v svojih srcih, tako pa od njih ampak opominja jih in besedice nanje daljnosežne.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send any messenger except to be obeyed by permission of Allah. And if, when they wronged themselves, they had come to you, [O Muhammad], and asked forgiveness of Allah and the Messenger had asked forgiveness for them, they would have found Allah Accepting of repentance and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: In mi ni poslal vse sel, razen da bo ubogal z dovoljenjem Allah. In če, ko so sami oškodovani, so prišli k vam, [O Muhammad], in prosil odpuščanja Allah in sel je vprašal odpuščanje za njih, da bi našli Allah sprejme kesanje in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: But no, by your Lord, they will not [truly] believe until they make you, [O Muhammad], judge concerning that over which they dispute among themselves and then find within themselves no discomfort from what you have judged and submit in [full, willing] submission.
trans-unit.target: Ampak ne, jih vaš Bog, da ne bodo [resnično] verjamem, dokler so se boste, [O Muhammad], sodnik, glede na to, ki so spor med seboj in nato najti v sebi nelagodje iz kaj so ocenjena, in predložiti v [popolna pripravljeni] predložitev.

trans-unit.source: And if We had decreed upon them, "Kill yourselves" or "Leave your homes," they would not have done it, except for a few of them. But if they had done what they were instructed, it would have been better for them and a firmer position [for them in faith].
trans-unit.target: In če mi je predpisala na njih, "Ubil sebe" ali "Zapustiti svoje domove," da ne bi storil, razen nekaj od njih. Vendar če so naredili kaj so navodila, da bi bilo bolje za njih in trdnejšo položaj [za njih, v vero].

trans-unit.source: And then We would have given them from Us a great reward.
trans-unit.target: In potem smo bi jih dali pri nas veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: And We would have guided them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: In mi bi jih voditi jih naravnost pot.

trans-unit.source: And whoever obeys Allah and the Messenger - those will be with the ones upon whom Allah has bestowed favor of the prophets, the steadfast affirmers of truth, the martyrs and the righteous. And excellent are those as companions.
trans-unit.target: In kdor uboga Allah in sel - tisti bodo s tistimi, na katere je podaril Allah uslugo preroki, trdno affirmers resnice, mučenci in pravični. In odlično so kot spremljevalci.

trans-unit.source: That is the bounty from Allah, and sufficient is Allah as Knower.
trans-unit.target: Ki je IZDATNOST od Allah, in dovolj je Allah kot poznavalec.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, take your precaution and [either] go forth in companies or go forth all together.
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki ste verjeli, da svoje previdnosti in [niti] šel tja v podjetja ali Pojdi tja vse skupaj.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, there is among you he who lingers behind; and if disaster strikes you, he says, "Allah has favored me in that I was not present with them."
trans-unit.target: In res, je med vami kdo utripa. in če nesrečah, pravi, "Alah je z omejenimi možnostmi, mi v tem ni bila prisotna z njimi."

trans-unit.source: But if bounty comes to you from Allah, he will surely say, as if there had never been between you and him any affection. "Oh, I wish I had been with them so I could have attained a great attainment."
trans-unit.target: Vendar če radodarnosti pride k vam od Allah, on bo zagotovo reči, kot, če tam še nikoli ni bilo med vami in mu vse naklonjenost. "Oh, jaz želeti sem bil z njimi torej lahko še pridobili velik doseganje."

trans-unit.source: So let those fight in the cause of Allah who sell the life of this world for the Hereafter. And he who fights in the cause of Allah and is killed or achieves victory - We will bestow upon him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Zato naj ti boj v vzrok od Allah, ki prodajajo življenje tega sveta za v nadaljevanju. In kdor se bori v vzrok od Allah in ubit ali doseže zmago - mi bo nagni na njem veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: And what is [the matter] with you that you fight not in the cause of Allah and [for] the oppressed among men, women, and children who say, "Our Lord, take us out of this city of oppressive people and appoint for us from Yourself a protector and appoint for us from Yourself a helper?"
trans-unit.target: In kaj je [vprašanje] z vami, da boj ne v vzrok od Allah in [za] zatiranih med moških, žensk in otrok, ki pravijo, "Našega Gospoda, nas bodo iz tega mesta tlači ljudi in imenuje za nas od sebe zaščitnik in za nas od sebe imenuje pomočnika?"

trans-unit.source: Those who believe fight in the cause of Allah, and those who disbelieve fight in the cause of Taghut. So fight against the allies of Satan. Indeed, the plot of Satan has ever been weak.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki verjamejo boj v vzrok od Allah, in tistim, ki verjamem boj v vzrok Taghut. Tako boj proti zaveznice satanov. Res, parcela Satan kdaj je bila šibka.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen those who were told, "Restrain your hands [from fighting] and establish prayer and give zakah"? But then when fighting was ordained for them, at once a party of them feared men as they fear Allah or with [even] greater fear. They said, "Our Lord, why have You decreed upon us fighting? If only You had postponed [it for] us for a short time." Say, The enjoyment of this world is little, and the Hereafter is better for he who fears Allah. And injustice will not be done to you, [even] as much as a thread [inside a date seed]."
trans-unit.target: Si videl tiste, ki so povedali, "Zadrževanje roke [od boja proti] in vzpostaviti molitev in dal zakah"? Ampak potem ko boj je bil posvečen za njih, hkrati stranka od njih Bali moški se bojijo Allah ali z [tudi] večji strah. So rekli, "Naš Gospod, zakaj so razglašena na nas boj? Če bi le imel preložena [da] nam za kratek čas. " Recimo, uživanje tega sveta je malo, in v nadaljevanju je bolje za kdor boji Allah. In krivice ne bo naredil za vas, [tudi] toliko kot nit [znotraj datum seme]."

trans-unit.source: Wherever you may be, death will overtake you, even if you should be within towers of lofty construction. But if good comes to them, they say, "This is from Allah "; and if evil befalls them, they say, "This is from you." Say, "All [things] are from Allah." So what is [the matter] with those people that they can hardly understand any statement?
trans-unit.target: Kje ste morda, smrt bo vas prehiti, tudi če morate biti v stolpi vzvišeni gradnje. Ampak če dobro prihaja do njih, pravijo, "To je od Allah"; in če zlo prizadene njene, pravijo, "to je od tebe." Reči, "vse [stvari] so od Allah." Torej, kaj je [vprašanje] z ljudmi, da lahko komaj razumeli izjave?

trans-unit.source: What comes to you of good is from Allah, but what comes to you of evil, [O man], is from yourself. And We have sent you, [O Muhammad], to the people as a messenger, and sufficient is Allah as Witness.
trans-unit.target: Kar pride k vam dobro je od Allah, ampak kaj pride k vam zla, [O človek], je iz sebe. In mi poslal vam, [O Muhammad], ljudem kot glasnik, in dovolj je Allah kot priča.

trans-unit.source: He who obeys the Messenger has obeyed Allah; but those who turn away - We have not sent you over them as a guardian.
trans-unit.target: Kdor uboga sel je ubogal Allah; ampak tisti, ki pa stran - mi niste poslali vi nad njimi varuha.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "[We pledge] obedience." But when they leave you, a group of them spend the night determining to do other than what you say. But Allah records what they plan by night. So leave them alone and rely upon Allah. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: In so rekli, "[smo obljubo] poslušnosti." Vendar, ko zapustijo vas, skupina njih preživijo noč določanje storiti drug kot kaj ste rekli. Vendar Allah evidence, kaj načrtujejo, ponoči. Tako jih pustiti pri miru in se zanašajo na Alah. In dovolj je Allah kot odstranjevalec zadeve.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an? If it had been from [any] other than Allah, they would have found within it much contradiction.
trans-unit.target: Potem ti ne odražajo na Koranu? Če bi bilo iz [katero koli] razen Allah, bi ugotovila, v njem veliko nasprotje.

trans-unit.source: And when there comes to them information about [public] security or fear, they spread it around. But if they had referred it back to the Messenger or to those of authority among them, then the ones who [can] draw correct conclusions from it would have known about it. And if not for the favor of Allah upon you and His mercy, you would have followed Satan, except for a few.
trans-unit.target: In ko pride do njih informacije o [javne] varnosti ali strah, širijo okoli. Vendar če se je iz to nazaj sel ali tiste organa med njimi, potem tisti, ki [lahko] pravilne sklepe iz nje bi moral vedeti o njej. In če ne za uslugo Allah na vas in njegovi milosti, ste bi sledili Satan, razen nekaj.

trans-unit.source: So fight, [O Muhammad], in the cause of Allah; you are not held responsible except for yourself. And encourage the believers [to join you] that perhaps Allah will restrain the [military] might of those who disbelieve. And Allah is greater in might and stronger in [exemplary] punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tako je boj, pa [O Muhammad], v vzrok od Allah; vam niso odgovorni razen sebe. In spodbudilo vernike [da se vam pridružijo] da bo morda Allah omejili [vojaške] lahko tistim, ki verjamem. In Alah je večji v oblast in močnejši v [zgledno] kazen.

trans-unit.source: Whoever intercedes for a good cause will have a reward therefrom; and whoever intercedes for an evil cause will have a burden therefrom. And ever is Allah, over all things, a Keeper.
trans-unit.target: Kdor intercedes zakaj a dober vzrok bo nagrado in kdor intercedes za zlo vzrok bo breme iz njih. In kdaj je Allah, nad vse stvari, rejec.

trans-unit.source: And when you are greeted with a greeting, greet [in return] with one better than it or [at least] return it [in a like manner]. Indeed, Allah is ever, over all things, an Accountant.
trans-unit.target: In ko so pozdravili z pozdrav, pozdravljam [v zameno] z enim bolje kot to ali [vsaj] vrnitev [v podoben način]. Res, Allah je koli, nad vse stvari, računovodja.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. He will surely assemble you for [account on] the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt. And who is more truthful than Allah in statement.
trans-unit.target: Allah - ni nobene božanstva, razen njega. On bo zagotovo vas zbrati za [račun] dan od vstajenje, o katerih ni nobenega dvoma. In kdo je bolj resnične od Allah v izjavi.

trans-unit.source: What is [the matter] with you [that you are] two groups concerning the hypocrites, while Allah has made them fall back [into error and disbelief] for what they earned. Do you wish to guide those whom Allah has sent astray? And he whom Allah sends astray - never will you find for him a way [of guidance].
trans-unit.target: Kaj je [vprašanje] z vami, [ki jih] dve skupini o hinavci, medtem ko Alah jih pade nazaj [v napake in nejeverno] je predvideti kaj zaslužili. Ali želite vodnik ki Allah je poslal zašel? In on, ki pošlje Allah zašel - nikoli ne boste našli zanj način [smernice].

trans-unit.source: They wish you would disbelieve as they disbelieved so you would be alike. So do not take from among them allies until they emigrate for the cause of Allah. But if they turn away, then seize them and kill them wherever you find them and take not from among them any ally or helper.
trans-unit.target: Želijo, da bi verjamem, saj so verjeli, da bi bili podobni. Tako ne jemljite izmed njih zavezniki dokler se izseliti za vzrok Allah. Če se obrnejo proč, potem pa jih izkoristijo in ubiti, kjerkoli si jih našli in se ne od njih vse zaveznik ali pomočnik.

trans-unit.source: Except for those who take refuge with a people between yourselves and whom is a treaty or those who come to you, their hearts strained at [the prospect of] fighting you or fighting their own people. And if Allah had willed, He could have given them power over you, and they would have fought you. So if they remove themselves from you and do not fight you and offer you peace, then Allah has not made for you a cause [for fighting] against them.
trans-unit.target: Razen tistih, ki se zatekli z ljudmi, ki med sebe in mu je pogodba ali tiste, ki pridejo do vas, svojih srcih napeti v [možnosti] vas boj ali boj svoje ljudi. In če je Allah volje, da bi jih dali moč nad vami, in da bi se borili. Torej če vi sami odstranite in ne boj vi in vam mir, nato Allah ne dala za vas vzrok [za boj] proti njim.

trans-unit.source: You will find others who wish to obtain security from you and [to] obtain security from their people. Every time they are returned to [the influence of] disbelief, they fall back into it. So if they do not withdraw from you or offer you peace or restrain their hands, then seize them and kill them wherever you overtake them. And those - We have made for you against them a clear authorization.
trans-unit.target: Boste našli drugi, ki želijo pridobiti varnost od vas in [da] varnost pri svojih ljudi. Vsakič, ko se vrnejo [vpliv] nejeverno, padejo nazaj vanjo. Torej če ne odstopi od vas ali vam mir ali omejili svoje roke, nato jih izkoristijo in ubiti, kjer ste presenetiti jih. In ti - smo naredili za vas proti njim jasno dovoljenje.

trans-unit.source: And never is it for a believer to kill a believer except by mistake. And whoever kills a believer by mistake - then the freeing of a believing slave and a compensation payment presented to the deceased's family [is required] unless they give [up their right as] charity. But if the deceased was from a people at war with you and he was a believer - then [only] the freeing of a believing slave; and if he was from a people with whom you have a treaty - then a compensation payment presented to his family and the freeing of a believing slave. And whoever does not find [one or cannot afford to buy one] - then [instead], a fast for two months consecutively, [seeking] acceptance of repentance from Allah. And Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: In nikoli je za vernika ubiti vernik razen po pomoti. In kdor ubije vernik po pomoti - nato sprostitev prepričanje suženj in kompenzacijsko plačilo predloži umrlega družine [je], razen če se odreči [pravico kot] dobrodelnost. Ampak če je bil pokojni od ljudi vojni pa je bil verjamem - potem [samo] sprostitev suženj prepričanje; in če je bil od ljudi, s katerimi imate pogodbo - nato kompenzacijsko plačilo njegove družine in sprostitev prepričanje suženj. In kdor ne najde [eno ali ne morejo privoščiti kupiti enega]- potem [namesto], hitro za dva meseca zaporedoma, [iščejo] sprejetja spreobrnjenju od Allah. In Allah je koli vedo in pametno.

trans-unit.source: But whoever kills a believer intentionally - his recompense is Hell, wherein he will abide eternally, and Allah has become angry with him and has cursed him and has prepared for him a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: Vendar kdor ubije vernik namerno - njegov zaracunati je pekel, pri čemer je bo upošteval večno, in Alah je postal jezen z njim in mu je preklet in pripravil zanj veliko kazen.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you go forth [to fight] in the cause of Allah, investigate; and do not say to one who gives you [a greeting of] peace "You are not a believer," aspiring for the goods of worldly life; for with Allah are many acquisitions. You [yourselves] were like that before; then Allah conferred His favor upon you, so investigate. Indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, ko greš tja [boj] v vzrok od Allah, raziskati; in rekel, da tisti, ki vam [pozdrav] mir "ste ne verjamem," si prizadevajo za blago posvetno življenje; za z Allah so veliko pridobitev. [Se] si takega pred; nato Allah podeljena svojo korist na vas, tako raziskati. Dejansko Allah je kdaj, z kaj delate, seznanjeni.

trans-unit.source: Not equal are those believers remaining [at home] - other than the disabled - and the mujahideen, [who strive and fight] in the cause of Allah with their wealth and their lives. Allah has preferred the mujahideen through their wealth and their lives over those who remain [behind], by degrees. And to both Allah has promised the best [reward]. But Allah has preferred the mujahideen over those who remain [behind] with a great reward -
trans-unit.target: Ni enako so teh vernikov, preostale [doma] - razen invalidov - in Mudžahedin, [ki si prizadevajo in boj] v vzrok od Allah z njihovo premoženje in življenje. Allah ima raje Mudžahedin skozi svoje bogastvo in svoje življenje pred tistimi, ki ostanejo [za], stopinj. In v obeh Allah je obljubil najboljši [nagrado]. Toda Allah je raje mudžahidi nad tistimi, ki ostanejo [za] z veliko nagrado-

trans-unit.source: Degrees [of high position] from Him and forgiveness and mercy. And Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Stopnje [visok položaj] od njega in odpuščanje in milost. In Allah je koli tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those whom the angels take [in death] while wronging themselves - [the angels] will say, "In what [condition] were you?" They will say, "We were oppressed in the land." The angels will say, "Was not the earth of Allah spacious [enough] for you to emigrate therein?" For those, their refuge is Hell - and evil it is as a destination.
trans-unit.target: Res, tisti, katerim angelom se [v smrti] medtem ko wronging sami - [angeli] bo rekel: "v kaj [pogoj] si?" Bodo rekli, "Smo bili zatirani, v deželi." Angeli bo rekel: "Ni bila zemlja Allah prostorno [dovolj] lahko izselijo v njem?" Za tiste, svoje zatočišče je pekel - in zlo je kot destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: Except for the oppressed among men, women and children who cannot devise a plan nor are they directed to a way -
trans-unit.target: Razen zatiranih med moških, žensk in otrok, ki ne more oblikovati načrt niti so usmerjeni na poti -

trans-unit.source: For those it is expected that Allah will pardon them, and Allah is ever Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Za tiste, ki se pričakuje, da Alah jih bo pomilostitev, in Allah je koli Pardoning in tolerantna.

trans-unit.source: And whoever emigrates for the cause of Allah will find on the earth many [alternative] locations and abundance. And whoever leaves his home as an emigrant to Allah and His Messenger and then death overtakes him - his reward has already become incumbent upon Allah. And Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: In kdor emigrates za vzrok Allah našli na zemlji veliko [lokacijami] in številčnosti. In kdor zapusti svoj dom kot izseljenca Allah in njegov sel in nato smrt ga prehiti - nagrado je postala že naložene Allah. In Allah je koli tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And when you travel throughout the land, there is no blame upon you for shortening the prayer, [especially] if you fear that those who disbelieve may disrupt [or attack] you. Indeed, the disbelievers are ever to you a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: In ko potujete po vsej deželi, je brez krivde na vas, za molitev, skrajšanje [zlasti] Če se bojiš, da tistim, ki verjamem lahko motijo [ali napad]. Dejansko je disbelievers so kdaj vam jasno sovražnika.

trans-unit.source: And when you are among them and lead them in prayer, let a group of them stand [in prayer] with you and let them carry their arms. And when they have prostrated, let them be [in position] behind you and have the other group come forward which has not [yet] prayed and let them pray with you, taking precaution and carrying their arms. Those who disbelieve wish that you would neglect your weapons and your baggage so they could come down upon you in one [single] attack. But there is no blame upon you, if you are troubled by rain or are ill, for putting down your arms, but take precaution. Indeed, Allah has prepared for the disbelievers a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: In ko so med njimi in jih vodijo v molitvi, naj skupina od njih stojijo [v molitvi] z vami in jim nosijo orožje. In kdaj so se prostrated, naj jim [v položaj] za tabo so druge skupine slaščicah in ki je ne [vendar] molil in jim molim z vami, ob previdnosti in prevažajo svoje roke. Želeti tistim, ki verjamem, da vas bi zanemarjali vaše orožje in vaše prtljage, tako lahko stopi dol na vas v enega napada [en]. Vendar ni brez krivde na vas, če ste vznemirjen zaradi dežja ali bolni, za odlaganjem roke, vendar zalotiti previdnost. Res, Allah je pripravljena za na disbelievers ponižujoče kazen.

trans-unit.source: And when you have completed the prayer, remember Allah standing, sitting, or [lying] on your sides. But when you become secure, re-establish [regular] prayer. Indeed, prayer has been decreed upon the believers a decree of specified times.
trans-unit.target: In ko ste dokončali molitev, ne pozabite Alah stalnega, sedi ali [leži] na telesu. Ampak ko postaneš zanesljiv, obnove [redno] molitev. Res, molitev je bila že razglašena na verniki odločbe o določenih terminih.

trans-unit.source: And do not weaken in pursuit of the enemy. If you should be suffering - so are they suffering as you are suffering, but you expect from Allah that which they expect not. And Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: In ne oslabi pri uresničevanju sovražnika. Če ste se trpljenje - tako so trpljenje kot imate, ampak pričakujete od Allah, ki ne pričakujejo. In Allah je koli vedo in pametno.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], the Book in truth so you may judge between the people by that which Allah has shown you. And do not be for the deceitful an advocate.
trans-unit.target: Res, smo pokazali vam, [O Muhammad], knjiga v resnici tako lahko sodite med ljudi z to kar Allah je razstava. In ne bo za na goljufivo zagovornik.

trans-unit.source: And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: In iščejo odpuščanje Allah. Res, Allah je koli tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And do not argue on behalf of those who deceive themselves. Indeed, Allah loves not one who is a habitually sinful deceiver.
trans-unit.target: In ne trditi, v imenu tistih, ki varajo sami. Res, Allah ljubi ne tisti, ki je običajno grešno Prevarant.

trans-unit.source: They conceal [their evil intentions and deeds] from the people, but they cannot conceal [them] from Allah, and He is with them [in His knowledge] when they spend the night in such as He does not accept of speech. And ever is Allah, of what they do, encompassing.
trans-unit.target: Skrijejo [njihovo zlo namere in dejanja] od ljudi, vendar ne more skrijejo [jih] od Allah, in je z njimi [v svoje znanje] ko so preživeli noč v, kot je ne sprejema govora. In kdaj je Alah, kaj storiti.

trans-unit.source: Here you are - those who argue on their behalf in [this] worldly life - but who will argue with Allah for them on the Day of Resurrection, or who will [then] be their representative?
trans-unit.target: Tukaj ste - tisti, ki trdijo v njihovem imenu v [ta] posvetno življenje - ampak kdo bo trdijo z Allah za njih na dan od vstajenje, ali [torej] kdo bo njihov zastopnik?

trans-unit.source: And whoever does a wrong or wrongs himself but then seeks forgiveness of Allah will find Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: In kdor ne napačno ali wrongs sam, vendar potem želi odpuščanje Allah našli Allah tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And whoever commits a sin only earns it against himself. And Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: In kdor stori greh le zasluži proti sam. In Allah je koli vedo in pametno.

trans-unit.source: But whoever earns an offense or a sin and then blames it on an innocent [person] has taken upon himself a slander and manifest sin.
trans-unit.target: Vendar kdor zasluži kaznivo dejanje ali greh in potem krivi na neškodljivo [oseba] sprejela nase obrekovanja in očitno greh.

trans-unit.source: And if it was not for the favor of Allah upon you, [O Muhammad], and His mercy, a group of them would have determined to mislead you. But they do not mislead except themselves, and they will not harm you at all. And Allah has revealed to you the Book and wisdom and has taught you that which you did not know. And ever has the favor of Allah upon you been great.
trans-unit.target: In če ni bilo za uslugo Allah na vas, [O Muhammad], in njegova milost, skupina njih bi odločila, da vas zavedli. Vendar ne zavajajo, razen sebe, ter bojo ne škoda vi sploh. In Alah je pokazala, da si knjigo in modrost in je naučil tisto, kar niste vedeli. In kdaj je korist Allah, na vas je bilo super.

trans-unit.source: No good is there in much of their private conversation, except for those who enjoin charity or that which is right or conciliation between people. And whoever does that seeking means to the approval of Allah - then We are going to give him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Ni dobro, ni v veliko od svoj zasebni pogovor, razen tistih, ki ukaže dobrodelne namene ali ki je pravica ali sprava med ljudmi. In kdor ne da išče načine za odobritev Allah - potem bomo mu veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: And whoever opposes the Messenger after guidance has become clear to him and follows other than the way of the believers - We will give him what he has taken and drive him into Hell, and evil it is as a destination.
trans-unit.target: In kdor nasprotuje sel po navodila postalo jasno in sledi razen način verniki - bomo mu, kaj je sprejela in ga vozi v pekel, in zlo je kot destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah does not forgive association with Him, but He forgives what is less than that for whom He wills. And he who associates others with Allah has certainly gone far astray.
trans-unit.target: Res, Allah ne odpusti skupaj z njim, vendar je odpušča, kaj je manjša od tiste, za katere je oporok. In tisti, ki povezuje druge z Alahove je zagotovo šla daleč zašel.

trans-unit.source: They call upon instead of Him none but female [deities], and they [actually] call upon none but a rebellious Satan.
trans-unit.target: Pozivajo namesto njega nič ampak ženski [božanstva] in [zdaj] pozivajo nič vendar upornega Satan.

trans-unit.source: Whom Allah has cursed. For he had said, "I will surely take from among Your servants a specific portion.
trans-unit.target: Katere Allah je preklet. Za je rekel, "sem zagotovo bo med vaš Sluge določen del.

trans-unit.source: And I will mislead them, and I will arouse in them [sinful] desires, and I will command them so they will slit the ears of cattle, and I will command them so they will change the creation of Allah." And whoever takes Satan as an ally instead of Allah has certainly sustained a clear loss.
trans-unit.target: Bo jih, zavajajo in jaz bo vzbudil v njih [grešno] želje in bo ukaz, jih, jim režejo ušesa goveda, in bo ukaz jih, tako da bodo spremembe nastanek Allah." In tisti, ki se Satan kot zaveznika namesto Allah je gotovo utrpela jasno izgubo.

trans-unit.source: Satan promises them and arouses desire in them. But Satan does not promise them except delusion.
trans-unit.target: Satan jih obljublja in zbuja željo v njih. Ampak Satan ne obljubim jih razen blodnje.

trans-unit.source: The refuge of those will be Hell, and they will not find from it an escape.
trans-unit.target: Zatočišče tistih bo pekel, in jih ne boste našli od nje pobegniti.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who believe and do righteous deeds - We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. [It is] the promise of Allah, [which is] truth, and who is more truthful than Allah in statement.
trans-unit.target: Ampak tisti, ki verjamejo in ne pravičen dejanja - smo jih priznam Gardens pod kateri rek pretoka, pri čemer bo upošteval večno. [Je] obljuba od Allah, [ki je] resnico, in kdo je bolj resnične od Allah v izjavi.

trans-unit.source: Paradise is not [obtained] by your wishful thinking nor by that of the People of the Scripture. Whoever does a wrong will be recompensed for it, and he will not find besides Allah a protector or a helper.
trans-unit.target: Raj ni [pridobljeno] vaše želeno niti s tem ljudi Sveto pismo. Kdor ali napačno bo treba izplačati nadomestilo za to, in je ne boste našli poleg Allah, zaščitnik ali pomočnik.

trans-unit.source: And whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer - those will enter Paradise and will not be wronged, [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.
trans-unit.target: In kdor ne pravični dejanjih, moške ali ženske, hkrati pa verjamem - teh bo vnesite raj in ne bo treba krivico, [celo kar] drobec na datum seme.

trans-unit.source: And who is better in religion than one who submits himself to Allah while being a doer of good and follows the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth? And Allah took Abraham as an intimate friend.
trans-unit.target: In kdo je boljši, v vero kot tisti, ki sam trdi v Allah, medtem ko je storilec dobro in sledi vere Abrahama, nagibanje proti resnice? In Alah je Abraham kot intimni prijatelj.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And ever is Allah, of all things, encompassing.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah pripada karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji. In kdaj je Allah, vse stvari, ki zajema.

trans-unit.source: And they request from you, [O Muhammad], a [legal] ruling concerning women. Say, "Allah gives you a ruling about them and [about] what has been recited to you in the Book concerning the orphan girls to whom you do not give what is decreed for them - and [yet] you desire to marry them - and concerning the oppressed among children and that you maintain for orphans [their rights] in justice." And whatever you do of good - indeed, Allah is ever Knowing of it.
trans-unit.target: In zahtevajo od vas, [O Muhammad], [pravno] odločanje o ženske. Reči, "Allah vam v odločanje o njih in [o] kaj vam v knjigi o sirote deklice, ki mu ne daš kaj je razglašena za njih - in [vendar] ste željo, da se poroči them - in o zatiranih med otroci recitirajo in da se ohrani za sirote svojih pravic v pravosodju." In karkoli narediš dobrega - res, Allah je vedel za to.

trans-unit.source: And if a woman fears from her husband contempt or evasion, there is no sin upon them if they make terms of settlement between them - and settlement is best. And present in [human] souls is stinginess. But if you do good and fear Allah - then indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: In če ženska boji njen mož prezir ali utaj, ni greh na njih, če bi pogoje dogovora med njimi - in poravnave je najbolje. In sedaj v [človekove] duše je stinginess. Vendar, če vi delati dobro in strah Allah - potem res Allah je koli, s tem, kar, seznanjeni.

trans-unit.source: And you will never be able to be equal [in feeling] between wives, even if you should strive [to do so]. So do not incline completely [toward one] and leave another hanging. And if you amend [your affairs] and fear Allah - then indeed, Allah is ever Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: In nikoli ne boste mogli biti enako [v občutek] med žene, tudi če si morajo prizadevati [storiti]. Tako ne naklon popolnoma [proti enemu] in pustite druge viseče. In če spremeniti [vaše zadeve] in strah Allah - res, potem Allah je koli tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: But if they separate [by divorce], Allah will enrich each [of them] from His abundance. And ever is Allah Encompassing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Vendar če so ločeni [z razvezo], Alah bo obogatilo vseh [jih] iz njegove številčnosti. In kdaj je Allah zajema in pametno.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And We have instructed those who were given the Scripture before you and yourselves to fear Allah. But if you disbelieve - then to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And ever is Allah Free of need and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah pripada karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji. In smo navodila tistih, ki so imele pismo pred vas in sebe, da strah Allah. Vendar če vam verjamem - potem v Allah pripada karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji. In kdaj je Allah brez potrebe in Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah pripada karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji. In dovolj je Allah kot odstranjevalec zadeve.

trans-unit.source: If He wills, He can do away with you, O people, and bring others [in your place]. And ever is Allah competent to do that.
trans-unit.target: Če on hoče, je lahko narediti stran z vami, O ljudje, in preskrbeti druge [mesto]. In kdaj je Allah, ki so pristojni za to.

trans-unit.source: Whoever desires the reward of this world - then with Allah is the reward of this world and the Hereafter. And ever is Allah Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Kdor želi plačilo tega sveta - torej z Allah je plačilo tega sveta in v nadaljevanju. In kdaj je Allah sluh in videnje.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm in justice, witnesses for Allah, even if it be against yourselves or parents and relatives. Whether one is rich or poor, Allah is more worthy of both. So follow not [personal] inclination, lest you not be just. And if you distort [your testimony] or refuse [to give it], then indeed Allah is ever, with what you do, Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, se vztrajno stoječe podjetje v pravosodje, priče za Allah, četudi je bilo zoper sebe ali starši in sorodniki. Ali je bogati ali revni, Allah je več vredna obojega. Tako, da sledite ne [osebno] naklon, da ne boste samo. In če ste izkrivljajo svoje pričevanje ali zavrneta [je], potem res Allah je kdaj, kaj, seznanjeni.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Book that He sent down upon His Messenger and the Scripture which He sent down before. And whoever disbelieves in Allah, His angels, His books, His messengers, and the Last Day has certainly gone far astray.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, verjamejo v Allah in njegov sel ter knjige, ki je poslan na njegov sel in pismo, ki ga poslali. In kdor jih disbelieves v Allah, njegovi angeli, njegove knjige, svoje glasnike, in zadnji dan je zagotovo zaluta daleč.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed then disbelieved, then believed, then disbelieved, and then increased in disbelief - never will Allah forgive them, nor will He guide them to a way.
trans-unit.target: Res, tisti, ki so verjeli takrat verjeli, takrat verjeli, potem verjeli, ter se nato povečal nejeverno - nikoli ne bo Alah odpusti jim, niti bo on vodil način.

trans-unit.source: Give tidings to the hypocrites that there is for them a painful punishment -
trans-unit.target: Dati novic hinavci, da je za njih boleče kazen-

trans-unit.source: Those who take disbelievers as allies instead of the believers. Do they seek with them honor [through power]? But indeed, honor belongs to Allah entirely.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki bo disbelievers kot zavezniki namesto verniki. Ne o tem posvetuje z njimi čast [skozi moč]? Ampak res, čast pripada Allah povsem.

trans-unit.source: And it has already come down to you in the Book that when you hear the verses of Allah [recited], they are denied [by them] and ridiculed; so do not sit with them until they enter into another conversation. Indeed, you would then be like them. Indeed Allah will gather the hypocrites and disbelievers in Hell all together -
trans-unit.target: In to je že prišel do vas v knjigi, da ko slišiš verzov Allah [recitiral], so zavrnjen [jih] in posmeha; tako ne sedi z njimi, vse dokler ne vstopi v drugo pogovor. Res, bi tako všeč. Dejansko se bo zbralo Allah hinavci in disbelievers v pekel vse skupaj-

trans-unit.source: Those who wait [and watch] you. Then if you gain a victory from Allah, they say, "Were we not with you?" But if the disbelievers have a success, they say [to them], "Did we not gain the advantage over you, but we protected you from the believers?" Allah will judge between [all of] you on the Day of Resurrection, and never will Allah give the disbelievers over the believers a way [to overcome them].
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki čakati [in gledal]. Potem če boste pridobili zmago od Allah, pravijo, "niso smo z vami?" Ampak, če je disbelievers so uspeh, pravijo [na njih], "mi niso pridobili prednost pred vas, vendar smo si zaščiten pred verniki?" Alah bo sodnik med [vse] na dan od vstajenje, in nikoli ne bo Alah daš na disbelievers nad verniki način [za njihovo premagovanje].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the hypocrites [think to] deceive Allah, but He is deceiving them. And when they stand for prayer, they stand lazily, showing [themselves to] the people and not remembering Allah except a little,
trans-unit.target: Res, hinavci [mislim, da] prevarati Allah, ampak on jih je vara. In ko stojijo za molitev, stojijo leno, ki prikazuje [sami] ljudi in se ne spominja Allah, razen malo,

trans-unit.source: Wavering between them, [belonging] neither to the believers nor to the disbelievers. And whoever Allah leaves astray - never will you find for him a way.
trans-unit.target: Negotov, med njimi, [ki] verniki niti na disbelievers. In kdor Alah pušča zašel - nikoli ne boste našli zanj način.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not take the disbelievers as allies instead of the believers. Do you wish to give Allah against yourselves a clear case?
trans-unit.target: O kdo verjel, nimate disbelievers kot zavezniki namesto verniki. Ali želite dati Allah proti sebi jasen primer?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Fire - and never will you find for them a helper -
trans-unit.target: Res, hinavci bodo v najnižje globine ogenj - in nikoli ne boste našli zanje pomočnik-

trans-unit.source: Except for those who repent, correct themselves, hold fast to Allah, and are sincere in their religion for Allah, for those will be with the believers. And Allah is going to give the believers a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Razen tistih, ki se pokesajo, pravilno, hitro držati Allah in iskrena v svojo vero za Allah, za tiste, ki bodo z verniki. In Allah je tekoč podati verniki veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: What would Allah do with your punishment if you are grateful and believe? And ever is Allah Appreciative and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Kaj bi Allah? s svojo kazen če so hvaležni in verjeti In kdaj je Allah hvaležni in poznavanje.

trans-unit.source: Allah does not like the public mention of evil except by one who has been wronged. And ever is Allah Hearing and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Allah ne mara javno omenil zla, razen enega, ki je bila storjena krivica. In kdaj je Allah sluha in poznavanje.

trans-unit.source: If [instead] you show [some] good or conceal it or pardon an offense - indeed, Allah is ever Pardoning and Competent.
trans-unit.target: Če [namesto] razstava [nekaj] dobro ali skriti ali pomilostitev kaznivo dejanje - res, Allah je koli Pardoning in pristojni.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve in Allah and His messengers and wish to discriminate between Allah and His messengers and say, "We believe in some and disbelieve in others," and wish to adopt a way in between -
trans-unit.target: Res, tistim, ki verjamem v Allah in kurirji in želja razlikovati med Allah in njegovi glasniki in reči, "Verjamemo v nekaterih in verjamem v drugi," in želijo sprejeti način v med-

trans-unit.source: Those are the disbelievers, truly. And We have prepared for the disbelievers a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: To so disbelievers, resnično. In pripravljamo za na disbelievers ponižujoče kazen.

trans-unit.source: But they who believe in Allah and His messengers and do not discriminate between any of them - to those He is going to give their rewards. And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ampak tisti, ki verjamejo v Allah in svoje glasnike in ne diskriminirajo med katero koli od njih - tistim je je tekoč podati svoje nagrade. In kdaj je Allah tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: The People of the Scripture ask you to bring down to them a book from the heaven. But they had asked of Moses [even] greater than that and said, "Show us Allah outright," so the thunderbolt struck them for their wrongdoing. Then they took the calf [for worship] after clear evidences had come to them, and We pardoned that. And We gave Moses a clear authority.
trans-unit.target: Ljudje Sveto pismo vas znižati jim knjigo iz nebes. Vendar je vprašal Moses [tudi] večja od in reče: "Pokaži nam Allah popolna," tako je thunderbolt udari jih za svoje kršitve. Nato vzeli tele [za bogoslužje] po jasno dokazov je prišel do njih, in smo pomilostil ki. In mi je dal Moses jasnega pooblastila.

trans-unit.source: And We raised over them the mount for [refusal of] their covenant; and We said to them, "Enter the gate bowing humbly", and We said to them, "Do not transgress on the sabbath", and We took from them a solemn covenant.
trans-unit.target: In mi dvigne nad njimi mount za [zavrnitev] svoje zaveze; in smo jim reče, "Vnesite vrata ponižno priklonila", in smo jim reče: "V soboto ne bi presegli", in smo od njih slovesno zveze.

trans-unit.source: And [We cursed them] for their breaking of the covenant and their disbelief in the signs of Allah and their killing of the prophets without right and their saying, "Our hearts are wrapped". Rather, Allah has sealed them because of their disbelief, so they believe not, except for a few.
trans-unit.target: In [smo preklet jih] za svoje zlom zveze in svoje nejeverno v znake Allah in usmrtitvi prerokov brez pravice in njihove pravi, "naša srca so zaviti". Namesto, Allah je zapečatena jih zaradi svoje nejeverno, tako menijo, da ne, razen nekaj.

trans-unit.source: And [We cursed them] for their disbelief and their saying against Mary a great slander,
trans-unit.target: In [smo preklet jih] za svoje nejeverno in njihovega rekel proti Mary veliko obrekovanja,

trans-unit.source: And [for] their saying, "Indeed, we have killed the Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary, the messenger of Allah." And they did not kill him, nor did they crucify him; but [another] was made to resemble him to them. And indeed, those who differ over it are in doubt about it. They have no knowledge of it except the following of assumption. And they did not kill him, for certain.
trans-unit.target: In [za] rekel, "res, so ubili smo Mesija, Jezus, sin Marije, sel od Allah." In ni ubil njega, niti so križali vendar [drugo] je bil, da ga spominjajo nanje. In res, tisti, ki razlikujejo nad njim so v dvomih o tem. Oni nimajo znanja da razen naslednje predpostavke. In ni ubil njega, za nekatere.

trans-unit.source: Rather, Allah raised him to Himself. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: Namesto, Allah obudil k sebi. In kdaj je Allah vzvišeno v oblast in pametno.

trans-unit.source: And there is none from the People of the Scripture but that he will surely believe in Jesus before his death. And on the Day of Resurrection he will be against them a witness.
trans-unit.target: In ni nobeden od ljudi, Sveto pismo, ampak da bo zagotovo verjamejo v Jezusa pred smrtjo. In na dan od vstajenje je treba proti njim priča.

trans-unit.source: For wrongdoing on the part of the Jews, We made unlawful for them [certain] good foods which had been lawful to them, and for their averting from the way of Allah many [people],
trans-unit.target: Za kršitve zakona s strani Judje, smo naredili nezakonito zanje [nekaterih] dobre hrane, ki je bila zakonita nanje, in za njihovo preprečitev iz pot Allah veliko [ljudje],

trans-unit.source: And [for] their taking of usury while they had been forbidden from it, and their consuming of the people's wealth unjustly. And we have prepared for the disbelievers among them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: In [za] ob njihovi oderuštva, medtem ko je bila prepovedana od njega, in njihovo uživanje ljudsko bogastvo neupravičeno. In smo pripravili za disbelievers med njimi boleče kazen.

trans-unit.source: But those firm in knowledge among them and the believers believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you. And the establishers of prayer [especially] and the givers of zakah and the believers in Allah and the Last Day - those We will give a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Vendar tistih podjetje znanja med njimi in verniki verjamejo v kaj se je pokazala za vas, [O Muhammad], in kaj je pokazala pred vami. In establishers molitev [zlasti] in givers zakah in vernik v Allah in zadnji dan - tiste, ki mi bo dala veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], as We revealed to Noah and the prophets after him. And we revealed to Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, the Descendants, Jesus, Job, Jonah, Aaron, and Solomon, and to David We gave the book [of Psalms].
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, smo pokazali vam, [O Muhammad], kot smo razkrili, da Noah in Preroki po njem. In mi je pokazala, da Abraham, Ishmael, Isaac, Jacob, potomci, Jezus, delo, Jona, Aaron in Solomon, in David smo dal knjigo [psalmov].

trans-unit.source: And [We sent] messengers about whom We have related [their stories] to you before and messengers about whom We have not related to you. And Allah spoke to Moses with [direct] speech.
trans-unit.target: In [smo poslali] kurirji, o katerih smo so zgodbice [njihovega] vam pred in kurirji, o katerih smo niso povezane z vi. Ter Allah govoril Moses z [neposredno] govora.

trans-unit.source: [We sent] messengers as bringers of good tidings and warners so that mankind will have no argument against Allah after the messengers. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.
trans-unit.target: [Smo poslali] glasnike kot bringers dobrih novic in warners, tako da človeštvo imeli argument proti Allah po sli. In kdaj je Allah vzvišeno v oblast in pametno.

trans-unit.source: But Allah bears witness to that which He has revealed to you. He has sent it down with His knowledge, and the angels bear witness [as well]. And sufficient is Allah as Witness.
trans-unit.target: Vendar Allah priča, ki je pokazala za vas. Je poslala s svojim znanjem, in angeli pričajo [tudi]. In dovolj je Allah kot priča.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve and avert [people] from the way of Allah have certainly gone far astray.
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, tistih, ki verjamem in preprečiti [ljudje] iz pot Allah zagotovo šla daleč zašel.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve and commit wrong [or injustice] - never will Allah forgive them, nor will He guide them to a path.
trans-unit.target: Res, tisti, ki verjamem in se zavežejo narobe [ali krivice] - nikoli ne bo Alah odpusti jim, niti bo on vodil na pot.

trans-unit.source: Except the path of Hell; they will abide therein forever. And that, for Allah, is [always] easy.
trans-unit.target: Razen pot pekel; se bo upošteval v njem večno. In da za Allah, prisotno [] enostavno.

trans-unit.source: O Mankind, the Messenger has come to you with the truth from your Lord, so believe; it is better for you. But if you disbelieve - then indeed, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth. And ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O človeštva, sel je prišel k vam z resnico iz svojega Gospoda, tako verjamem; To je bolje za vas. Vendar če vam verjamem - potem dejansko v Allah spada, karkoli je v nebesih in zemlji. In kdaj je Allah vedo in pametno.

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, do not commit excess in your religion or say about Allah except the truth. The Messiah, Jesus, the son of Mary, was but a messenger of Allah and His word which He directed to Mary and a soul [created at a command] from Him. So believe in Allah and His messengers. And do not say, "Three"; desist - it is better for you. Indeed, Allah is but one God. Exalted is He above having a son. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: O ljudje Sveto pismo, ne zavežejo presežek v vaše vere ali povedati o Allah razen resnico. Mesija Jezus, sin Marije, je pa sel od Allah in njegove besede, ki je usmerjeno k Mary in dušo [ustvaril na ukaz] od njega. Tako vernik v Allah in svoje glasnike. In ne rečem, "Tri"; z delom - to je bolje za vas. Res, Alah je, ampak enega Boga. Vzvišeno je zgoraj ima sina. Mu pripada karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji. In dovolj je Allah kot odstranjevalec zadeve.

trans-unit.source: Never would the Messiah disdain to be a servant of Allah, nor would the angels near [to Him]. And whoever disdains His worship and is arrogant - He will gather them to Himself all together.
trans-unit.target: Nikoli ne bi prezirom Mesija biti služabnik Allah, niti bi angeli blizu [nanj]. In kdor disdains njegovo čaščenje in je aroganten - on bo jih zberejo sam vse skupaj.

trans-unit.source: And as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, He will give them in full their rewards and grant them extra from His bounty. But as for those who disdained and were arrogant, He will punish them with a painful punishment, and they will not find for themselves besides Allah any protector or helper.
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki je verjel in naredil pravednici dejanja, on jim v celoti svoje nagrade in jim dodelijo dodatne iz njegove glave. Ampak za tiste, ki prezre in so bili aroganten, da bodo kaznovali z boleče kazen, in jih ne boste našli sami poleg Allah nobenega zaščitnika ali pomočnik.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, there has come to you a conclusive proof from your Lord, and We have sent down to you a clear light.
trans-unit.target: O človeštva, da je prišel za vas zadosten dokaz iz svojega Gospoda, in smo poslali vam jasno svetlobe.

trans-unit.source: So those who believe in Allah and hold fast to Him - He will admit them to mercy from Himself and bounty and guide them to Himself on a straight path.
trans-unit.target: Tako tiste, ki verjamejo v Allah in imajo hitro mu - on bo priznati jih za milost od sam in radodarnosti in jih vodili sam na ravne poti.

trans-unit.source: They request from you a [legal] ruling. Say, "Allah gives you a ruling concerning one having neither descendants nor ascendants [as heirs]." If a man dies, leaving no child but [only] a sister, she will have half of what he left. And he inherits from her if she [dies and] has no child. But if there are two sisters [or more], they will have two-thirds of what he left. If there are both brothers and sisters, the male will have the share of two females. Allah makes clear to you [His law], lest you go astray. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Zahtevajo od vas [pravno] odločbe. Reči, "Allah vam v odločanje o enem imajo potomci niti predniki [kot dediči]." Če človek umre, pri čemer noben otrok vendar [samo] sestra, bo imela polovica kar je ostalo. In on deduje njeno če ona [umre in] je noben otrok. Ampak če obstajajo dve sestri [ali več], bodo imeli dve tretjini od kar je ostalo. Če so bratje in sestre, moški imajo delež dve samički. Allah je jasno vam [njegovo pravo], da ne greš zašel. In Alah je poznavanje vseh stvari.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fulfill [all] contracts. Lawful for you are the animals of grazing livestock except for that which is recited to you [in this Qur'an] - hunting not being permitted while you are in the state of ihram. Indeed, Allah ordains what He intends.
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki ste verjeli, [vse] izpolnitev pogodbe. Zakonito ste so živali pašne živine razen da, ki je recitiral vam [v tej Qur'an] - lov ni dovoljena, medtem ko so v državi ihram. Res, Allah, ordains, kaj namerava.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not violate the rites of Allah or [the sanctity of] the sacred month or [neglect the marking of] the sacrificial animals and garlanding [them] or [violate the safety of] those coming to the Sacred House seeking bounty from their Lord and [His] approval. But when you come out of ihram, then [you may] hunt. And do not let the hatred of a people for having obstructed you from al-Masjid al-Haram lead you to transgress. And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, ne kršijo, obredi Allah ali [svetost] sveto mesec ali [zanemarjajo označevanje] žrtveno živali in garlanding [jih] ali [krši varnost] tiste, ki prihajajo v sveto hišo iščejo bounty iz svojega Gospoda in [njegovi] odobritev. Toda, ko prideš iz ihram, nato pa [lahko] lov. In ne pustite, da sovraštvo ljudi za imajo ovirano iz al-Masjid al-Haram vodi lahko prestopijo. In sodelujejo pri pravičnosti in pobožnosti, vendar ne sodelujejo v greh in agresije. In strah Allah; res, Allah je huda kazen.

trans-unit.source: Prohibited to you are dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah, and [those animals] killed by strangling or by a violent blow or by a head-long fall or by the goring of horns, and those from which a wild animal has eaten, except what you [are able to] slaughter [before its death], and those which are sacrificed on stone altars, and [prohibited is] that you seek decision through divining arrows. That is grave disobedience. This day those who disbelieve have despaired of [defeating] your religion; so fear them not, but fear Me. This day I have perfected for you your religion and completed My favor upon you and have approved for you Islam as religion. But whoever is forced by severe hunger with no inclination to sin - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Prepovedano vam mrtvih živali, krvi, meso prašičev in ki je bila posvečena razen Allah, in te živali ubil davljenja ali udarec nasilnih ali z glavo dolgo padec ali Krvav rogovi, in tiste, iz katere je jedel divje živali, razen tistega, kar ste [lahko] zakol [pred svojo smrtjo] , in tiste, ki so žrtvovali na kamniti oltarji, in prepovedano je da iščeš odločbe prek divining puščice. To je groba neposlušnosti. Ta dan tistim, ki verjamem so obupal [zmage nad] vere; Torej ne bojte se jih, ampak strah Me. Ta dan imam izpopolnil zate vere in zaključili svoj prid na vas in so odobreni za vas Islam kot religija. Vendar Kdor je zaradi hude lakote z nagib, ki greh - potem res, Allah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], what has been made lawful for them. Say, "Lawful for you are [all] good foods and [game caught by] what you have trained of hunting animals which you train as Allah has taught you. So eat of what they catch for you, and mention the name of Allah upon it, and fear Allah." Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Prosijo vas, [O Muhammad], kaj je zakonito zanje. Reči, "zakonita ste [vse] dobre hrane in [igra zajeta] kaj ste usposobljeni živali lov, ki ga vlak kot Alah je naučil. Tako jesti kaj ulov za vas, in omenja ime Allah nanj, in strah Allah." Res, Allah je hitro v račun.

trans-unit.source: This day [all] good foods have been made lawful, and the food of those who were given the Scripture is lawful for you and your food is lawful for them. And [lawful in marriage are] chaste women from among the believers and chaste women from among those who were given the Scripture before you, when you have given them their due compensation, desiring chastity, not unlawful sexual intercourse or taking [secret] lovers. And whoever denies the faith - his work has become worthless, and he, in the Hereafter, will be among the losers.
trans-unit.target: Ta dan [vse] dobro živila so bili izdelani zakonito, in hrano tistih, ki so imele pismo zakonita za vas in vaše hrane zakonita zanje. In [zakonito v zakonu so] čist ženske med verniki in čist žensk med tistimi, ki so imele pismo pred vami, ko ste jih dali svoje ustrezno nadomestilo, v želji, čistost, ni nezakonito spolni odnos ali jemanje [secret] ljubitelje. In kdor zanika vere - njegovo delo je postala brez vrednosti, in on, v nadaljevanju, bo med poraženci.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you rise to [perform] prayer, wash your faces and your forearms to the elbows and wipe over your heads and wash your feet to the ankles. And if you are in a state of janabah, then purify yourselves. But if you are ill or on a journey or one of you comes from the place of relieving himself or you have contacted women and do not find water, then seek clean earth and wipe over your faces and hands with it. Allah does not intend to make difficulty for you, but He intends to purify you and complete His favor upon you that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: O ki ste verjeli, ko ste dvig opravljati [] molitev, pranje vaše obraze in podlakti za kolena in obrišite čez vaše glave in umijte noge do gležnjev. In če ste v stanju janabah, nato pa očisti sebe. Ampak, če ste slabo ali na potovanje ali od vas prihaja iz kraja o lajšanju sam ali stik ženske in ne najti vodo, potem si čisto prstjo in obrišite čez svoje obraze in roke z njim. Allah ne nameravati uganjati težave za vas, ampak ga namerava vas očisti in dokončati svojo korist na vas, da boste hvaležni.

trans-unit.source: And remember the favor of Allah upon you and His covenant with which He bound you when you said, "We hear and we obey"; and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: In ne pozabite uslugo Allah na vas in njegov pakt, s katerim je vezan, si ko si rekel, "smo slišali in smo ubogati"; in strah Allah. Res, Allah je poznavanje tega v prsi.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm for Allah, witnesses in justice, and do not let the hatred of a people prevent you from being just. Be just; that is nearer to righteousness. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: O kdo verjel, se vztrajno trdno stoji za Allah, priče v pravičnosti, in ne dovolite, da sovraštvo ljudi preprečite, da si se samo. Mogoče samo; ki je bližje pravičnosti. In strah Allah; res, Allah je vešč kaj.

trans-unit.source: Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds [that] for them there is forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: Allah je obljubil, tiste, ki verjamejo in ne pravičen dejanja [da] za njih ni odpuščanje in veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Ampak tisti, ki verjamem in zanikati naših znakov - so tovariši Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, remember the favor of Allah upon you when a people determined to extend their hands [in aggression] against you, but He withheld their hands from you; and fear Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, spomnim uslugo Allah na vas, ko ljudi, odločen razširiti svoje roke [v agresijo] proti tebi, ampak je zadržal svoje roke od vas; in strah Allah. In na Alah naj bi se verniki.

trans-unit.source: And Allah had already taken a covenant from the Children of Israel, and We delegated from among them twelve leaders. And Allah said, "I am with you. If you establish prayer and give zakah and believe in My messengers and support them and loan Allah a goodly loan, I will surely remove from you your misdeeds and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow. But whoever of you disbelieves after that has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way."
trans-unit.target: In Alah že sprejele zavezo otroke Izraela, in mi prenese od njih dvanajst voditelji. In Alah je dejal, "jaz sem z vami. Če vzpostavitev molitev in dati zakah in verjamejo v svoj kurirji in jih podpirajo in posojila Allah lep posojilo, bo zagotovo odstraniti iz ste svoje zločine in si priznati, da vrtovi pod katero tok reke. Ampak kdo od vas jih disbelieves po ki je gotovo zašel iz trdnost način."

trans-unit.source: So for their breaking of the covenant We cursed them and made their hearts hard. They distort words from their [proper] usages and have forgotten a portion of that of which they were reminded. And you will still observe deceit among them, except a few of them. But pardon them and overlook [their misdeeds]. Indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Zato za njihovo razstavljanje zaveze smo jih preklet in je njihova srca težko. Izkrivljajo besede iz njihovega [pravilno] rabe in pozabili del, ki pa so bili spomnil. In še vedno boste opazovali prevaro Mednje, razen nekaj od njih. Vendar jih pomilostitev in gledajo njihove zločine. Res, Allah ljubi kršitelje dobro.

trans-unit.source: And from those who say, "We are Christians" We took their covenant; but they forgot a portion of that of which they were reminded. So We caused among them animosity and hatred until the Day of Resurrection. And Allah is going to inform them about what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: In od tistih, ki pravijo, "Smo kristjani" smo svoje zaveze; pozabili so del tega, ki so bili spomnil. Tako smo zaradi med njimi sovraštvo in sovraštvo do dan od vstajenje. In Allah je tekoč obvesti o tem, kaj oni že rabljen uganjati.

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, there has come to you Our Messenger making clear to you much of what you used to conceal of the Scripture and overlooking much. There has come to you from Allah a light and a clear Book.
trans-unit.target: O ljudje Sveto pismo, da je prišel, vam naši sel, ki jasno vam veliko tega, kar ste že rabljen skrivati Sveto pismo in s pogledom na veliko. Tam je prišel za vas od Allah luči in knjigo jasno.

trans-unit.source: By which Allah guides those who pursue His pleasure to the ways of peace and brings them out from darknesses into the light, by His permission, and guides them to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: S katerim Allah vodniki tiste, ki opravljajo svoje veselje na pota miru in jih prinaša iz darknesses v svetlobo, z njegovim dovoljenjem, in jih vodili naravnost pot.

trans-unit.source: They have certainly disbelieved who say that Allah is Christ, the son of Mary. Say, "Then who could prevent Allah at all if He had intended to destroy Christ, the son of Mary, or his mother or everyone on the earth?" And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them. He creates what He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Zagotovo so verjeli, ki pravijo, da Allah je Kristus, sin Marije. Reči, "Potem ki lahko prepreči Allah sploh če je nameraval uničiti Kristus, sin Marije, ali njegova mati ali vsakogar na zemlji?" Ter Allah pripada oblast nebesa in zemlja in vse, kar je vmes. Ustvarja tisto, kar je oporok in Alah je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni.

trans-unit.source: But the Jews and the Christians say, "We are the children of Allah and His beloved." Say, "Then why does He punish you for your sins?" Rather, you are human beings from among those He has created. He forgives whom He wills, and He punishes whom He wills. And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, and to Him is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: Vendar Judje in kristjani reči, "Mi smo otroci Allah in svojo ljubljeno." Reči, "Potem zakaj does on kaznovati za svoje grehe?" Namesto, ste ljudmi med tiste, ki je ustvaril. On odpušča koga je oporok, in on jim je oporok kaznuje. Allah pripada oblast nebesa in zemlja in vse, kar je vmes, in mu je [končno] destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: O People of the Scripture, there has come to you Our Messenger to make clear to you [the religion] after a period [of suspension] of messengers, lest you say, "There came not to us any bringer of good tidings or a warner." But there has come to you a bringer of good tidings and a warner. And Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: O ljudje Sveto pismo, da je prišel, vam naši sel pojasniti vam [vera] po določenem [suspenzije] sli, da ne boste rekli, "je prišel ni na nas vse prinašalca dobrih novic ali a warner." Ampak tam je prišel k vam prinašalca dobrih novic in a warner. In Alah je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, remember the favor of Allah upon you when He appointed among you prophets and made you possessors and gave you that which He had not given anyone among the worlds.
trans-unit.target: In [omenja, O Muhammad], ko je dejal Moses svojemu ljudstvu, "O moj ljudi, ne pozabite uslugo Allah na vas ko je imenovan med vami preroki in so si imetniki in dal tisto, kar on ni dal kdo med svetovi.

trans-unit.source: O my people, enter the Holy Land which Allah has assigned to you and do not turn back [from fighting in Allah 's cause] and [thus] become losers."
trans-unit.target: O moje ljudstvo, vstopijo v Sveti deželi, ki je dodeljeno Allah ne obrniti nazaj [od boj v vzrok je Allah] in [tako] postali poraženci."

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, indeed within it is a people of tyrannical strength, and indeed, we will never enter it until they leave it; but if they leave it, then we will enter."
trans-unit.target: So rekli, "O Moses, dejansko v njej je ljudi Despotski moč, in res, mi nikoli ne bo vpišite to dokler ne zapustijo vendar če zapustijo to, torej bo vstopamo."

trans-unit.source: Said two men from those who feared [to disobey] upon whom Allah had bestowed favor, "Enter upon them through the gate, for when you have entered it, you will be predominant. And upon Allah rely, if you should be believers."
trans-unit.target: Je dejal dva moška, od tistih, ki se Bali [da kršijo] onesposobljenosti Allah je podaril uslugo, "vnesite na njih skozi vrata, ko ste ga vnesli, vam bo prevladujoča. In na Allah bi se, če bi morali biti verniki. «

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, indeed we will not enter it, ever, as long as they are within it; so go, you and your Lord, and fight. Indeed, we are remaining right here."
trans-unit.target: Pa reče: "O Moses, res mi ne vnese, kdaj, tako dolgo, kot so v njem; tako gredo, vi in vaš gospodar, in boj. Pravzaprav, smo so ostala tukaj."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "My Lord, indeed I do not possess except myself and my brother, so part us from the defiantly disobedient people."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] reče: "Moj Gospod, res sem nimajo razen sebe in moj brat, tako nas je del od kljubovalno neposlušni ljudje."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then indeed, it is forbidden to them for forty years [in which] they will wander throughout the land. So do not grieve over the defiantly disobedient people."
trans-unit.target: [Alahove] je dejal, "potem res, je prepovedano, da jih za štirideset let, [in ki] so potikal po vsej deželi. Tako ne žalujejo nad kljubovalno neposlušni ljudje."

trans-unit.source: And recite to them the story of Adam's two sons, in truth, when they both offered a sacrifice [to Allah], and it was accepted from one of them but was not accepted from the other. Said [the latter], "I will surely kill you." Said [the former], "Indeed, Allah only accepts from the righteous [who fear Him].
trans-unit.target: In recitirali jih zgodba Adamova sinova, v resnici, ko oba ponuditi daritev [Alahove], in je bil sprejet od enega od njih, vendar ni bila sprejeta od drugih. Je dejal, [ta], "Sem bo zagotovo ubil." [Prva] reče: "Pravzaprav, Allah sprejema samo iz pravičnih, [ki ga strah].

trans-unit.source: If you should raise your hand against me to kill me - I shall not raise my hand against you to kill you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Če naj dvigne roko proti meni, da bi ubil me - se ne dvignem roko proti vam, da te ubijem. Namreč bojim Allah, gospod svetov.

trans-unit.source: Indeed I want you to obtain [thereby] my sin and your sin so you will be among the companions of the Fire. And that is the recompense of wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Res želim pridobitev [tako] svoj greh in svoje grehe, tako da boste med tovariši ogenj. In to je zaracunati wrongdoers."

trans-unit.source: And his soul permitted to him the murder of his brother, so he killed him and became among the losers.
trans-unit.target: In svojo dušo dovoli mu umor svojega brata, tako da ga je ubil in postal med poraženci.

trans-unit.source: Then Allah sent a crow searching in the ground to show him how to hide the disgrace of his brother. He said, "O woe to me! Have I failed to be like this crow and hide the body of my brother?" And he became of the regretful.
trans-unit.target: Nato pošlje Allah vrana iskanje v zemlji, da mu pokazati, kako skriti sramota svojega brata. Je dejal, "O Gorje mi! So mi ni uspelo kot to vrana in skriti telo mojega brata?" In je postal od je obžalovanja.

trans-unit.source: Because of that, We decreed upon the Children of Israel that whoever kills a soul unless for a soul or for corruption [done] in the land - it is as if he had slain mankind entirely.
