My Lord has made it reality. And He was certainly good to me when He took me out of prison and brought you [here] from bedouin life after Satan had induced [estrangement] between me and my brothers. Indeed, my Lord is Subtle in what He wills. Indeed, it is He who is the Knowing, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: In dvignil starši na prestol in se priklonil do njega v izčrpanost. In on reče: "O moj oče, to je razlaga moje vizije pred. Moj Gospodar, ki je realnost. In je bil gotovo dobro, da me, ko me vzel iz zapora in pripeljal [tukaj] iz Beduin življenje po Satan je povzročil [Otuđenje] med jaz in moji bratje. Pravzaprav, moj gospodar je fino v tisto, kar je oporok. Res, da je on, ki je poznavanje, pametno.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, You have given me [something] of sovereignty and taught me of the interpretation of dreams. Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Moj Gospodar, so mi [nekaj] suverenosti in učil me razlago sanj. Stvarnik nebes in zemlje, ste moj zaščitnik v tem svetu in v nadaljevanju. Vzrok mi umreti muslimanske in se mi pridruži s pravedna."

trans-unit.source: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal, [O Muhammad], to you. And you were not with them when they put together their plan while they conspired.
trans-unit.target: To je iz novice nevidna, ki mi razkrije, [O Muhammad], za vas. In niste bili z njimi, ko so skupaj njihov načrt, medtem ko so zaroto.

trans-unit.source: And most of the people, although you strive [for it], are not believers.
trans-unit.target: In večina ljudi, čeprav si prizadevajo [za to], niso verniki.

trans-unit.source: And you do not ask of them for it any payment. It is not except a reminder to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: In ne vprašate od njih za to nobenega plačila. Ni razen opomnik za svetove.

trans-unit.source: And how many a sign within the heavens and earth do they pass over while they, therefrom, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: In koliko znak v nebo in zemlja ne gresta, ki pa jih, iz njih, se obrača proč.

trans-unit.source: And most of them believe not in Allah except while they associate others with Him.
trans-unit.target: In večina od njih ne verjamejo v Allah razen medtem ko drugi povezujejo z njim.

trans-unit.source: Then do they feel secure that there will not come to them an overwhelming [aspect] of the punishment of Allah or that the Hour will not come upon them suddenly while they do not perceive?
trans-unit.target: Potem se počutim varno, da tam ne bo prišel na njih ogromno [del] kazen od Allah ali da na uro ne bo prišel na njih nenadoma pa se jim ne zdi?

trans-unit.source: Say, "This is my way; I invite to Allah with insight, I and those who follow me. And exalted is Allah; and I am not of those who associate others with Him."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "to je moj način; Vabim, da Alah z vpogled, sem in tisti, ki mi sledite. In povzdignil je Allah; in jaz nisem tistih, ki povezujejo drugi z njim."

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you [as messengers] except men to whom We revealed from among the people of cities. So have they not traveled through the earth and observed how was the end of those before them? And the home of the Hereafter is best for those who fear Allah; then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: In smo poslali ni pred vami [kot kurirji] razen moških, komu smo pokazala med prebivalci mesta. Tako jih niso potoval skozi zemljo in opazovati, kako je bil konec tisti pred njimi? In dom v nadaljevanju je najboljša za tiste, ki se bojijo Allah; Nato boste ne razlog?

trans-unit.source: [They continued] until, when the messengers despaired and were certain that they had been denied, there came to them Our victory, and whoever We willed was saved. And Our punishment cannot be repelled from the people who are criminals.
trans-unit.target: [Še] do, ko sli obupal in so bili nekateri, da so imeli zavrnili, je prišel do njih naše zmage, in kdor smo volje, je bila shranjena. In naša kazen ne odganja od ljudi, ki so kriminalci.

trans-unit.source: There was certainly in their stories a lesson for those of understanding. Never was the Qur'an a narration invented, but a confirmation of what was before it and a detailed explanation of all things and guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Prišlo je zagotovo v svoje zgodbe lekcija za tiste razumevanja. Nikoli je bil Koran pripoved izmišljeno, vendar potrditev, kar je bilo pred to in podrobno razlago vseh stvari in smernice in milost za ljudi, ki verjamejo.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Meem, Ra. These are the verses of the Book; and what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Meem, Ra. To so verzi knjige; in kaj so pokazali, da ste od svojega Gospoda je resnica, vendar večina ljudi ne verjamejo.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who erected the heavens without pillars that you [can] see; then He established Himself above the Throne and made subject the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. He arranges [each] matter; He details the signs that you may, of the meeting with your Lord, be certain.
trans-unit.target: Je Allah, ki so ga postavili na nebu brez stebrov, ki vidite [lahko]; nato je uveljavil zgoraj prestol in podredi, sonce in luna, vsak teče svojo smer za določeno obdobje. Ureja [vsak] zadeva; Je podrobnosti, da si srečanja s svojega gospodarja, lahko nekatere znake.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who spread the earth and placed therein firmly set mountains and rivers; and from all of the fruits He made therein two mates; He causes the night to cover the day. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: In to je tisti, ki širijo zemlje in dajo v njej trdno nastavitev gore in reke; in od vseh sadežev naredil v njej dve častniki; On povzroča noč na dan. Res da so znaki za ljudi, ki bi mislil.

trans-unit.source: And within the land are neighboring plots and gardens of grapevines and crops and palm trees, [growing] several from a root or otherwise, watered with one water; but We make some of them exceed others in [quality of] fruit. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: In v deželi so sosednje parcele in vrtovi vinske trte in rastline in palme, [naraščajoče] več iz korenin ali drugače zaliti z eno vodo; vendar naredimo nekaj od njih presega druge v [kakovost] sadja. Res da so znaki za ljudi, ki so razlog.

trans-unit.source: And if you are astonished, [O Muhammad] - then astonishing is their saying, "When we are dust, will we indeed be [brought] into a new creation?" Those are the ones who have disbelieved in their Lord, and those will have shackles upon their necks, and those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: In če ste začuden, nato pa presenetljivo [O Muhammad] - je rekel, "ko smo prah, smo dejansko bodo [je] v nove stvaritve?" So tisti, ki so verjeli v svojega Gospoda, in tiste, ki imajo ravne na vratu in so tovariši ogenj; se bo upošteval v njem večno.

trans-unit.source: They impatiently urge you to bring about evil before good, while there has already occurred before them similar punishments [to what they demand]. And indeed, your Lord is full of forgiveness for the people despite their wrongdoing, and indeed, your Lord is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: Nestrpno pozivajo, da bi zlo pred dobro, medtem ko se je že pojavilo pred njimi podobne kazni [za kaj zahtevajo]. In res, vaš Gospod je poln odpuščanja za ljudi, ki kljub svoje kršitve, in res, vaš Gospod je hudo kazen.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" You are only a warner, and for every people is a guide.
trans-unit.target: In tisti, ki so verjeli pravijo, "Zakaj znak ni bil poslan mu iz svojega gospodarja?" Vi ste samo warner, in za vse ljudi je vodnik.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what every female carries and what the wombs lose [prematurely] or exceed. And everything with Him is by due measure.
trans-unit.target: Allah ve, kaj vsaka ženska nosi in kaj je wombs izgubijo [predčasno] ali presega. In vse, kar je z njim je z ustrezno ukrepa.

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted.
trans-unit.target: [Je] Poznavalec nevidno in je priča, Grand, na Exalted.

trans-unit.source: It is the same [to Him] concerning you whether one conceals [his] speech or one publicizes it and whether one is hidden by night or conspicuous [among others] by day.
trans-unit.target: To je enako [mu] o vas eden skriva [njegovi] govora ali eden publicizes in ali je skrit v noč ali vidno [med drugim] podnevi.

trans-unit.source: For each one are successive [angels] before and behind him who protect him by the decree of Allah. Indeed, Allah will not change the condition of a people until they change what is in themselves. And when Allah intends for a people ill, there is no repelling it. And there is not for them besides Him any patron.
trans-unit.target: Za vsako eno so zaporednih [angeli] pred in za njim, ki ga zaščititi z odlokom Allah. Res, Allah ne bo spremenilo stanje ljudi, dokler se spreminjajo, kar je v sami. In ko Allah namerava za ljudi, ki je bolan, je ne odbija. In ni za njih poleg njega vse pokrovitelj.

trans-unit.source: It is He who shows you lightening, [causing] fear and aspiration, and generates the heavy clouds.
trans-unit.target: To je tisti, ki vam pokaže, strela, [povzroča] strah in aspiracije, in ustvarja težki oblaki.

trans-unit.source: And the thunder exalts [Allah] with praise of Him - and the angels [as well] from fear of Him - and He sends thunderbolts and strikes therewith whom He wills while they dispute about Allah; and He is severe in assault.
trans-unit.target: Thunder vas povede [Alahove] z pohvale od njega - in angeli [tudi] iz strahu pred njim - in pošilja strele in stavke z njimi jim je oporok, medtem ko so spor o Allah; in on je hudo v napad.

trans-unit.source: To Him [alone] is the supplication of truth. And those they call upon besides Him do not respond to them with a thing, except as one who stretches his hands toward water [from afar, calling it] to reach his mouth, but it will not reach it [thus]. And the supplication of the disbelievers is not but in error [i.e. futility].
trans-unit.target: Mu [sam] je molitev resnico. In tisti, ki pozivajo, poleg njega se ne odzivajo nanje z stvar, razen kot tisti, ki se razteza roke proti vode [od daleč, ga kliče] dosežejo usta, vendar ga ne dosežejo [tako]. In molitev je disbelievers ni, ampak napake [tj jalovost].

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whoever is within the heavens and the earth, willingly or by compulsion, and their shadows [as well] in the mornings and the afternoons.
trans-unit.target: In v Allah prostrates, kdor je v nebesih in na zemlji, prostovoljno ali s prisilo in njihove sence [tudi] v jutranjih urah in popoldanskem času.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who is Lord of the heavens and earth?" Say, "Allah." Say, "Have you then taken besides Him allies not possessing [even] for themselves any benefit or any harm?" Say, "Is the blind equivalent to the seeing? Or is darkness equivalent to light? Or have they attributed to Allah partners who created like His creation so that the creation [of each] seemed similar to them?" Say, "Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the One, the Prevailing."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "Kdo je gospodar nebes in zemlje?" Reči, "Allah." Reči, "ste si nato vzeli poleg njega zavezniki, ne z [tudi] zase kakršne koli koristi ali škode?" Reči, "je enakovredna v videnje slepe? Ali znaša teme na svetlobo? Ali so jih pripiše Allah partnerji, ki je ustvaril kot njegovo ustvarjanje, da nastanek [vsakega] zdelo podobno z njimi?" Reči, "Alah je stvarnik vseh stvari, in on je eden, je Prevailing."

trans-unit.source: He sends down from the sky, rain, and valleys flow according to their capacity, and the torrent carries a rising foam. And from that [ore] which they heat in the fire, desiring adornments and utensils, is a foam like it. Thus Allah presents [the example of] truth and falsehood. As for the foam, it vanishes, [being] cast off; but as for that which benefits the people, it remains on the earth. Thus does Allah present examples.
trans-unit.target: Je poslal iz neba, dež in doline pretoka glede na njihovo kapaciteto, in torrent nosi naraščajoče pene. In iz tega [rude] ki so toplote v ognju, v želji okovom in pripomočki, je pena všeč. Tako Allah predstavlja [primer] resnico in laž. Kar se tiče pene, to izgine, [se] odpluli; ampak za tisto, kar koristi ljudem, ostaja na zemlji. Tako Allah predstavili primere.

trans-unit.source: For those who have responded to their Lord is the best [reward], but those who did not respond to Him - if they had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby. Those will have the worst account, and their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Za tiste, ki so se odzvali na svojega Gospoda je najboljši [nagrado], ampak tiste, ki se ni odzval na mu - če bi imeli vse, kar je na zemlji v celoti, in podobno je z njim, da bi [poskus] odkupnino sami s tem. Oni hoteti življati premagati račun, in svoje zatočišče je pekel in nesrečne je počivališče.

trans-unit.source: Then is he who knows that what has been revealed to you from your Lord is the truth like one who is blind? They will only be reminded who are people of understanding -
trans-unit.target: Potem je on, kdo ve, kaj se je pokazala za vas od svojega Gospoda je resnico, kot tisti, ki je slepa? Se bo le spomniti kdo so ljudje razumevanje-

trans-unit.source: Those who fulfill the covenant of Allah and do not break the contract,
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki izpolnjujejo zaveze Alah in ne prekinil pogodbo,

trans-unit.source: And those who join that which Allah has ordered to be joined and fear their Lord and are afraid of the evil of [their] account,
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki se pridružijo, ki Allah je odredila priključi in strah njihov gospodar in se bojijo zlo [njihovega] računa,

trans-unit.source: And those who are patient, seeking the countenance of their Lord, and establish prayer and spend from what We have provided for them secretly and publicly and prevent evil with good - those will have the good consequence of [this] home -
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki so bolnik, ki iščejo obličje svojega Gospoda, in vzpostaviti molitev in preživeti iz kaj damo za njih tajno in javno in preprečiti zlo z dobrim, - oni hoteti življati dober posledica [to] doma-

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence; they will enter them with whoever were righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their descendants. And the angels will enter upon them from every gate, [saying],
trans-unit.target: Vrtovi večne prebivališča; so jih vnese z kdo so bili pravični med svojih očetov, njihove zakonce in njihovi potomci. In angeli vnese na njih vsak vrata, [pravijo]

trans-unit.source: "Peace be upon you for what you patiently endured. And excellent is the final home."
trans-unit.target: "Mir se na vas za kaj ste potrpežljivo pretrpeli. In odličen je končno doma."

trans-unit.source: But those who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined and spread corruption on earth - for them is the curse, and they will have the worst home.
trans-unit.target: Ampak tiste, ki prekinil zveze Allah po to in ločiti to kar Allah je odredila priključi in širjenje korupcije na Zemlji - za njih je prekletstvo, in imajo najslabše doma.

trans-unit.source: Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. And they rejoice in the worldly life, while the worldly life is not, compared to the Hereafter, except [brief] enjoyment.
trans-unit.target: Allah razširja določbe, za katere je oporok in omejuje [je]. In se veselite se v posvetno življenje, medtem ko posvetno življenje ni, v primerjavi z v nadaljevanju, razen [kratka] užitek.

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved say, "Why has a sign not been sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, Allah leaves astray whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him] -
trans-unit.target: In tisti, ki so verjeli pravijo, "Zakaj znak ni bil poslan mu iz svojega gospodarja?" Reči, [O Muhammad], "res, Alah pušča zašel koga je oporok in vodila k sebi, kdor izkaže nazaj [da mu]-

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah. Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured."
trans-unit.target: Tiste, ki ste verjeli in katerih srca so zagotovljena z spomina Allah. Nedvomno, z spomina Allah srca prepričani."

trans-unit.source: Those who have believed and done righteous deeds - a good state is theirs and a good return.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki je verjel in naredil pravednici dejanja - dobrem stanju je njihov in dober donos.

trans-unit.source: Thus have We sent you to a community before which [other] communities have passed on so you might recite to them that which We revealed to you, while they disbelieve in the Most Merciful. Say, "He is my Lord; there is no deity except Him. Upon Him I rely, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: Tako so mi poslal v Skupnosti, pred katerim so opravili [druge] Skupnosti na tako bi recitiranjem nanje, ki mi je pokazala, da vas, medtem ko ti verjamem v najbolj usmiljen. Reči, "on je moj gospodar; ni nobene božanstva, razen njega. Na njem sem zanašati, in mu je moji vrnitvi."

trans-unit.source: And if there was any qur'an by which the mountains would be removed or the earth would be broken apart or the dead would be made to speak, [it would be this Qur'an], but to Allah belongs the affair entirely. Then have those who believed not accepted that had Allah willed, He would have guided the people, all of them? And those who disbelieve do not cease to be struck, for what they have done, by calamity - or it will descend near their home - until there comes the promise of Allah. Indeed, Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
trans-unit.target: In če ni bilo vse Koran, ki gore zbrisal ali Zemlje bi lomljenega narazen ali mrtvih bi treba govoriti, [bi bilo tej Qur'an], ampak da Allah spada aferi povsem. Potem tisti, ki so verjeli ne sprejeli, da had Allah voljan, on bi voditi ljudi, vse od njih? In tistim, ki verjamem temu, da udari, za kaj so storili, jih nesreča - ali ga spustimo blizu svojih domov -, dokler ne pride obljubo Allah. Res, Allah ne v [svojega] obljubo.

trans-unit.source: And already were [other] messengers ridiculed before you, and I extended the time of those who disbelieved; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.
trans-unit.target: In že so bili [druge] sli ridiculed pred vami, in sem podaljšal čas tistih, ki so verjeli; potem sem jih zasegli in kako [grozno] je bila moja kazen.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who is a maintainer of every soul, [knowing] what it has earned, [like any other]? But to Allah they have attributed partners. Say, "Name them. Or do you inform Him of that which He knows not upon the earth or of what is apparent of speech?" Rather, their [own] plan has been made attractive to those who disbelieve, and they have been averted from the way. And whomever Allah leaves astray - there will be for him no guide.
trans-unit.target: Potem je on, ki je vzdrževalec vsako dušo, [vedo] kaj je pridobil, [kot katera koli druga]? Vendar v Allah so razpisane partnerji. Reči, "njihovo ime. Ali delati obvestiti mu tisto, kar ve, ne na zemlji ali kaj je očitno govora?" Namesto, svoje [] načrt je postala zanimiva za tiste, ki verjamem, in so bili odvrniti s poti. In komurkoli Alah pušča zašel - ne bo zanj ni vodnik.

trans-unit.source: For them will be punishment in the life of [this] world, and the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe. And they will not have from Allah any protector.
trans-unit.target: Zanje bo kazen v življenju [ta] svet, in kazen v nadaljevanju je hujše. In ne bodo imeli od Allah vse zaščitnik.

trans-unit.source: The example of Paradise, which the righteous have been promised, is [that] beneath it rivers flow. Its fruit is lasting, and its shade. That is the consequence for the righteous, and the consequence for the disbelievers is the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Primer raj, ki pravedna so obljubili, [ki] je pod to tok reke. Sadje je trajno, in svojo senco. To je posledica za pravičnega, in posledice za na disbelievers je ogenj.

trans-unit.source: And [the believers among] those to whom We have given the [previous] Scripture rejoice at what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], but among the [opposing] factions are those who deny part of it. Say, "I have only been commanded to worship Allah and not associate [anything] with Him. To Him I invite, and to Him is my return."
trans-unit.target: In [verniki med] komu bomo danih [prejšnji] pismo veselil na kaj se je pokazala za vas, [O Muhammad], vendar med [nasprotne] frakcij so tisti, ki zanika del tega. Reči, "sem so le bili ukazal častili Allah in [nič] povezujejo z njim. Nanj vabim, in mu je moji vrnitvi."

trans-unit.source: And thus We have revealed it as an Arabic legislation. And if you should follow their inclinations after what has come to you of knowledge, you would not have against Allah any ally or any protector.
trans-unit.target: In tako smo so pokazale kot arabski zakonodaje. In če sledite svoje nagnjenja po kaj je prišel, da vam znanja, bi nimate zoper Alah vse zaveznik ali poljuben zaščitnik.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you and assigned to them wives and descendants. And it was not for a messenger to come with a sign except by permission of Allah. For every term is a decree.
trans-unit.target: In smo že pošlje glasniki pred vami in jih žene in potomci. In ni bilo za messenger dobiti z znakom, razen dovoljenja Allah. Za vsak izraz je odlok.

trans-unit.source: Allah eliminates what He wills or confirms, and with Him is the Mother of the Book.
trans-unit.target: Allah odpravlja kaj on hoče ali potrjuje, in z njim je mati knjige.

trans-unit.source: And whether We show you part of what We promise them or take you in death, upon you is only the [duty of] notification, and upon Us is the account.
trans-unit.target: In ali bomo pokazali del kaj obljubim jih ali ste vzeli na smrt, na vas je le [dajatve] obvestilo, in na nas je račun.

trans-unit.source: Have they not seen that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? And Allah decides; there is no adjuster of His decision. And He is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Oni ne videli, da smo se na kopnem, zmanjšanje od njenih meja? Ter Allah odloči; ni ni ureditelj svojo odločitev. In je hitro v račun.

trans-unit.source: And those before them had plotted, but to Allah belongs the plan entirely. He knows what every soul earns, and the disbelievers will know for whom is the final home.
trans-unit.target: In tiste, pred njimi je narisana, vendar Allah pripada načrt v celoti. Ve, da vsako dušo, kar zasluži in je disbelievers vedeli, za koga je končno doma.

trans-unit.source: And those who have disbelieved say, "You are not a messenger." Say, [O Muhammad], "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you, and [the witness of] whoever has knowledge of the Scripture."
trans-unit.target: In tisti, ki so verjeli pravijo, "Vi ste ne a sel." Recimo, [O Muhammad], "dovolj je Allah kot priča med jaz in ti, in [priča] kdor pozna Sveto pismo."

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. [This is] a Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that you might bring mankind out of darknesses into the light by permission of their Lord - to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy -
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra. [je] knjigo, ki smo pokazali vam, [O Muhammad], da morda bi človeštvo iz darknesses v svetlobo z dovoljenjem svojega Gospoda - pot Exalted v oblast, Praiseworthy -

trans-unit.source: Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And woe to the disbelievers from a severe punishment
trans-unit.target: Allah, komu pripada, karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji. In Oprosti za disbelievers iz huda kazen

trans-unit.source: The ones who prefer the worldly life over the Hereafter and avert [people] from the way of Allah, seeking to make it (seem) deviant. Those are in extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki raje posvetno življenje nad v nadaljevanju in preprečiti [ljudje] iz pot Allah, želijo, da bi to (se zdi) deviant. So v skrajno napake.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send any messenger except [speaking] in the language of his people to state clearly for them, and Allah sends astray [thereby] whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: In mi ni poslal vse sel razen [govoru] v jeziku svojega ljudstva država jasno zanje in Alah pošlje zašel [tako] ki je oporok in koga je oporok vodi. In on je Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent Moses with Our signs, [saying], "Bring out your people from darknesses into the light and remind them of the days of Allah." Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
trans-unit.target: In zagotovo smo poslali Moses z naše znake, [pravijo,] "Bring ven vaš narod z darknesses v light in jih opominjali na dni Allah." Res da so znaki za vsakogar bolnika in hvaležen.

trans-unit.source: And [recall, O Children of Israel], when Moses said to His people, "Remember the favor of Allah upon you when He saved you from the people of Pharaoh, who were afflicting you with the worst torment and were slaughtering your [newborn] sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord.
trans-unit.target: In [odpoklic, O otrok Izrael], ko Moses rekel svojemu ljudstvu, "se spomniš uslugo Allah na vas, ko je rešil iz ljudi Faraon, ki so bili spopada z najhujša muka in so zakol [novorojenčka] sinovi in ohranjajo svoje ženske. In v tem je velik preiskus iz svojega Gospoda.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe.' "
trans-unit.target: In zapomni [si] kdaj vaš gospod razglasili, "Če ste hvaležni, bo zagotovo vam poveča [v korist]; vendar če zanikaš, res, moja kazen je huda. " "

trans-unit.source: And Moses said, "If you should disbelieve, you and whoever is on the earth entirely - indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy."
trans-unit.target: In Moses je dejal, "če naj verjamem, ste, in kdor je na zemlji v celoti - pravzaprav Allah je brezplačno potrebe in Praiseworthy."

trans-unit.source: Has there not reached you the news of those before you - the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud and those after them? No one knows them but Allah. Their messengers brought them clear proofs, but they returned their hands to their mouths and said, "Indeed, we disbelieve in that with which you have been sent, and indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
trans-unit.target: Tam ni dosegel vam novice od tistih pred ti - ljudje Noah in "alarmna in Thamud, ter po njih? Nihče ne ve jih vendar Allah. Svoje glasnike prinesel jih jasno dokazila, vendar vrnil svoje roke v usta in reče: "Pravzaprav smo verjamem v to, s katero so bili poslani, in res smo, o tem na katerega povabite nas, v Uznemirujući dvoma."

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said, "Can there be doubt about Allah, Creator of the heavens and earth? He invites you that He may forgive you of your sins, and He delays your death for a specified term." They said, "You are not but men like us who wish to avert us from what our fathers were worshipping. So bring us a clear authority."
trans-unit.target: Svoje glasnike je dejal, "more biti dvoma o Allah, Stvarnika nebes in zemlje? On vabi, da je lahko vam svoje grehe odpusti, in on zamude vaše smrti za določeno dobo." So rekli, "niste ampak moški kot nas, ki želijo preprečiti nas od kar naši očetje so častili. Tako bi nam jasno organ."

trans-unit.source: Their messengers said to them, "We are only men like you, but Allah confers favor upon whom He wills of His servants. It has never been for us to bring you evidence except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Svoje glasnike jim reče: "mi smo samo ljudje kot si ti, vendar pa Allah daje uslugo na koga je oporok od njegovih uslužbencev. To je nikoli ni bilo za nas, da bi si dokaze, razen z dovoljenjem Allah. In na Alah naj bi se verniki.

trans-unit.source: And why should we not rely upon Allah while He has guided us to our [good] ways. And we will surely be patient against whatever harm you should cause us. And upon Allah let those who would rely [indeed] rely."
trans-unit.target: In zakaj smo ne zanašajte na Alah pa je nas vodi naše načine [dobro]. In zagotovo bomo bolnika proti ne glede na škodo je povzročil nas. In na Alah naj bi tiste, ki bi vedno [resnično] se."

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved said to their messengers, "We will surely drive you out of our land, or you must return to our religion." So their Lord inspired to them, "We will surely destroy the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki so verjeli dejal, da svoje glasnike, "mi bo zagotovo peljem iz naše zemlje, ali se mora vrniti k naše vere." Tako svojega Gospoda navdih za njih, "mi bo zagotovo uničila na wrongdoers.

trans-unit.source: And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position and fears My threat."
trans-unit.target: In bo smo zagotovo povzroči, da živijo v deželi po njih. To je za kdor boji moj položaju in boji moje grožnjo."

trans-unit.source: And they requested victory from Allah, and disappointed, [therefore], was every obstinate tyrant.
trans-unit.target: In so zahtevali zmago od Allah, ter razočaran, [zato], je bil vsak trmasto tiran.

trans-unit.source: Before him is Hell, and he will be given a drink of purulent water.
trans-unit.target: Pred njim je hudič, in bo treba dati pijačo Zagnojen vode.

trans-unit.source: He will gulp it but will hardly [be able to] swallow it. And death will come to him from everywhere, but he is not to die. And before him is a massive punishment.
trans-unit.target: On hoteti požirati to šele bo komaj [lahko] pogoltnili. In smrt bo nanj od vsepovsod, vendar je ne umreti. In preden ga je veliko kazen.

trans-unit.source: The example of those who disbelieve in their Lord is [that] their deeds are like ashes which the wind blows forcefully on a stormy day; they are unable [to keep] from what they earned a [single] thing. That is what is extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Na primer tistih, ki verjamem v njihovega gospodarja je [ki] njihovega dela, kot so pepel, ki je veter piha odločno nevihtni dan; ne moreta [da] od kar so zaslužili [eno] stvar. To je tisto, kar je skrajno napake.

trans-unit.source: Have you not seen that Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth? If He wills, He can do away with you and produce a new creation.
trans-unit.target: Ali niste opazili da je Allah ustvaril nebo in zemljo v resnici? Če on hoče, je lahko narediti stran z vami in proizvajajo nove stvaritve.

trans-unit.source: And that is not difficult for Allah.
trans-unit.target: In da ni težek zakaj Allah.

trans-unit.source: And they will come out [for judgement] before Allah all together, and the weak will say to those who were arrogant, "Indeed, we were your followers, so can you avail us anything against the punishment of Allah?" They will say, "If Allah had guided us, we would have guided you. It is all the same for us whether we show intolerance or are patient: there is for us no place of escape."
trans-unit.target: In bodo prišli ven [za sodbe] pred Allah vse skupaj, in šibke rekel tistim, ki so bili aroganten, "res, smo bili vaših privržencev, tako lahko boste izkoristili nas kaj proti kazen Allah?" Bodo rekli, "Če Allah je vodeni nas, smo bi jo vodi vas. Enako za nas je, ali smo pokazati nestrpnosti ali bolnik: je za nas ni prostora za izhod v sili. "

trans-unit.source: And Satan will say when the matter has been concluded, "Indeed, Allah had promised you the promise of truth. And I promised you, but I betrayed you. But I had no authority over you except that I invited you, and you responded to me. So do not blame me; but blame yourselves. I cannot be called to your aid, nor can you be called to my aid. Indeed, I deny your association of me [with Allah] before. Indeed, for the wrongdoers is a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: In Satan rekel, ko je bila sklenjena zadevo, "res, Allah je obljubil si obljubo resnice. In obljubil sem si, vendar sem vam izdal. Ampak sem imel nobenih pristojnosti nad vami, razen da sem vas povabil, in mi nisi odgovoril. Zato ne kriviti mene; vendar sami krivi. Sem ni mogoče klicati na pomoč, prav tako lahko se ti na mojo pomoč. Res, zanikam vaše pridružitvi me [Alahove] pred. Res, za v wrongdoers ni boleče kazni."

trans-unit.source: And those who believed and did righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow, abiding eternally therein by permission of their Lord; and their greeting therein will be, "Peace!"
trans-unit.target: In tisti, ki je verjel in naredil pravednici dejanja bo priznal Gardens pod kateri rek tok, upoštevanje večno v njem z dovoljenjem svojega Gospoda; in njihovega pozdrav v njem bo, "Mir!"

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, [making] a good word like a good tree, whose root is firmly fixed and its branches [high] in the sky?
trans-unit.target: Ste se ne šteje, kako Allah predstavlja primer, [ki] dobro besedo kot dobro drevo, katerega koren je trdno pritrjene in njene podružnice [visoki] v nebo?

trans-unit.source: It produces its fruit all the time, by permission of its Lord. And Allah presents examples for the people that perhaps they will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: To proizvaja sadje vseh časov, z dovoljenjem Lord. Ter Allah predstavlja primere za ljudi, da morda se bo spomnil.

trans-unit.source: And the example of a bad word is like a bad tree, uprooted from the surface of the earth, not having any stability.
trans-unit.target: In primer neprimerne besede kot slabo drevo, izkoreninjenemu od površine zemlje, ni vse stabilnost.

trans-unit.source: Allah keeps firm those who believe, with the firm word, in worldly life and in the Hereafter. And Allah sends astray the wrongdoers. And Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Allah ohranja trdno tiste, ki verjamejo, s trdno besedo, v posvetno življenje in v nadaljevanju. Ter Allah pošlje zašel v wrongdoers. In Allah ne, kar je oporok.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allah for disbelief and settled their people [in] the home of ruin?
trans-unit.target: Vi ne štejejo tiste, ki izmenjujejo uslugo Allah za nejeverno in naselili svoje ljudi [v] doma propada?

trans-unit.source: [It is] Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the settlement.
trans-unit.target: [Je] Pekel, ki jih bo [Vnesite da] zapisovanje in bedno je naselje.

trans-unit.source: And they have attributed to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for indeed, your destination is the Fire."
trans-unit.target: In oni so dodeljene Allah je enako zavaja [ljudje] iz poti. Reči, "Uživajte, za res, vaš cilj je ogenj."

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], tell My servants who have believed to establish prayer and spend from what We have provided them, secretly and publicly, before a Day comes in which there will be no exchange, nor any friendships.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], povej moji fantje kdo verjel vzpostaviti molitev in porabili od kar smo jim zagotovili, tajno in javno, preden pride na dan, v katerem bo brez izmenjave, niti kakršne koli prijateljstva.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who created the heavens and the earth and sent down rain from the sky and produced thereby some fruits as provision for you and subjected for you the ships to sail through the sea by His command and subjected for you the rivers.
trans-unit.target: To je Allah, ki ustvaril nebo in zemljo in poslan dež z neba in proizvaja kar nekaj sadja kot določba za vas in ste predmet ladje za plovbo po morju z njegovim poveljstvom in predmet ste rek.

trans-unit.source: And He subjected for you the sun and the moon, continuous [in orbit], and subjected for you the night and the day.
trans-unit.target: In je predmet za vas sonce in luna, stalno [v orbito], in predmet zate noč in dan.

trans-unit.source: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, mankind is [generally] most unjust and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: In on ti je dal od vseh vas vprašal njega. In Če šteješ bi uslugo od Allah, bi ne jih našteti. Res, človeštvo je [splošno] najbolj nepravičen in nehvaležno.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this city [Makkah] secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols.
trans-unit.target: In [omenja, O Muhammad], ko Abraham je rekel, "Moj Gospodar, da to mesto [Makkah] varno in da jaz in moji sinovi od čaščenjem malikov.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are [yet] Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Moj Gospod, res so pripeljale zašel veliko med ljudmi. Torej kdor sledi me - potem pa je od mene; in kdor ne poslušaj me - dejansko si še [] tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, I have settled some of my descendants in an uncultivated valley near Your sacred House, our Lord, that they may establish prayer. So make hearts among the people incline toward them and provide for them from the fruits that they might be grateful.
trans-unit.target: Naš Gospod so naselili nekateri moji potomci v neobdelanih dolini v bližini vaše svete hiše, našem Gospodu, da ustanovijo lahko molitev. Tako bo srce med ljudi naklon proti njim in zagotoviti zanje iz sadja, da bi bil hvaležen.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, indeed You know what we conceal and what we declare, and nothing is hidden from Allah on the earth or in the heaven.
trans-unit.target: Naš Gospod, res veš kaj mi prikriva in kaj izjavljamo, in nič ni skrito od Allah, na zemlji ali v nebeško.

trans-unit.source: Praise to Allah, who has granted to me in old age Ishmael and Isaac. Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.
trans-unit.target: Hvalite Alah, ki je odobreno v starosti Jišmael in Izak. Pravzaprav, moj gospodar je poslušalca molitev.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
trans-unit.target: Moj Gospod, naredi me ustanovitelj molitve, in [veliko] iz moje potomce. Našega Gospoda, in sprejeti mojo molitev.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established."
trans-unit.target: Našega Gospoda, odpusti mi in moji starši in verniki dan račun vzpostavljena."

trans-unit.source: And never think that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them for a Day when eyes will stare [in horror].
trans-unit.target: In nikoli ne mislim, da je vedela, kaj je wrongdoers Allah. Je le zamude za dan, ko bodo stare oči [v grozo].

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not come back to them, and their hearts are void.
trans-unit.target: Dirke naprej, njihove glave, dviguje, svoj pogled pridejo nazaj na njih, in njihova srca so neveljavne.

trans-unit.source: And, [O Muhammad], warn the people of a Day when the punishment will come to them and those who did wrong will say, "Our Lord, delay us for a short term; we will answer Your call and follow the messengers." [But it will be said], "Had you not sworn, before, that for you there would be no cessation?
trans-unit.target: In [O Muhammad], opozarja ljudi na dan, ko kazen bo prišel do njih in tiste, ki narobe bo rekel, "Naš Gospod, zavlačevanje nas za kratek čas; bomo odgovoriti na vaš klic in sledite sli." [Ampak to je dejal], "vam ne pod prisego, prej, da za vas ne bi bilo brez prenehanja?

trans-unit.source: And you lived among the dwellings of those who wronged themselves, and it had become clear to you how We dealt with them. And We presented for you [many] examples."
trans-unit.target: In ste živeli med stanovanja tistih, ki se je zgodila krivica, in je postalo jasno, da vas kako smo se ukvarjali z njimi. In predstavili smo za vas [veliko] primeri. «

trans-unit.source: And they had planned their plan, but with Allah is [recorded] their plan, even if their plan had been [sufficient] to do away with the mountains.
trans-unit.target: In so imeli načrtovano njihov načrt, vendar z Allah [zapiše] njihov načrt, tudi če je bil njihov načrt [zadosten] narediti stran z gore.

trans-unit.source: So never think that Allah will fail in His promise to His messengers. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution.
trans-unit.target: Tako nikoli ne pomislim, da bo Alah ne v svojo obljubo za njegovo sli. Res, Allah je vzvišeno v lahko in lastnika maščevanja.

trans-unit.source: [It will be] on the Day the earth will be replaced by another earth, and the heavens [as well], and all creatures will come out before Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: [Bo] dan zemlje bodo nadomestili drugi zemlje in nebes [tudi], in vseh bitij prišel ven pred Allah, eno, na Prevailing.

trans-unit.source: And you will see the criminals that Day bound together in shackles,
trans-unit.target: In boste videli kriminalci, ki dan vezani skupaj v verige,

trans-unit.source: Their garments of liquid pitch and their faces covered by the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Svojih oblačil tekoče smole in njihove obraze, zajete v požaru.

trans-unit.source: So that Allah will recompense every soul for what it earned. Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: Tako da Alah bo zaracunati vsako dušo za kaj zaslužil. Res, Allah je hitro v račun.

trans-unit.source: This [Qur'an] is notification for the people that they may be warned thereby and that they may know that He is but one God and that those of understanding will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Ta [Qur'an] je obvestilo za ljudi, ki so lahko opozorjeni s tem in ki morda vedo, da je pa en Bog in da so razumevanje bo spomnil.

trans-unit.source: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Alif, Lam, Ra. To so verzi knjige in jasno Koran.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
trans-unit.target: Tistim, ki verjamem bo morda želijo, da so bili muslimani.

trans-unit.source: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Naj jim jesti in uživali in preusmerjeni z [lažno] upanje, za gredo vedeti.

trans-unit.source: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
trans-unit.target: In smo ni ukazal uničiti vsako mesto, ampak za to je bil znan odlok.

trans-unit.source: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
trans-unit.target: Nobenega naroda bo pred svoj mandat, niti bo ostanejo zatem.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
trans-unit.target: In pravijo, "O vas, na katero je bilo poslano sporočilo, res ste nori.

trans-unit.source: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
trans-unit.target: Zakaj vam ne prinašajo nam angeli, če bi morala biti med resnične?"

trans-unit.source: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Mi ne pošiljajo navzdol angeli razen z resnico; in na disbelievers bi ne potem je reprieved.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
trans-unit.target: Res, da je smo, ki pošlje po Koranu in res, bomo svoje varuh.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo poslala [sli] pred vami, [O Muhammad], med sekte nekdanji narodi.

trans-unit.source: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
trans-unit.target: In ni sel bi se z njimi, razen, da so mu tarča posmeha.

trans-unit.source: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
trans-unit.target: Tako smo vstavite zavrnitev v srcih kriminalci.

trans-unit.source: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
trans-unit.target: Ne boste verjeli v to, medtem ko pa je že prišlo do precedens nekdanji narodi.

trans-unit.source: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
trans-unit.target: In [tudi], če smo odprli za njih vrata iz nebes in so v njej še dvigne,

trans-unit.source: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Kot pravijo, "naše oči so bile samo očarala. Namesto tega smo ljudi, prizadetih zaradi magije."

trans-unit.source: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
trans-unit.target: In smo postavili v nebesih velike zvezde in Uljepšan za opazovalce.

trans-unit.source: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
trans-unit.target: In smo so zaščitene pred vsak hudič, izgnani [iz usmiljenja Allah]

trans-unit.source: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
trans-unit.target: Razen enega, ki ukrade zaslišanje in izvajajo jasno kurjenje ognja.

trans-unit.source: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
trans-unit.target: In zemlje - smo imeli namažemo in oddanih v njej trdno nastavljen gora in povzroča v njej rastejo [nekaj] vsako stvar, ki dobro uravnotežena.

trans-unit.source: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
trans-unit.target: In smo naredili za vas v tem način življenja in [za] tiste, za katere niste ponudniki.

trans-unit.source: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
trans-unit.target: In ni stvar ampak pri nas so svoje depozitarji, in mi ne pošlje razen po znanih ukrep.

trans-unit.source: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
trans-unit.target: In smo poslali gnojilno vetrovi in poslan vodo z neba in pijete iz nje. In vi ste ne svoj retainers.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
trans-unit.target: In res, je smo, ki daje življenje in vzrok smrti, in smo se dediču.

trans-unit.source: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
trans-unit.target: In smo že znani prejšnjih [generacijah] med vami, in smo že znano kasneje [tiste dobiti].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
trans-unit.target: In res, vaš gospod severovzhodnega Atlantika dejansko je pametno in poznavanje.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: In ustvarjamo si gotovo človek iz gline s spremenjeno črno blato.

trans-unit.source: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
trans-unit.target: In jinn, smo ustvarili pred iz Užasna ogenj.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
trans-unit.target: In [omenja, O Muhammad], ko svojega Gospoda rekel, angele, "bo ustvaril človeka iz gline s spremenjeno črno blato.

trans-unit.source: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: In ko so mu razmerij in dihala v njem moje [ustvaril] duše, potem pade dol z njim v izčrpanost."

trans-unit.source: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
trans-unit.target: Tako angeli prostrated - vse od njih v celoti,

trans-unit.source: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
trans-unit.target: Razen Iblees, je zavrnil, da se s tistimi, ki prostrated.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
trans-unit.target: [Alahove] je dejal, O Iblees, kaj je [vprašanje] z vami, da ste ne s tistimi, ki se Povaljen?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
trans-unit.target: On reče: "Nikoli ne bi jaz prostracije ljudi, ki ste ga ustvarili iz gline s spremenjeno črno blato."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
trans-unit.target: [Alahove] je dejal, "potem ven, za dejansko, so izključeni.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: In res, na vas je prekletstvo do dan zaracunati."

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: On reče: "Moj Gospodar, nato reprieve mi do dneva so vstali."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
trans-unit.target: [Alahove] je dejal, "tako res, vi ste od tistih prejetjem

trans-unit.source: Until the Day of the time well-known."
trans-unit.target: Do dneva znanih čas."

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] je dejal, "Moj Gospodar, ker si me dal v zmoti, jaz hoteti zares izdelovanje [neposlušnosti] privlačne na zemlji, in bo zavaja vse

trans-unit.source: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
trans-unit.target: Razen, med njimi, vaše izbrane uslužbencev."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
trans-unit.target: [Alahove] je dejal, "to je pot [donosa] mi [ki je] naravnost.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
trans-unit.target: Res, moje uslužbencev - organ ne bo vam so nad njimi, razen tistih, ki si je deviators sledijo.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
trans-unit.target: In res, hudič je obljubljeno mesto za vse.

trans-unit.source: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
trans-unit.target: Ima sedem vrata; za vsakih vrat je od njih določen del."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
trans-unit.target: Res, pravični bo v vrtovih in vzmeti.

trans-unit.source: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
trans-unit.target: [Ob povedal], "vnesti v miru, [in varen]."

trans-unit.source: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
trans-unit.target: In mi bo odpravila karkoli je v svojih prsi zamere, [tako bodo] bratje, na prestolov, obrnjena drug proti drugemu.

trans-unit.source: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
trans-unit.target: Nobene utrujenosti bo dotik jih v njem, niti iz nje bo jih [kdaj] odstranite.

trans-unit.source: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
trans-unit.target: [O Muhammad], uslužbencev obvesti, da je sem, kdo sem tolerantna, usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: In da je moja kazen, ki je boleče kaznovanje.

trans-unit.source: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
trans-unit.target: In jih obvesti o goste Abraham,

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
trans-unit.target: Ko vnesete na njem in reče: "Mir." [Abraham] je rekel, "Res, smo prestrašeni od vas."

trans-unit.source: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
trans-unit.target: [Angeli] je dejal, "ne boj se. Pravzaprav, smo vam dobrih novic naučil fanta."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
trans-unit.target: On reče: "si mi dal dobrih novic čeprav starosti je prišel na mene? Torej za kaj [čudno] se vam obvesti? "

trans-unit.source: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
trans-unit.target: Pa reče: "Mi smo vam daje dobrih novic v resnico, tako da ne biti je obupano."

trans-unit.source: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
trans-unit.target: Je dejal, "in ki despairs usmiljenja svojega Gospoda, razen tistih, ki so zašel?"

trans-unit.source: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
trans-unit.target: [Abraham] je dejal, "potem kaj je vaš business [tukaj], O sli?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
trans-unit.target: So rekli, "res, mi življati been sent v ljudi storilcev kaznivih dejanj,

trans-unit.source: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
trans-unit.target: Razen družino veliko; res, bomo shranili vse

trans-unit.source: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
trans-unit.target: Razen ženo." Allah je odredil, da je tistih, ki ostanejo zadaj.

trans-unit.source: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
trans-unit.target: In ko sli prišel v družino veliko,

trans-unit.source: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
trans-unit.target: On reče: »Res, ste ljudi neznana. «

trans-unit.source: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
trans-unit.target: So rekli, "ampak smo prišli do vas s tem, o katerih so bili izpodbijanje,

trans-unit.source: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
trans-unit.target: In smo prišli do vas z resnico, in res, smo resnični.

trans-unit.source: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
trans-unit.target: Tako določena s svojo družino med del noči in sledite za njimi in naj ni kdo med vami pogled nazaj in še na kjer so ukazal."

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
trans-unit.target: In smo mu [dekreta] to zadevo prepeljati: da te [grešnike] bi bila odpravljena s zgodaj zjutraj.

trans-unit.source: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
trans-unit.target: In ljudje iz mesta prišel veselje.

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
trans-unit.target: [Veliko] je dejal, "res, to so moje goste, tako ni me sram.

trans-unit.source: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
trans-unit.target: In strah Alah in ne Blamaža me."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
trans-unit.target: So rekli, "so mi ni prepovedano ste iz [varstvo] ljudi?"

trans-unit.source: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
trans-unit.target: [Veliko] je dejal, "To so moje hčerke - če bi bilo kršitelje [od zakonite poroke]."

trans-unit.source: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
trans-unit.target: S svojim življenjem, [O Muhammad], res so bili, v svoje zastrupitve, tava slepo.

trans-unit.source: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Tako Vrištati zaseženo njimi ob sončnem vzhodu.

trans-unit.source: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
trans-unit.target: In smo na najvišji del [mesto], najnižji in rained na njih kamni trde gline.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
trans-unit.target: Res da so znaki za tiste, ki zaznati.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
trans-unit.target: In res, teh mestih so [] na določene ceste.

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
trans-unit.target: Res da je znak za z vernike.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: In tovariši iz goščave [tudi] wrongdoers.

trans-unit.source: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
trans-unit.target: Tako smo maščevanjem iz njih, in res, obe [mesta] so na jasno avtocesti.

trans-unit.source: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
trans-unit.target: In zagotovo tovariši Thamud zanikati sli.

trans-unit.source: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
trans-unit.target: In smo jim dali naše znake, vendar od njih so bili obrnil stran.

trans-unit.source: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
trans-unit.target: In uporabljajo, da bi si iz gore, hiše, popolnoma varni.

trans-unit.source: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
trans-unit.target: Vendar Vrištati zaseženo njimi v zgodnjih jutranjih urah.

trans-unit.source: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Torej nič jih ni [od] kar se uporabljajo za zaslužiti.

trans-unit.source: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
trans-unit.target: In mi ni ustvaril nebo in zemljo in med njih, razen v resnici. In res, uro prihaja; tako odpusti z milostiv odpuščanje.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
trans-unit.target: Res, gospod - on je stvarnik vedo.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo dal, [O Muhammad], sedem mnogokraten [verzi] in veliko Koranu.

trans-unit.source: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
trans-unit.target: Oči proti, ki ki smo dali užitek za [določene] kategorije je disbelievers, in ne žalujejo nad njimi ne razširi. In nižje vaš krilo z vernike

trans-unit.source: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
trans-unit.target: In reče: "Pravzaprav, sem jasno warner"-

trans-unit.source: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
trans-unit.target: Tako kot mi je pokazala [pisave] ločila

trans-unit.source: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
trans-unit.target: Ki so se v Koranu na dele.

trans-unit.source: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
trans-unit.target: Tako s svojega gospodarja, mi bo zagotovo vprašanje vse

trans-unit.source: About what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: O kaj se uporabljajo za početi.

trans-unit.source: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
trans-unit.target: Nato ugotovi, kaj naroča in pa od je politeiste.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
trans-unit.target: Dejansko smo dovolj za vas proti je mockers

trans-unit.source: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Ki bi [enako] s Allah druga božanstvo. Vendar gredo vedeti.

trans-unit.source: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
trans-unit.target: In že vemo, da vaše prsi ovirajo kar pravijo.

trans-unit.source: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
trans-unit.target: Tako poveličujejo [Alahove] s hvalo svojega gospodarja in so tisti, ki se Povaljen [nanj].

trans-unit.source: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
trans-unit.target: In častili svojega Gospoda, dokler ne pride do vas varnost (smrt).

trans-unit.source: The command of Allah is coming, so be not impatient for it. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Ukaz Allah prihaja, tako ne bodite nestrpni zanjo. Vzvišeno je on in visoko nad kaj povezujejo z njim.

trans-unit.source: He sends down the angels, with the inspiration of His command, upon whom He wills of His servants, [telling them], "Warn that there is no deity except Me; so fear Me."
trans-unit.target: On pošlje, angeli, z navdihom njegov ukaz, na katero je oporok njegova uslužbencev, [jim povedal], "opozori da je nobene božanstva, razen mene; tako strah me"

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth. High is He above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: V resnici je ustvaril nebo in zemljo. Visoko je nad kaj povezujejo z njim.

trans-unit.source: He created man from a sperm-drop; then at once, he is a clear adversary.
trans-unit.target: Je ustvaril človeka iz sperme-padec; potem naenkrat, je jasno nasprotnika.

trans-unit.source: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: In pašne živine, ki je ustvaril za vas; v njih je toplino in koristi [številne], in od njih jeste.

trans-unit.source: And for you in them is [the enjoyment of] beauty when you bring them in [for the evening] and when you send them out [to pasture].
trans-unit.target: In za vas v njih je [uživanje] lepoto, ko bi jih v [večer] in kdaj ste jih poslali [v pašnik].

trans-unit.source: And they carry your loads to a land you could not have reached except with difficulty to yourselves. Indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: In nosijo svoje obremenitve zemljišč, boste lahko dosegli ne razen težko na sebe. Res, vaš Gospod je prijazen in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And [He created] the horses, mules and donkeys for you to ride and [as] adornment. And He creates that which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: In [je ustvaril] konji, mulami in osli za vas za vožnjo in [kot] okras. In ustvarja tisto, kar ne veste.

trans-unit.source: And upon Allah is the direction of the [right] way, and among the various paths are those deviating. And if He willed, He could have guided you all.
trans-unit.target: In od Allah je smer [desno] način in med različne poti so odstopanja. In če je volje, je lahko so vodene vse.

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it is foliage in which you pasture [animals].
trans-unit.target: Je bil kdo pošlje navzdol dež z neba; iz je pijačo in iz nje je listje, kjer si pašniki [živali].

trans-unit.source: He causes to grow for you thereby the crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and from all the fruits. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: On povzroča vzgojiti za vas s tem pridelkov, olive, palmovih dreves, trte, in iz vseh sadja. Res da je znak za ljudi, ki dajejo misli.

trans-unit.source: And He has subjected for you the night and day and the sun and moon, and the stars are subjected by His command. Indeed in that are signs for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: In on je opravljen za vas, noč in dan in sonce in luna in zvezde se opravi z njegovim poveljstvom. Res da so znaki za ljudi, ki so razlog.

trans-unit.source: And [He has subjected] whatever He multiplied for you on the earth of varying colors. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who remember.
trans-unit.target: In [bil je] kar je pomnoženo zate na zemlji različnih barv. Res da je znak za ljudi, ki se spomnite.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who subjected the sea for you to eat from it tender meat and to extract from it ornaments which you wear. And you see the ships plowing through it, and [He subjected it] that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
trans-unit.target: In to je on, ki izpostavljene morja za vas jesti od njega razpisa mesa in za izpisek iz njega okraski, ki jih nosite. In vidite, ladje, Oranje skozi to, in [on izpostavljeni to] da lahko iščeš svoje radodarnosti; in morda vam bo hvaležen.

trans-unit.source: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided,
trans-unit.target: In on je oddanih v zemljo trdno nastavljen gora, da ne premik z vami, in [je], rek in cest, da boste lahko vodijo,

trans-unit.source: And landmarks. And by the stars they are [also] guided.
trans-unit.target: In mejnike. In z zvezd so [tudi] vodijo.

trans-unit.source: Then is He who creates like one who does not create? So will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Potem je on, ki ustvarja kot tisti, ki ne ustvarja? Tako bo vam ne bi spomnil?

trans-unit.source: And if you should count the favors of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: In če bi bilo prešteti uslug Allah, bi ne jih našteti. Res, Allah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you declare.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah ve, kaj vam prikriva in kaj deklarirate.

trans-unit.source: And those they invoke other than Allah create nothing, and they [themselves] are created.
trans-unit.target: In tiste uveljavljajo razen Allah ustvariti nič, in so ustvarjene [sami].

trans-unit.source: They are, [in fact], dead, not alive, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: So, [resnično], mrtva, ne živi, in ne zaznavajo, kdaj se bo vstali.

trans-unit.source: Your god is one God. But those who do not believe in the Hereafter - their hearts are disapproving, and they are arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Vaš Bog je eden Bog. Ampak tiste, ki ne verjamejo v nadaljevanju - njihova srca so neodobravanje, in oni so predrznosr.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, Allah knows what they conceal and what they declare. Indeed, He does not like the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Prav gotovo Allah ve, kar skrijejo in kaj so razglasi. Res, on kot aroganten.

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples,"
trans-unit.target: In ko je dejal, da jih, "kaj je vaš gospodar poslal?" Pravijo, "Legende nekdanji narodi"

trans-unit.source: That they may bear their own burdens in full on the Day of Resurrection and some of the burdens of those whom they misguide without knowledge. Unquestionably, evil is that which they bear.
trans-unit.target: Da lahko nosijo svoje obremenitve v celoti na dan od vstajenje in nekaj obremenitev od tiste, ki so Obmanjivati brez znanja. Nedvomno, zlo je, ki jih nosi.

trans-unit.source: Those before them had already plotted, but Allah came at their building from the foundations, so the roof fell upon them from above them, and the punishment came to them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Pred njih so že narisane, vendar Allah prišli v gradnji temeljev, tako streho padel na njih od zgoraj jih, in kazen prišli do njih kjer jih ni dojemal.

trans-unit.source: Then on the Day of Resurrection He will disgrace them and say, "Where are My 'partners' for whom you used to oppose [the believers]?" Those who were given knowledge will say, "Indeed disgrace, this Day, and evil are upon the disbelievers" -
trans-unit.target: Nato na vstajenja dan on bo Blamaža jih in reči, "Kje so moje"partnerji"za koga ste vajeni nasprotujejo [verniki]?" Tiste, ki so imele znanja bo rekel, "Res sramota, ta dan, in zlo uprte v disbelievers"-

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death [while] wronging themselves, and [who] then offer submission, [saying], "We were not doing any evil." But, yes! Indeed, Allah is Knowing of what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, katerim angeli se v smrt [pa] wronging sami, in [ki] nato ponujajo oddajo, [pravijo,] "Ne delamo zlo." Ampak, ja! Res, Allah je poznavanje o kaj je za narediti.

trans-unit.source: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Zato vnesite vrata pekla spoštovati večno tam, in kako bedno je prebivališče aroganten.

trans-unit.source: And it will be said to those who feared Allah, "What did your Lord send down?" They will say, "[That which is] good." For those who do good in this world is good; and the home of the Hereafter is better. And how excellent is the home of the righteous -
trans-unit.target: In to bo rekel tistim, ki so se Bali Allah, "Kaj je vaš gospod spodbuda?" Bodo rekli, "[ki je] dobro." Zakaj oni kdo delati dobro v tem svetu je dober; in dom v nadaljevanju je bolje. In kako odlično je dom pravičnih-

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence, which they will enter, beneath which rivers flow. They will have therein whatever they wish. Thus does Allah reward the righteous -
trans-unit.target: Vrtovi večne prebivališča, ki se bo začela, pod katero tok reke. Bo imajo v tem, kar želijo. Tako Allah nagrado pravičnih -

trans-unit.source: The ones whom the angels take in death, [being] good and pure; [the angels] will say, "Peace be upon you. Enter Paradise for what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki angeli se v smrt, [se] dobro in čisto; [angeli] rekel, "mir se na vas. Vnesite raj, za kaj je za narediti."

trans-unit.source: Do the disbelievers await [anything] except that the angels should come to them or there comes the command of your Lord? Thus did those do before them. And Allah wronged them not, but they had been wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: Ali je disbelievers čakajo [nič], razen, da angeli naj se jim ali pride ukaz svojega gospodarja? Tako tiste, ki se pred njimi. In Alah jih oškodovani ni, vendar je bil wronging sami.

trans-unit.source: So they were struck by the evil consequences of what they did and were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: Tako so bili udari z zlo posledice kaj storil in so ovojnico s kar se uporabljajo za zasmehovanje.

trans-unit.source: And those who associate others with Allah say, "If Allah had willed, we would not have worshipped anything other than Him, neither we nor our fathers, nor would we have forbidden anything through other than Him." Thus did those do before them. So is there upon the messengers except [the duty of] clear notification?
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki drugim povezujejo z Allah pravijo, "če je Allah volje, bi mi ne častili karkoli razen njega, niti mi niti naši očetje, niti bi mi kaj preko drugega kot mu prepovedana." Tako tiste, ki se pred njimi. Torej obstaja na glasniki razen [dolžnost] jasno obvestilo?

trans-unit.source: And We certainly sent into every nation a messenger, [saying], "Worship Allah and avoid Taghut." And among them were those whom Allah guided, and among them were those upon whom error was [deservedly] decreed. So proceed through the earth and observe how was the end of the deniers.
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo poslal v vsak narod sel, [pravijo,] "Allah čaščenja in se izognili Taghut." Med njimi so bile tiste, katerih Allah vodeni in med njimi so bili tisti na katere napake [zasluženo] predpisala. Tako nadaljujemo skozi zemljo in opazovati, kako je bil konec bi deniers.

trans-unit.source: [Even] if you should strive for their guidance, [O Muhammad], indeed, Allah does not guide those He sends astray, and they will have no helpers.
trans-unit.target: [Tudi] Če si morajo prizadevati za njihovo vodenje, [O Muhammad], res, Allah ne vodijo tiste pošilja zašel, in bodo imeli pomočnikov ni.

trans-unit.source: And they swear by Allah their strongest oaths [that] Allah will not resurrect one who dies. But yes - [it is] a true promise [binding] upon Him, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: In jih prisegajo Allah svoje najmočnejše prisega, [ki] Allah ne bo obudila tisti, ki umre. Ampak ja - [je] res obljubo [zavezujoč] na njega, vendar je večina ljudi ne vem.

trans-unit.source: [It is] so He will make clear to them [the truth of] that wherein they differ and so those who have disbelieved may know that they were liars.
trans-unit.target: [Je] da bo jasno, da jih [resnico] se da pri čemer se razlikujejo in tako tiste, ki so verjeli lahko vedeli, da so lažnivci.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Our word to a thing when We intend it is but that We say to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Res, naše besede, da stvar, ko želimo, da je vendar, da smo rekli, "biti", in je.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for [the cause of] Allah after they had been wronged - We will surely settle them in this world in a good place; but the reward of the Hereafter is greater, if only they could know.
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki so se izselili za [vzrok] Allah, ko jim je bila storjena krivica - rešujemo jih bo zagotovo v tem svetu na pravem mestu; ampak nagrada v nadaljevanju je večja, če bi le lahko vedo.

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who endured patiently and upon their Lord relied.
trans-unit.target: [So] tisti, ki je pretrpel, potrpežljivo in na svojega Gospoda reliefno izbočeno delo.

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you except men to whom We revealed [Our message]. So ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: In smo poslali ni pred vami, razen moških, za katere smo razkrili naše sporočilo. Torej prosim ljudi sporočila, če ne veste.

trans-unit.source: [We sent them] with clear proofs and written ordinances. And We revealed to you the message that you may make clear to the people what was sent down to them and that they might give thought.
trans-unit.target: [Smo jih poslali] z jasno dokazila in pisni odlokov. In mi pokazala, da vas sporočilo, da boste lahko jasno ljudem kaj je bil poslan z njimi in da bi dal misli.

trans-unit.source: Then, do those who have planned evil deeds feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them or that the punishment will not come upon them from where they do not perceive?
trans-unit.target: Nato, ali tiste, ki so načrtovali zla dejanja počutijo varne, da Allah ne bo povzročilo zemlje pogoltniti njih ali da kazen ne bo prišel na njih od kjer ne dojemajo?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them during their [usual] activity, and they could not cause failure?
trans-unit.target: Ali da bi ne izkoristijo jih med [ponavadi] navedlo, in jih lahko ne povzroči okvare?

trans-unit.source: Or that He would not seize them gradually [in a state of dread]? But indeed, your Lord is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Ali da je ne bi izkoristili jih postopoma [stanju groze]? Ampak res, vaš Gospod je prijazen in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Have they not considered what things Allah has created? Their shadows incline to the right and to the left, prostrating to Allah, while they are humble.
trans-unit.target: Se ne šteje, kaj stvari je Allah ustvaril? Njihove sence Nagnite v desno in levo, prostrating v Allah, medtem ko so skromno.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah prostrates whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of creatures, and the angels [as well], and they are not arrogant.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah prostrates karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji bitja, in angeli [tudi], ter oni so ne aroganten.

trans-unit.source: They fear their Lord above them, and they do what they are commanded.
trans-unit.target: Se bojijo svojega Gospoda nad njimi, in ne, kaj so ukazal.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has said, "Do not take for yourselves two deities. He is but one God, so fear only Me."
trans-unit.target: In Alah je dejal, "ne jemljite za sebe dva božanstva. Je pa en Bog, tako strah samo mi."

trans-unit.source: And to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him is [due] worship constantly. Then is it other than Allah that you fear?
trans-unit.target: In mu pripada karkoli je v nebesih in na zemlji, in mu zapade [] častili nenehno. Potem je razen Allah, ki vas je strah?

trans-unit.source: And whatever you have of favor - it is from Allah. Then when adversity touches you, to Him you cry for help.
trans-unit.target: In karkoli imate korist - to je od Allah. Potem ko stisko dotakne, da mu boste jokal za pomoč.

trans-unit.source: Then when He removes the adversity from you, at once a party of you associates others with their Lord
trans-unit.target: Potem ko se on odpravlja na stisko od vas, naenkrat stranka od vas poveže drugi s svojega Gospoda

trans-unit.source: So they will deny what We have given them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Tako jih zanikati, kaj smo jih dali. Potem uživajte, za boš vedel.

trans-unit.source: And they assign to what they do not know a portion of that which We have provided them. By Allah, you will surely be questioned about what you used to invent.
trans-unit.target: In jih dodeliti kaj vedo, del, ki jih damo. Z Allah, zagotovo se dvomil o tem, kaj ste jo izmislil.

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah daughters - exalted is He - and for them is what they desire.
trans-unit.target: In jih pripisujejo Allah hčere - vzvišeno je - in za njih je tisto, kar želijo.

trans-unit.source: And when one of them is informed of [the birth of] a female, his face becomes dark, and he suppresses grief.
trans-unit.target: In ko je eden od njih je obveščen [rojstva] psico, njegov obraz postane temno, in on zavira žalosti.

trans-unit.source: He hides himself from the people because of the ill of which he has been informed. Should he keep it in humiliation or bury it in the ground? Unquestionably, evil is what they decide.
trans-unit.target: On sam skriva od ljudi zaradi bolezni, ki mu je bil obveščen. Naj ostane v poniževanje ali zakopati v zemljo? Nedvomno, zlo je, kaj se odločijo.

trans-unit.source: For those who do not believe in the Hereafter is the description of evil; and for Allah is the highest attribute. And He is Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Za tiste, ki ne verjamejo v nadaljevanju je opis zlo; in zakaj Allah je najvišje atributa. In on je vzvišeno v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah were to impose blame on the people for their wrongdoing, He would not have left upon the earth any creature, but He defers them for a specified term. And when their term has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it].
trans-unit.target: In če Allah nalagajo krivdo na ljudi za svoje kršitve, bi ne odšel na zemlji vsako bitje, ampak on jim prepušča za določeno obdobje. In ko je prišel njihov mandat, ne bo ostalo za eno uro, niti so sledi [je].

trans-unit.source: And they attribute to Allah that which they dislike, and their tongues assert the lie that they will have the best [from Him]. Assuredly, they will have the Fire, and they will be [therein] neglected.
