trans-unit.target: In jih pripisujejo Allah, da ki jih ne marajo, in njihovi jeziki trdijo laž, da bodo imeli najboljše [od njega]. Prav gotovo bodo imeli ogenj, in bo [njej] zapostavljene.

trans-unit.source: By Allah, We did certainly send [messengers] to nations before you, but Satan made their deeds attractive to them. And he is the disbelievers' ally today [as well], and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Allah, si zagotovo pošljemo [sli] narodov pred vami, ampak Satan je njihova dejanja privlačne. In on je zaveznik disbelievers' danes [tudi], in imajo boleče kazen.

trans-unit.source: And We have not revealed to you the Book, [O Muhammad], except for you to make clear to them that wherein they have differed and as guidance and mercy for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: In mi ni pokazala za vas knjiga, [O Muhammad], razen vas, da jasno jim, da pri čemer so se razlikovali in kot smernice in milosti, za ljudi, ki verjamejo.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has sent down rain from the sky and given life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who listen.
trans-unit.target: In Alah je poslan dež z neba in s tem dal življenje na zemlji po svoje lifelessness. Res da je znak za ljudi, ki poslušajo.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in grazing livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from what is in their bellies - between excretion and blood - pure milk, palatable to drinkers.
trans-unit.target: In res, za vas v pašne živine je lekcijo. Damo pijete iz česa je v trebuhu - med izločanje in krvi - čisti mlečni, okusne za uživalce alkohola.

trans-unit.source: And from the fruits of the palm trees and grapevines you take intoxicant and good provision. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who reason.
trans-unit.target: In iz plodov palme in vinsko trto vzameš Opojni in dobro. Res da je znak za ljudi, ki so razlog.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct.
trans-unit.target: In svojega Gospoda navdih, da čebela, "se zase, med gorami, hiše, in med drevesi in [v] ki so gradnjo.

trans-unit.source: Then eat from all the fruits and follow the ways of your Lord laid down [for you]." There emerges from their bellies a drink, varying in colors, in which there is healing for people. Indeed in that is a sign for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Nato jesti iz vseh sadja in sledite načine svojega gospodarja, predvidenimi [vi]." Je razvidno iz trebuhe, pijačo, različnih barv, v kateri je zdravljenje za ljudi. Res da je znak za ljudi, ki dajejo misli.

trans-unit.source: And Allah created you; then He will take you in death. And among you is he who is reversed to the most decrepit [old] age so that he will not know, after [having had] knowledge, a thing. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Competent.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah ustvaril nato on vas bo popeljal v smrt. In med vami je on, ki je obrnil na najbolj dotrajani [] starost tako, da bo vedel, potem ko je znanje, stvar. Res, Allah je poznavanje in pristojni.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has favored some of you over others in provision. But those who were favored would not hand over their provision to those whom their right hands possess so they would be equal to them therein. Then is it the favor of Allah they reject?
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah nekateri od vas je prednost pred drugimi v določbi. Ampak tisti, ki so bili preferiraju bi ne izroči njihovega opravljanja tistim, katere roke pravico imeli, da bi bili enako nanje v njem. Potem je to uslugo Alah jih zavrne?

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from yourselves mates and has made for you from your mates sons and grandchildren and has provided for you from the good things. Then in falsehood do they believe and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
trans-unit.target: In Allah je narejena zate od sebe častniki in je narejen za vas iz častniki sinovi in vnuki in predvidela vi iz dobre stvari. Nato v laž ne menijo in korist Alah jih verjamem?

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that which does not possess for them [the power of] provision from the heavens and the earth at all, and [in fact], they are unable.
trans-unit.target: In so častili poleg Allah, da ki nima zanje [moči] določba iz nebes in zemlje na vse, in [resnično], se ne morejo.

trans-unit.source: So do not assert similarities to Allah. Indeed, Allah knows and you do not know.
trans-unit.target: Tako ne uveljavljajo podobnosti v Allah. Res, Allah ve in ne veste.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example: a slave [who is] owned and unable to do a thing and he to whom We have provided from Us good provision, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Can they be equal? Praise to Allah! But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Allah predstavlja primer: suženj, [ki je] lasti in ni mogoče narediti stvar in on komu damo pri nas dobro poskrbeti, zato preživi s to tajno in javno. So lahko enako? Pohvale za Allah! Ampak večina od njih ne vem.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example of two men, one of them dumb and unable to do a thing, while he is a burden to his guardian. Wherever he directs him, he brings no good. Is he equal to one who commands justice, while he is on a straight path?
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah predstavlja primer dva moška, eden od njih je neumna in ni mogoče narediti stvar, medtem ko je breme za njegov skrbnik. Kjerkoli On ga usmerja, mu prinaša nič dobrega. Je enaka tisti, ki ukaze pravosodje, medtem ko je na ravno pot?

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And the command for the Hour is not but as a glance of the eye or even nearer. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah pripada nevidno [vidike] nebes in zemlje. In ukaz za uro ni, ampak tako na kratko, očesa ali še bližje. Res, Allah je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has extracted you from the wombs of your mothers not knowing a thing, and He made for you hearing and vision and intellect that perhaps you would be grateful.
trans-unit.target: In Alah je iztisnjeno wombs vaše matere, ne da bi vedel stvar, in je naredil za vas sluh in vid in razum, da nemara vi domišljavec hvaležen.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see the birds controlled in the atmosphere of the sky? None holds them up except Allah. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Ne ne vidijo ptice pod nadzorom v ozračju neba? Nič drži razen Allah. Res da so znaki za ljudi, ki verjamejo.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you from your homes a place of rest and made for you from the hides of the animals tents which you find light on your day of travel and your day of encampment; and from their wool, fur and hair is furnishing and enjoyment for a time.
trans-unit.target: In Allah je narejen za vas iz vaše domove kraj za počitek in za vas iz živalskih kož živali šotore, ki ga najdete svetlobe na dan potovanja in vaš dan taboru; iz volne, krzna in las je stanovanjska in užitek za časa.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your [enemy in] battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit [to Him].
trans-unit.target: In Allah je naredil za vas, od tistega, ki je ustvaril, sence in je za vas iz gore, zavetje in je narejen za oblačila, ki ščitijo vas pred toploto in oblačila, ki vas ščiti pred [sovražnik v] bitko. Tako je dopolnil svojo korist na vas, ki jih lahko predloži [mu].

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, [O Muhammad] - then only upon you is [responsibility for] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: Ampak če se obrnejo proč, [O Muhammad] - potem samo na vas je jasno obvestilo [odgovornost za].

trans-unit.source: They recognize the favor of Allah; then they deny it. And most of them are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Ugotavljajo uslugo od Allah; potem pa to zanikajo. In večina od njih so disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect from every nation a witness. Then it will not be permitted to the disbelievers [to apologize or make excuses], nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
trans-unit.target: In [omenil] dan, kdaj mi bo obudila iz vsakega naroda priča. Potem se bo disbelievers [da opravičiti ali izgovorov] ne dovoli, niti so morali zadovoljiti [Alahove].

trans-unit.source: And when those who wronged see the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: In ko tisti, ki je bila oškodovana videti kazen, to ne bo treba omiliti za njih, niti bo so reprieved.

trans-unit.source: And when those who associated others with Allah see their "partners," they will say," Our Lord, these are our partners [to You] whom we used to invoke besides You." But they will throw at them the statement, "Indeed, you are liars."
trans-unit.target: In ko tiste, ki drugim vključenim Allah videli svoje "partnerji", bodo rekli,"Naš Gospod, to so naši partnerji [si] katero smo uporabili pozvati poleg vas." Vendar so bo vrgel na njih izjavo, "Res, ste lažnivec."

trans-unit.source: And they will impart to Allah that Day [their] submission, and lost from them is what they used to invent.
trans-unit.target: In bo mu dajejo v Allah tisti dan [njihovega] oddajo, in izgubil od njih je, kar se uporabljajo za izumiti.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved and averted [others] from the way of Allah - We will increase them in punishment over [their] punishment for what corruption they were causing.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki so verjeli in preprečiti [drugi] iz pot Allah - mi bo povečala v kazen nad [njihovega] kazen za kaj korupcije, so povzročile.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the Day when We will resurrect among every nation a witness over them from themselves. And We will bring you, [O Muhammad], as a witness over your nation. And We have sent down to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.
trans-unit.target: In [omenil] dan, kdaj mi bo obudila med vsak narod priča nad njimi od sebe. In ponujamo vam, [O Muhammad], bo kot priča v vaš narod. In smo poslali vam knjigo kot pojasnilo za vse stvari in kot smernice in milost in dobrih novic za muslimane.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah orders justice and good conduct and giving to relatives and forbids immorality and bad conduct and oppression. He admonishes you that perhaps you will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Res, Allah pravičnosti in dobrega obnašanja in daje sorodnikom in prepoveduje nemoralnosti in slabo ravnanje in zatiranja. On svari da morda boste opomnjeni.

trans-unit.source: And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, [O believers], and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness. Indeed, Allah knows what you do.
trans-unit.target: Izpolnitev zaveze Allah, ko ste vzeli to, [O verniki], in ne lomite prisega po njihovi potrditvi, medtem ko so se Allah, nad vami, priča. Res, Allah ve, kaj storiti.

trans-unit.source: And do not be like she who untwisted her spun thread after it was strong [by] taking your oaths as [means of] deceit between you because one community is more plentiful [in number or wealth] than another community. Allah only tries you thereby. And He will surely make clear to you on the Day of Resurrection that over which you used to differ.
trans-unit.target: In noče biti kot ona, ki Neteksturirana, brez zavojev njena zavrtel niti ko je bilo močno [z] ob vaš prisega kot [prevoznega] prevaro med vami, ker ena skupnost je bolj izdatno [v številko ali bogastvo] kot drugo Skupnost. Allah samo jih poskuša s tem. In zagotovo bo jasno, da si na dan od vstajenje da več kot, ki ste ga uporabili, da se razlikujejo.

trans-unit.source: And if Allah had willed, He could have made you [of] one religion, but He causes to stray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And you will surely be questioned about what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: In če je Allah voljan, on strjena lava življati narejen vi [za] eno vero, vendar mu povzroča zaiti ki je oporok in koga je oporok vodi. In vam bo zagotovo zaslišan o tem, kaj je za narediti.

trans-unit.source: And do not take your oaths as [means of] deceit between you, lest a foot slip after it was [once] firm, and you would taste evil [in this world] for what [people] you diverted from the way of Allah, and you would have [in the Hereafter] a great punishment.
trans-unit.target: In ne jemljite vaše prisege kot [prevoznega] prevaro med vami, da ne slinavke zdrs po njej je [ko] podjetje, in vi bi okus zlo [v tem svetu] za kaj [ljudje] vas preusmeri iz pot Allah, in imate [v nadaljevanju] veliko kazen.

trans-unit.source: And do not exchange the covenant of Allah for a small price. Indeed, what is with Allah is best for you, if only you could know.
trans-unit.target: In ne izmenjujejo pakt Allah za majhno ceno. Res, kaj je z Allah je najboljša za vas, če le bi veš.

trans-unit.source: Whatever you have will end, but what Allah has is lasting. And We will surely give those who were patient their reward according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Karkoli že bo na koncu, ampak kaj je Allah je trajno. In bomo zagotovo dal tisti, ki so bolnika svoje nagrade po najboljših kaj se uporabljajo za početi.

trans-unit.source: Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, and We will surely give them their reward [in the Hereafter] according to the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Kdor ne pravičnosti, moške ali ženske, medtem ko je vernik - mi bo zagotovo povzročilo mu živeti dobro življenje, in smo zagotovo jim svoje nagrade [v nadaljevanju] po najboljših kaj se uporabljajo za početi.

trans-unit.source: So when you recite the Qur'an, [first] seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled [from His mercy].
trans-unit.target: Tako ko boste recitirati Korana, [prva] zateklo v Allah od Satan, izgnala [iz njegova milost].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, there is for him no authority over those who have believed and rely upon their Lord.
trans-unit.target: Res, ni mu organ pred tistimi, ki so verjeli in se zanašajo na svojega Gospoda.

trans-unit.source: His authority is only over those who take him as an ally and those who through him associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Organ je le tisti, ki mu kot zaveznika in tiste, ki po njem drugi sodelavec z Allah.

trans-unit.source: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, [O Muhammad], are but an inventor [of lies]." But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: In ko smo nadomestek verz namesto verz - in Alah je večina vedoč, kaj pošilja - pravijo, ", [O Muhammad], ste vendar izumitelj [je]." Ampak večina od njih ne vem.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "The Pure Spirit has brought it down from your Lord in truth to make firm those who believe and as guidance and good tidings to the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: Reči, [O Muhammad], "čistega duha je prinesel od svojega Gospoda, v resnici, da bi podjetja, tiste, ki verjamejo in kot smernice in dobrih novic za muslimane."

trans-unit.source: And We certainly know that they say, "It is only a human being who teaches the Prophet." The tongue of the one they refer to is foreign, and this Qur'an is [in] a clear Arabic language.
trans-unit.target: In seveda vemo, da bi rekli, "To je samo človeško bitje, ki uči preroka." Je jezik tisti, ki se nanašajo na tujih, in tej Qur'an je [v] jasno arabski jezik.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who do not believe in the verses of Allah - Allah will not guide them, and for them is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Res, tisti, ki ne verjamejo v verzih Allah - Allah ne bo vodilo, in za njih je boleča kazen.

trans-unit.source: They only invent falsehood who do not believe in the verses of Allah, and it is those who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: So le izumiti laž, ki ne verjamejo v verzih Allah, in to je tisti, ki so lažnivci.

trans-unit.source: Whoever disbelieves in Allah after his belief... except for one who is forced [to renounce his religion] while his heart is secure in faith. But those who [willingly] open their breasts to disbelief, upon them is wrath from Allah, and for them is a great punishment;
trans-unit.target: Kdor jih disbelieves v Allah po njegovo prepričanje... razen enega, ki je prisiljen [odreči svojo vero] medtem ko je njegovo srce je varno, v vero. Ampak tisti, ki [pripravljen] odpreti svojih prsi nejeverno, na njih je srd od Allah, in za njih je veliko kazen;

trans-unit.source: That is because they preferred the worldly life over the Hereafter and that Allah does not guide the disbelieving people.
trans-unit.target: To je zato, ker so raje posvetno življenje v nadaljevanju in da Allah ne vodnik disbelieving ljudi.

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones over whose hearts and hearing and vision Allah has sealed, and it is those who are the heedless.
trans-unit.target: So tiste, katerih srca in sluh in vid Allah je zapečatena, in to je tisti, ki so v brezskrben.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers.
trans-unit.target: Resnično, to je oni, v nadaljevanju, ki bodo poraženci.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who emigrated after they had been compelled [to renounce their religion] and thereafter fought [for the cause of Allah] and were patient - indeed, your Lord, after that, is Forgiving and Merciful
trans-unit.target: Potem, dejansko svojega Gospoda, tistim, ki izselili po je prisiljen [odreči svoje vere] in [za vzrok Allah] zatem so se borili in so bolnik - res, svojega Gospoda, po tem, je tolerantna in usmiljen

trans-unit.source: On the Day when every soul will come disputing for itself, and every soul will be fully compensated for what it did, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: Na dan, ko vsaka duša bo izpodbijanje zase, in vsaka duša bo popolnoma nadomestilo za kaj je to storil, in ne bodo oškodovani.

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example: a city which was safe and secure, its provision coming to it in abundance from every location, but it denied the favors of Allah. So Allah made it taste the envelopment of hunger and fear for what they had been doing.
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah predstavlja primer: mesto, ki je varen in zanesljiv, njegovo zagotavljanje, ki prihajajo v številčnosti z vsakega mesta, vendar je zanikal uslug Allah. Tako Allah je okus envelopment lakote in strah za kaj bi počel.

trans-unit.source: And there had certainly come to them a Messenger from among themselves, but they denied him; so punishment overtook them while they were wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: In je zagotovo prišel do njih sel med seboj, ampak so zanikati njega; tako kazen jih je prehitela, medtem ko so bili wrongdoers.

trans-unit.source: Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah, if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.
trans-unit.target: Nato jesti priskrbljenega Allah za vas, [ki je] zakonita in dobro. In hvaležen za uslugo od Allah, če je [resnično] njega, ki ste bogoslužja.

trans-unit.source: He has only forbidden to you dead animals, blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allah. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: On je samo prepovedano mrtvih živali, krvi, meso prašičev, in, ki je bila posvečena razen Allah. Vendar kdor zaradi [nujno], [je] želji niti benih [omejitev] - potem res, Allah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. Indeed, those who invent falsehood about Allah will not succeed.
trans-unit.target: In ne rečem o kaj vaš jeziki ustvarjanje izjave o za neresnico, "to je zakonita, in to je nezakonito," izmisliti laž o Allah. Res, tiste, ki izumiti laž o Allah ne bo uspelo.

trans-unit.source: [It is but] a brief enjoyment, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: [To je vendar] kratek užitek, in so imeli boleče kazen.

trans-unit.source: And to those who are Jews We have prohibited that which We related to you before. And We did not wrong them [thereby], but they were wronging themselves.
trans-unit.target: In tistim, ki so Judje smo so prepovedane, ki, ki smo povezani z vami, preden. In smo jih ne narobe [tako], vendar so bili wronging sami.

trans-unit.source: Then, indeed your Lord, to those who have done wrong out of ignorance and then repent after that and correct themselves - indeed, your Lord, thereafter, is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Potem, dejansko svojega Gospoda, tistim, ki so delali narobe iz nevednosti in nato se pokesajo po tem in pravi sama - res, svojega Gospoda, zatem je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Abraham was a [comprehensive] leader, devoutly obedient to Allah, inclining toward truth, and he was not of those who associate others with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Res, Abraham je bil [celovito] vodja, pobožno poslušni Allah, nagibanje proti resnico, in on ni tistih, ki povezujejo druge z Alahove.

trans-unit.source: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: [Bil] hvaležen za svoje usluge. Allah ga izbrali in ga vodi naravnost pot.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him good in this world, and indeed, in the Hereafter he will be among the righteous.
trans-unit.target: In smo mu dali dober v tem svetu, in res, v nadaljevanju mu bo med pravednika.

trans-unit.source: Then We revealed to you, [O Muhammad], to follow the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth; and he was not of those who associate with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Nato smo razkrili vam, [O Muhammad], slediti vere Abrahama, nagibanje proti resnico; in on ni tistih, ki povezujejo z Allah.

trans-unit.source: The sabbath was only appointed for those who differed over it. And indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
trans-unit.target: V soboto je bil imenovan le za tiste, ki se nad njim. In res, bo vaš gospod sodnik vmes na dan od vstajenje, glede na to v katerem uporabljajo razlikujejo.

trans-unit.source: Invite to the way of your Lord with wisdom and good instruction, and argue with them in a way that is best. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has strayed from His way, and He is most knowing of who is [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Vabimo na pot svojega Gospoda z modrostjo in dober pouk in prepiraj se z njimi tako, da je najboljši. Res, vaš Gospod je večina vedoč, ki je zašel s poti, in on je večina vedoč, ki je [] pravoverni.

trans-unit.source: And if you punish [an enemy, O believers], punish with an equivalent of that with which you were harmed. But if you are patient - it is better for those who are patient.
trans-unit.target: In če ste kaznuje [sovražnik, O verniki], kaznovati z enakovredno tega, s katerim so bili oškodovani. Če ste bolnik - je pa bolje za tiste, ki so bolnika.

trans-unit.source: And be patient, [O Muhammad], and your patience is not but through Allah. And do not grieve over them and do not be in distress over what they conspire.
trans-unit.target: Bodite potrpežljivi, [O Muhammad], in potrpljenje ni ampak skozi Allah. Ne žalujejo nad njimi in ne bodo v stiski, nad tem, kaj so zaroto.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Res, Alah je z tiste, ki se ga bojijo in tiste, ki so kršitelje dobro.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He who took His Servant by night from al-Masjid al-Haram to al-Masjid al-Aqsa, whose surroundings We have blessed, to show him of Our signs. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Vzvišeno je on, ki je njegov služabnik ponoči iz al-Masjid al-Haram, da al-Masjid al-Aqsa, katerih okolico, smo blagoslovljeni, da ga naše znake. Res, on je obravnavi, je videti.

trans-unit.source: And We gave Moses the Scripture and made it a guidance for the Children of Israel that you not take other than Me as Disposer of affairs,
trans-unit.target: In mi je dal Moses pismo in je navodila za otroke Izraela, ki jih ne sprejme kot mene kot odstranjevalec zadeve,

trans-unit.source: O descendants of those We carried [in the ship] with Noah. Indeed, he was a grateful servant.
trans-unit.target: O potomci smo izvedenih [v ladja] z Noah. Dejansko je bil hvaležen služabnik.

trans-unit.source: And We conveyed to the Children of Israel in the Scripture that, "You will surely cause corruption on the earth twice, and you will surely reach [a degree of] great haughtiness.
trans-unit.target: In smo prepeljati otroke Izraela v pismo to, "vam bo zagotovo vzrok pokvarjenost naprej zemlja dvakrat, in vam bo zagotovo velik Nabusitost dosega [stopnja].

trans-unit.source: So when the [time of] promise came for the first of them, We sent against you servants of Ours - those of great military might, and they probed [even] into the homes, and it was a promise fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: Tako ko [čas] obljubo prišel za prvo od njih, smo poslali proti vam uslužbencev naša - tiste, ki veliko vojaško oblast, in jih preizkusimo [tudi] v domove, in to je obljubo izpolnil.

trans-unit.source: Then We gave back to you a return victory over them. And We reinforced you with wealth and sons and made you more numerous in manpower
trans-unit.target: Potem smo dali nazaj ste vrnitev zmago nad njimi. In smo jo okrepila z bogastvo in sinovi in so si bolj številne delovne sile v

trans-unit.source: [And said], "If you do good, you do good for yourselves; and if you do evil, [you do it] to yourselves." Then when the final promise came, [We sent your enemies] to sadden your faces and to enter the temple in Jerusalem, as they entered it the first time, and to destroy what they had taken over with [total] destruction.
trans-unit.target: [In dejal], "če vi delati dobro, vi delati dobro zase; in če vam zlo, [vam je] za sebe. " Potem ko končno obljubo prišel, [smo poslali svoje sovražnike] Ražalostiti vaše obraze in vstopiti v tempelj v Jeruzalemu, saj je to začel prvič, in uničiti, kaj jih je prevzel z [skupaj] uničenje.

trans-unit.source: [Then Allah said], "It is expected, [if you repent], that your Lord will have mercy upon you. But if you return [to sin], We will return [to punishment]. And We have made Hell, for the disbelievers, a prison-bed."
trans-unit.target: [Dejal nato Allah], "je pričakovati, [Če se pokesajo], da bo vaš gospod usmili na vas. Ampak če se vrnete [sin], se bomo vrnili [kazen]. In smo naredili vraga, za disbelievers, raztegljiv zapor."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this Qur'an guides to that which is most suitable and gives good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Dejansko je tej Qur'an vodniki, tistemu, ki je najbolj primerna in daje dobrih novic z vernike, ki pravični deeds, da bodo imeli veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: And that those who do not believe in the Hereafter - We have prepared for them a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: In tisti, ki ne verjamejo v nadaljevanju - smo pripravili zanje boleče kazen.

trans-unit.source: And man supplicates for evil as he supplicates for good, and man is ever hasty.
trans-unit.target: In človek supplicates za zlo, kot je supplicates za dobro, in človek je vedno nepremišljene.

trans-unit.source: And We have made the night and day two signs, and We erased the sign of the night and made the sign of the day visible that you may seek bounty from your Lord and may know the number of years and the account [of time]. And everything We have set out in detail.
trans-unit.target: In smo naredili noč in dan znakoma, in smo zbrisati znak noč in so znak dan vidno da radodarnosti lahko prosite svojega Gospoda in morda veste, število let in račun [čas]. In vse, kar smo pripravili podrobno.

trans-unit.source: And [for] every person We have imposed his fate upon his neck, and We will produce for him on the Day of Resurrection a record which he will encounter spread open.
trans-unit.target: [Za] vsako osebo smo upoštevajo svojo usodo na vratu in proizvajamo bo zanj na dan od vstajenje, odprite zapis, ki je srečanje razširila.

trans-unit.source: [It will be said], "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant."
trans-unit.target: [To bo omenjeni], "prebral vaš zapis. Dovolj je sami proti vam ta dan kot računovodja."

trans-unit.source: Whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] his soul. And whoever errs only errs against it. And no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. And never would We punish until We sent a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Kdor ravna samo ravna [v korist] svojo dušo. In kdor zmotno le zmotno proti njej. In ni nosilec bremena nosi breme drugega. In nikoli ne bi mi kaznovati, dokler mi poslal sel.

trans-unit.source: And when We intend to destroy a city, We command its affluent but they defiantly disobey therein; so the word comes into effect upon it, and We destroy it with [complete] destruction.
trans-unit.target: In če želimo uničiti mesto, smo ukaz njenih premožnih, vendar so kljubovalno kršijo tako beseda začne veljati na njem, in mi uničimo z [popolna] uničenje.

trans-unit.source: And how many have We destroyed from the generations after Noah. And sufficient is your Lord, concerning the sins of His servants, as Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: In koliko so mi uničili iz generacije po Noah. In dovolj je svojega Gospoda, o grehe služabnike, kot Acquainted in videnje.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should desire the immediate - We hasten for him from it what We will to whom We intend. Then We have made for him Hell, which he will [enter to] burn, censured and banished.
trans-unit.target: Kdor željo neposredni - smo pospeši zanj iz nje kaj bomo jim želimo. Potem smo naredili zanj pekel, ki ga bo [Vnesite da] opeklina, kaznovala in pregnal.

trans-unit.source: But whoever desires the Hereafter and exerts the effort due to it while he is a believer - it is those whose effort is ever appreciated [by Allah].
trans-unit.target: Vendar kdor želi v nadaljevanju in vrši trud zaradi to, medtem ko je vernik - to je tistih, katerih prizadevanja je vedno cenijo [Alahove].

trans-unit.source: To each [category] We extend - to these and to those - from the gift of your Lord. And never has the gift of your Lord been restricted.
trans-unit.target: Za vsako [kategorije] Kračun - to ter tistim - od dar svojega Gospoda. In nikoli darilo od svojega Gospoda bila omejena.

trans-unit.source: Look how We have favored [in provision] some of them over others. But the Hereafter is greater in degrees [of difference] and greater in distinction.
trans-unit.target: Poglej, kako smo imajo prednost [v določbi] Nekateri od njih pred drugimi. Toda v nadaljevanju je večje v stopinjah [od razlika] in večje za razliko.

trans-unit.source: Do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity and [thereby] become censured and forsaken.
trans-unit.target: Nikar ne izdelovanje [enako] s Allah druga božanstva in [tako] postala kaznovala in pustili.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment. Whether one or both of them reach old age [while] with you, say not to them [so much as], "uff," and do not repel them but speak to them a noble word.
trans-unit.target: In vaš gospodar je odredil, da ne boste častili, razen njega, in staršem, dobro ravnanje. Ali eden ali oba dosežejo starost [pa] s tabo, reči ne nanje, [toliko kot], "uff," in jih ne odvrača vendar besedice nanje plemenito.

trans-unit.source: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small."
trans-unit.target: In manjši nanje krilo ponižnosti, milosti in reči, "moj Gospod, usmili na njih saj so mi dvignejo [ko sem] majhne."

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of what is within yourselves. If you should be righteous [in intention] - then indeed He is ever, to the often returning [to Him], Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Vaš Gospod je večina vedo, kaj je v sebi. Če morate biti pravični [v namen] - potem res je kdaj, da se pogosto vrnete [mu], tolerantna.

trans-unit.source: And give the relative his right, and [also] the poor and the traveler, and do not spend wastefully.
trans-unit.target: Daj sorodnika svojo pravico, in [prav tako] revnih in potnik in ne preživeli potratno.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the wasteful are brothers of the devils, and ever has Satan been to his Lord ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Res, nepotrebnih so bratje Devils, in kdaj je bil Satan svojemu gospodar nehvaležno.

trans-unit.source: And if you [must] turn away from the needy awaiting mercy from your Lord which you expect, then speak to them a gentle word.
trans-unit.target: In če [mora] pa od pomoči potrebnim čakajo na milost od svojega Gospoda, ki pričakujete, potem govoriti z njimi nežne besede.

trans-unit.source: And do not make your hand [as] chained to your neck or extend it completely and [thereby] become blamed and insolvent.
trans-unit.target: In ne bi roko [kot] verigami na vratu ali razširiti popolnoma in [tako] postal krivijo in plačilno nesposoben.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Res, vaš gospod razširja določbe, za katere je oporok in omejuje [je]. Res je, kdaj, o služabnike, seznanjeni in videnje.

trans-unit.source: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty. We provide for them and for you. Indeed, their killing is ever a great sin.
trans-unit.target: In ne ubijajo vaš otrok zaradi strahu pred revščino. Nudimo zanje in za vas. Res, usmrtitvi je vedno velik greh.

trans-unit.source: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
trans-unit.target: In ne približuj se nezakonito spolni odnos. Dejansko, je vedno na nemoralnost in je zlo kot tako.

trans-unit.source: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. And whoever is killed unjustly - We have given his heir authority, but let him not exceed limits in [the matter of] taking life. Indeed, he has been supported [by the law].
trans-unit.target: In ne ubijajo dušo, ki Allah je prepovedana, razen s pravico. In kdo je ubil neupravičeno - imamo glede na njegov dedič organ, vendar naj ne presegajo vrednosti [vprašanje] ob življenje. Res, on je bila podprta [z zakonom].

trans-unit.source: And do not approach the property of an orphan, except in the way that is best, until he reaches maturity. And fulfill [every] commitment. Indeed, the commitment is ever [that about which one will be] questioned.
trans-unit.target: In ne pristop lastnost sirota, razen na način, ki je najboljši, dokler ne doseže zrelost. In izpolnitev [vsakega] zaveze. Obveznosti je namreč vedno [ki, o katerih bo] vprašljiva.

trans-unit.source: And give full measure when you measure, and weigh with an even balance. That is the best [way] and best in result.
trans-unit.target: In dajejo polno mero, ko ukrep, in stehtamo s celo ravnotežje. To je najboljši [pot] in najboljši rezultat.

trans-unit.source: And do not pursue that of which you have no knowledge. Indeed, the hearing, the sight and the heart - about all those [one] will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: In ne nadaljuje da ki ste jih ne pozna. Dejansko, na zaslišanje, pogled in srce - o vseh teh [en] bo zaslišan.

trans-unit.source: And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height.
trans-unit.target: In ne hodijo na zemlji exultantly. Res, vam bo nikoli raztrgala zemlje [], in nikoli ne bo dosegla gore v višino.

trans-unit.source: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested.
trans-unit.target: Vse-svoje zlo je kdaj, v očeh svojega Gospoda, Gnušati.

trans-unit.source: That is from what your Lord has revealed to you, [O Muhammad], of wisdom. And, [O mankind], do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity, lest you be thrown into Hell, blamed and banished.
trans-unit.target: To je iz kaj vaš Gospod je pokazala, da vam, [O Muhammad], modrosti. In [O človeštva], nikar ne izdelovanje [enako] s Allah druga božanstva, da ne boste vrgli v pekel, krivili in pregnal.

trans-unit.source: Then, has your Lord chosen you for [having] sons and taken from among the angels daughters? Indeed, you say a grave saying.
trans-unit.target: Nato je svojega Gospoda izbrali [ker] sinovi in med angeli hčere? Res, ste rekli grob rek.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified [the contents] in this Qur'an that mankind may be reminded, but it does not increase the disbelievers except in aversion.
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo razpršene [vsebine] v tej Qur'an, da človeštvo lahko spomnil, vendar ne poveča disbelievers razen v odpor.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "If there had been with Him [other] gods, as they say, then they [each] would have sought to the Owner of the Throne a way."
trans-unit.target: Recimo, [O Muhammad], "Če pa je bilo z njim [druge] bogov, kot pravijo, potem so [vsakega] bi poskušale lastnik prestol način."

trans-unit.source: Exalted is He and high above what they say by great sublimity.
trans-unit.target: Vzvišeno je on in visoko nad kaj pravijo, da z veliko Uzvišenost.

trans-unit.source: The seven heavens and the earth and whatever is in them exalt Him. And there is not a thing except that it exalts [Allah] by His praise, but you do not understand their [way of] exalting. Indeed, He is ever Forbearing and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Sedem nebes in zemlje in vse, kar je v njih ga poveličujejo. In je ni stvar, razen da je vas povede [Alahove] s svojo hvalo, vendar ne razumete njihovega [pot] exalting. Res, on je vedno dolžnikom in tolerantna.

trans-unit.source: And when you recite the Qur'an, We put between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter a concealed partition.
trans-unit.target: In ko ste recitirati Korana, smo se med vami in tistimi, ki ne verjamejo v nadaljevanju skriti particiji.

trans-unit.source: And We have placed over their hearts coverings, lest they understand it, and in their ears deafness. And when you mention your Lord alone in the Qur'an, they turn back in aversion.
trans-unit.target: In smo postavili v njihovih srcih obloge, da ne razumejo, da, in v svoj ušesa gluhost. In ko si omenil svojega Gospoda, ki je sam v Koranu, se obrnejo nazaj v odpor.

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of how they listen to it when they listen to you and [of] when they are in private conversation, when the wrongdoers say, "You follow not but a man affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: Smo, da večina vedoč, kako bi poslušaj nanj ko so poslušali in [o] ko so v zasebni pogovor, ko je wrongdoers rekel, "sledite pa človek vpliva magije."

trans-unit.source: Look how they strike for you comparisons; but they have strayed, so they cannot [find] a way.
trans-unit.target: Poglej, kako so stavke za vas primerjave; vendar so Zalutao, tako ne morejo [Iskanje] način.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: In so rekli, "ko smo kosti in razpadel delcev, bo [resnično] smo se vstali kot nove stvaritve?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Be you stones or iron
trans-unit.target: Reči, "se ti kamni ali železa

trans-unit.source: Or [any] creation of that which is great within your breasts." And they will say, "Who will restore us?" Say, "He who brought you forth the first time." Then they will nod their heads toward you and say, "When is that?" Say, "Perhaps it will be soon -
trans-unit.target: Ali [vse] ustvarjanje tega, kar je super v prsi." In ti bo rekel, "ki bo obnoviti nas?" Pravijo, "tisti, ki je rodila prvič." Nato bo MIG njihove glave proti sebi in reči, "Ko je to?" Reči, "morda bo kmalu-

trans-unit.source: On the Day He will call you and you will respond with praise of Him and think that you had not remained [in the world] except for a little."
trans-unit.target: Na dan on vas bo poklical in bo odzval s hvalo njega in mislim, da ne živeli [v svetu] razen malo."

trans-unit.source: And tell My servants to say that which is best. Indeed, Satan induces [dissension] among them. Indeed Satan is ever, to mankind, a clear enemy.
trans-unit.target: In povem moj uslužbencev reči, da je najboljši. Res, Satan inducira [nesoglasja] med njimi. Dejansko Satan je kdaj, da človeštvo, jasno sovražnik.

trans-unit.source: Your Lord is most knowing of you. If He wills, He will have mercy upon you; or if He wills, He will punish you. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a manager.
trans-unit.target: Vaš Gospod je, vedoč, večina od vas. Če on hoče, on bo usmili na vas; ali če on hoče, on vas kaznoval. In smo niste poslali vi, [O Muhammad], nad njimi kot manager.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is most knowing of whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And We have made some of the prophets exceed others [in various ways], and to David We gave the book [of Psalms].
trans-unit.target: In vaš Gospod je večina vedo, kdo je v nebesih in na zemlji. Naredili smo nekaj prerokov drugi presega [na različne načine] in da David smo dali knjiga [psalmov].

trans-unit.source: Say, "Invoke those you have claimed [as gods] besides Him, for they do not possess the [ability for] removal of adversity from you or [for its] transfer [to someone else]."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "tiste, ki ste trdili [kot bogovi] poleg njega, uveljavlja za nimajo [sposobnost za] odstranitev stisko od vas ali [za svoje] prenos [za nekoga drugega]."

trans-unit.source: Those whom they invoke seek means of access to their Lord, [striving as to] which of them would be nearest, and they hope for His mercy and fear His punishment. Indeed, the punishment of your Lord is ever feared.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki uveljavljajo poiskati dostope do svojega Gospoda, [prizadevanje, da] katera od njih bi bil najbližji, in upanje za njegovo milost in strah svojo kazen. Res, kazen svojega gospodarja jih kdaj Bali.

trans-unit.source: And there is no city but that We will destroy it before the Day of Resurrection or punish it with a severe punishment. That has ever been in the Register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: In ni nobeno mesto, ampak da bomo uničili pred v dan od vstajenje ali kaznovati s hudo kazen. Ki je bil kdaj v Register vpisanih.

trans-unit.source: And nothing has prevented Us from sending signs except that the former peoples denied them. And We gave Thamud the she-camel as a visible sign, but they wronged her. And We send not the signs except as a warning.
trans-unit.target: In nič je ne more nas pošilja znakov, razen da nekdanji narodi nimajo dostopa. In mi je dal Thamud kamela ona kot viden znak, vendar so ji krivico. In pošljemo ne znake, razen kot opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: And [remember, O Muhammad], when We told you, "Indeed, your Lord has encompassed the people." And We did not make the sight which We showed you except as a trial for the people, as was the accursed tree [mentioned] in the Qur'an. And We threaten them, but it increases them not except in great transgression.
trans-unit.target: In [spomnim, O Muhammad], kdaj povedali vi, "Dejansko svojega Gospoda se je vključil ljudi." In mi ne bi pogled, ki mi prha vi, razen kot poskus za ljudi, kot je bil preklet drevo [navedene] v Koranu. In smo jih ogrožajo, vendar jih ne razen povečuje v velik greh.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angles, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He said, "Should I prostrate to one You created from clay?"
trans-unit.target: In [navedba], ko smo rekli, da so koti, "Prostracije na Adam," in oni prostrated, razen Iblees. Je dejal, "Bi jaz prostracije enemu, ki ste ga ustvarili iz gline?"

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "Do You see this one whom You have honored above me? If You delay me until the Day of Resurrection, I will surely destroy his descendants, except for a few."
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] je dejal, "vidiš to tista, ki imate čast nad mano? Če mi zamuda do dan od vstajenje, bom zagotovo uničiti njegovih potomcev, razen nekaj."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense.
trans-unit.target: [Alahove] je dejal, "Go za kdorkoli izmed njih sledi vam, res pekel bo odškodnino od vas - dovolj zaracunati.

trans-unit.source: And incite [to senselessness] whoever you can among them with your voice and assault them with your horses and foot soldiers and become a partner in their wealth and their children and promise them." But Satan does not promise them except delusion.
trans-unit.target: In spodbujajo [v nesmislu] kdor lahko med njimi z glasom in napad njih konje in vojake in postati partner v svoje premoženje in svojih otrok in jim obljubljajo. " Ampak Satan ne obljubim jih razen blodnje.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, over My [believing] servants there is for you no authority. And sufficient is your Lord as Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: Dejansko, v moje [prepričanje] uslužbencev ni zate organ. In dovolj je vašega Gospoda kot odstranjevalec zadeve.

trans-unit.source: It is your Lord who drives the ship for you through the sea that you may seek of His bounty. Indeed, He is ever, to you, Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Je svojega Gospoda, ki poganja ladje za vas po morju, ki lahko iščeš svoje radodarnosti. Res, on je vedno, vam, usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches you at sea, lost are [all] those you invoke except for Him. But when He delivers you to the land, you turn away [from Him]. And ever is man ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: In kdaj stisko dotakne na morju, izgubili so [vse] tistih, ki jih uveljavlja razen njega. Pa če je vam prinaša v deželo, stran [od njega]. In kdaj je človek nehvaležno.

trans-unit.source: Then do you feel secure that [instead] He will not cause a part of the land to swallow you or send against you a storm of stones? Then you would not find for yourselves an advocate.
trans-unit.target: Potem se vam zdi varno da [namesto] on ne bo povzročilo del zemljišča vas pogoltniti ali Pošlji proti vam vihar kamni? Potem vas ne bi našel zase zagovornik.

trans-unit.source: Or do you feel secure that He will not send you back into the sea another time and send upon you a hurricane of wind and drown you for what you denied? Then you would not find for yourselves against Us an avenger.
trans-unit.target: Ali se vam zdi varno da bo ne pošljete nazaj v morje drugega časa in pošljite na vas orkan vetra in utopi, za kaj si zavrnjen? Potem vas ne bi našel zase proti nam je avenger.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly honored the children of Adam and carried them on the land and sea and provided for them of the good things and preferred them over much of what We have created, with [definite] preference.
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo počaščen otrok Adam in jih izvajajo na kopnem in morju in iz njih dobrih stvari in jih raje nad veliko tega, kar smo ustvarili, z [dokončno] prednost.

trans-unit.source: [Mention, O Muhammad], the Day We will call forth every people with their record [of deeds]. Then whoever is given his record in his right hand - those will read their records, and injustice will not be done to them, [even] as much as a thread [inside the date seed].
trans-unit.target: [Omenil, O Muhammad], na dan imenujemo tja vsak ljudi z njihovo evidenco [o dejanjih]. Nato Kdor je podan njegov zapis v desno roko - tiste, ki bo prebral, svoje zapise in krivice ne bo naredil za njih, [tudi] toliko kot nit [znotraj datum seme].

trans-unit.source: And whoever is blind in this [life] will be blind in the Hereafter and more astray in way.
trans-unit.target: In kdor je slep na to [življenje] bo slepi v nadaljevanju in bolj zašel v način.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to tempt you away from that which We revealed to you in order to [make] you invent about Us something else; and then they would have taken you as a friend.
trans-unit.target: In res, so bile približno za nagnili od tistega, kar smo si je pokazala, da [bi] ti izumiti o nas nekaj drugega; in potem so bi naredili vi kot prijatelja.

trans-unit.source: And if We had not strengthened you, you would have almost inclined to them a little.
trans-unit.target: In če mi ne okrepiti vi, vi bi so skoraj nagibam k temu jih malo.

trans-unit.source: Then [if you had], We would have made you taste double [punishment in] life and double [after] death. Then you would not find for yourself against Us a helper.
trans-unit.target: Nato [Če ste imeli], smo naredili bi vam okus dvojno [kazen v] življenje in dvojno [po] smrti. Potem bi ne najdete sami proti nam pomočnika.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, they were about to drive you from the land to evict you therefrom. And then [when they do], they will not remain [there] after you, except for a little.
trans-unit.target: In res, so bile približno za pogon, ki ga iz dežele, da vas izselijo iz njih. In potem [kdaj pa], bo ne ostanejo [je] čez vi, razen malo.

trans-unit.source: [That is Our] established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration.
trans-unit.target: [To je naše] določiti način za tiste, ki mi je poslal pred vami naše glasniki; in ne boste našli v naši poti spreminjala.

trans-unit.source: Establish prayer at the decline of the sun [from its meridian] until the darkness of the night and [also] the Qur'an of dawn. Indeed, the recitation of dawn is ever witnessed.
trans-unit.target: Vzpostavitev molitev na propad sonce [od poldnevnika] do teme noči in [tudi] Koranu zore. Res, recitacija zori kdaj priča.

trans-unit.source: And from [part of] the night, pray with it as additional [worship] for you; it is expected that your Lord will resurrect you to a praised station.
trans-unit.target: In iz [del] noči, molite z njim kot dodatne [častili] za vas; pričakovati je, da vaš gospod bo obudila vas pohvalil postajo.

trans-unit.source: And say, "My Lord, cause me to enter a sound entrance and to exit a sound exit and grant me from Yourself a supporting authority."
trans-unit.target: In reče: "Moj Gospodar, vzrok mi vstopiti a zvočni vhod in izhod zvoka izhod in grant mi od sebe podporni organ."

trans-unit.source: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart."
trans-unit.target: In reče: "resnica je prišel, in laž je odstopila. Res je laž, [po naravi], kdaj dolžan odstopiti."

trans-unit.source: And We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers, but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.
trans-unit.target: In pošljemo v Koranu, ki je zdravljenje in milost za z vernike, vendar ne poveča wrongdoers razen v izgubo.

trans-unit.source: And when We bestow favor upon the disbeliever, he turns away and distances himself; and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing.
trans-unit.target: In ko smo nagni uslugo na je Nevjernik, obrne proč in razdalje sam; in ko zlo dotakne ga, on je vedno obupano.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each works according to his manner, but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "vsak deluje glede na njegov način, ampak svojega Gospoda, je večina vedoč, ki najbolje ravna na način."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. And mankind have not been given of knowledge except a little."
trans-unit.target: In so vas, [O Muhammad], o duši. Reči, "duša je afero moj gospodar. In človeštva niso dobile za znanje razen malo."

trans-unit.source: And if We willed, We could surely do away with that which We revealed to you. Then you would not find for yourself concerning it an advocate against Us.
trans-unit.target: In če smo volje, lahko zagotovo bomo stran s tem, ki mi je pokazala, da si. Potem vas ne bi našel zase, ki se nanašajo na to zagovornik proti nam.

trans-unit.source: Except [We have left it with you] as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great.
trans-unit.target: Razen [smo zapustili to z vami] kot milost od svojega Gospoda. Res, svojo korist na vas kdaj je bilo super.

trans-unit.source: Say, "If mankind and the jinn gathered in order to produce the like of this Qur'an, they could not produce the like of it, even if they were to each other assistants."
trans-unit.target: Rekel, "Če človeštvo in je jinn zbrali za proizvodnjo podobno tej Qur'an, bi ne proizvajajo podobno, čeprav so bili med seboj pomočnikov."

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly diversified for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind] of example, but most of the people refused [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo razpršene za ljudi v tej Qur'an iz vsaka [vrsta] primer, vendar je večina ljudi, ki zavrne [nič] razen nejeverno.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "We will not believe you until you break open for us from the ground a spring.
trans-unit.target: In pravijo, "mi ne boste verjeli ste dokler jih obiti za nas od tal na pomlad.

trans-unit.source: Or [until] you have a garden of palm tress and grapes and make rivers gush forth within them in force [and abundance]
trans-unit.target: Ali [do] imate vrt palm dreves in grozdje ter rek Vrni tja v njih v veljavi [in številčnosti]

trans-unit.source: Or you make the heaven fall upon us in fragments as you have claimed or you bring Allah and the angels before [us]
trans-unit.target: Ali bo nebeško pade na nas v fragmentih, kot ste trdili, ali pa bi Alah in angeli pred [nas]

trans-unit.source: Or you have a house of gold or you ascend into the sky. And [even then], we will not believe in your ascension until you bring down to us a book we may read." Say, "Exalted is my Lord! Was I ever but a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: Ali imate hišo zlata ali vam dvigne v nebo. In [tudi takrat], bo ne verjamemo v vaš odvodnih dokler znižanje nam lahko beremo knjige." Reči, "vzvišeno je moj Gospod! Bil sem kdaj vendar ljudi sel?"

trans-unit.source: And what prevented the people from believing when guidance came to them except that they said, "Has Allah sent a human messenger?"
trans-unit.target: In kaj preprečiti ljudi verjame ko smernice prišel do njih, razen, da so rekli, "je Allah poslal sel ljudi?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "If there were upon the earth angels walking securely, We would have sent down to them from the heaven an angel [as a] messenger."
trans-unit.target: Rekel, "če je bilo na zemlji angeli varno hojo, smo bi poslal da jih iz nebes angel [kot v] messenger."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Sufficient is Allah as Witness between me and you. Indeed he is ever, concerning His servants, Acquainted and Seeing."
trans-unit.target: Rekel: "dovolj je Allah kot priča med jaz in ti. Res je kdaj, o služabnike, seznanjeni in videti."

trans-unit.source: And whoever Allah guides - he is the [rightly] guided; and whoever He sends astray - you will never find for them protectors besides Him, and We will gather them on the Day of Resurrection [fallen] on their faces - blind, dumb and deaf. Their refuge is Hell; every time it subsides We increase them in blazing fire.
trans-unit.target: In kdor vodi Allah - je [pravilno] vodeni; in kdor pošilja zašel - boste nikoli našli zanje ščitnike poleg njega, in mi bodo zbrali na dan od vstajenje [padel] na obrazih - slepi, nem in gluh. Svoje zatočišče je pekel; vsakič, ko to mine bomo povečali v plamen ognja.

trans-unit.source: That is their recompense because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected [in] a new creation?"
trans-unit.target: Ki je svoje zaracunati, ker so verjeli v naše verzov in reče: "ko smo kosti in razpadel delcev, bo, smo se vstali [resnično] [v] nove stvaritve?"

trans-unit.source: Do they not see that Allah, who created the heavens and earth, is [the one] Able to create the likes of them? And He has appointed for them a term, about which there is no doubt. But the wrongdoers refuse [anything] except disbelief.
trans-unit.target: Ne ne vidijo, da je Alah, ki je ustvaril nebo in zemljo, [je] lahko ustvarite rad od njih? In je imenoval za njih izraz, o katerih ni nobenega dvoma. Vendar je wrongdoers zavrne [nič] razen nejeverno.

trans-unit.source: Say [to them], "If you possessed the depositories of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold out of fear of spending." And ever has man been stingy.
trans-unit.target: Torej [jim], "Če boste imela depozitarji milost moj gospodar, potem bi zadrži iz strahu porabe." In kdaj je človek bil Škrt.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses nine evident signs, so ask the Children of Israel [about] when he came to them and Pharaoh said to him, "Indeed I think, O Moses, that you are affected by magic."
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo dala Moses devet očitne znake, torej prosim otroke Izraela [o] Ko je prišel do njih in Faraon naj mu, "Dejansko mislim, O Moses, da je vplivala na magije."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "You have already known that none has sent down these [signs] except the Lord of the heavens and the earth as evidence, and indeed I think, O Pharaoh, that you are destroyed."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] je dejal, "Ste že znano, da nobeden je poslan te [znaki] razen Gospoda nebes in zemlje, kot dokaz, in res mislim, O Faraon, da so uničeni."

trans-unit.source: So he intended to drive them from the land, but We drowned him and those with him all together.
trans-unit.target: Tako je nameraval pripeljemo iz zemlje, vendar smo utonil, ga in tiste z njim vse skupaj.

trans-unit.source: And We said after Pharaoh to the Children of Israel, "Dwell in the land, and when there comes the promise of the Hereafter, We will bring you forth in [one] gathering."
trans-unit.target: In smo rekli po faraon v Izraelu otroke, "živijo v deželi, in ko pride obljubo v nadaljevanju, smo bo popeljal tja v [eno] zbiranje."

trans-unit.source: And with the truth We have sent the Qur'an down, and with the truth it has descended. And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
trans-unit.target: Z resnico smo poslali Koranu in z resnico je spustil. In mi smo ne poslali vam, [O Muhammad], razen kot prinašalca dobrih novic in a warner.

trans-unit.source: And [it is] a Qur'an which We have separated [by intervals] that you might recite it to the people over a prolonged period. And We have sent it down progressively.
trans-unit.target: In [je] Koran, ki smo ločeni [po intervalih] ki jo lahko recitirali ljudem na daljše obdobje. In mi smo poslali postopoma.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Believe in it or do not believe. Indeed, those who were given knowledge before it - when it is recited to them, they fall upon their faces in prostration,
trans-unit.target: Reči, "verjamejo ali ne verjamejo. Osebe, ki so imele znanja, preden-ko ga je recitiral jim, padejo na obrazih v izčrpanost,

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, the promise of our Lord has been fulfilled."
trans-unit.target: In pravijo, je vzvišeno "je naš gospod! Res, obljube našega Gospoda je izpolnjeni."

trans-unit.source: And they fall upon their faces weeping, and the Qur'an increases them in humble submission.
trans-unit.target: In padejo na njihove obraze jok, in Koranu jih povečanja ponižna oddajo.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Call upon Allah or call upon the Most Merciful. Whichever [name] you call - to Him belong the best names." And do not recite [too] loudly in your prayer or [too] quietly but seek between that an [intermediate] way.
trans-unit.target: Reči, "poziva Allah ali poziva najbolj usmiljen. Kar [ime] pokličete - mu spadajo najboljši imena. " In ne recitirati [] Preglasno v vašo molitev ali [tudi] tiho ampak iščejo med ki [vmesnih] način.

trans-unit.source: And say, "Praise to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion and has no [need of a] protector out of weakness; and glorify Him with [great] glorification."
trans-unit.target: In reči, "pohvale za Allah, ki ni sprejela sina in je brez partnerja v [njegova] oblast in ne [potreba po a] zaščitnik iz šibkosti; in slavili s [velik] poveličevanje."

trans-unit.source: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, who has sent down upon His Servant the Book and has not made therein any deviance.
trans-unit.target: [Vse] pohvale zapade [] v Allah, ki je poslan na njegov služabnik knjige in ni v njem vse deviantnosti.

trans-unit.source: [He has made it] straight, to warn of severe punishment from Him and to give good tidings to the believers who do righteous deeds that they will have a good reward
trans-unit.target: [Mu je bilo] ravne, na hudo kazen od njega in da dobrih novic, da verniki, ki naredil pravednici dejanja opozarjajo, da bodo imeli dobro plačilo

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain forever
trans-unit.target: V katerem bo večno ostala

trans-unit.source: And to warn those who say, "Allah has taken a son."
trans-unit.target: In svariti tisti, ki pravijo, "Allah je sina."

trans-unit.source: They have no knowledge of it, nor had their fathers. Grave is the word that comes out of their mouths; they speak not except a lie.
trans-unit.target: Oni življati ne pozna, niti ni imel svojih očetov. Grob je beseda, ki pride iz ust; govorijo ne razen laž.

trans-unit.source: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, [O Muhammad], if they do not believe in this message, [and] out of sorrow.
trans-unit.target: Potem morda bi ubil sebe skozi žalosti nad njimi, [O Muhammad], če ne verjamem v to sporočilo, [in] iz žalosti.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have made that which is on the earth adornment for it that We may test them [as to] which of them is best in deed.
trans-unit.target: Dejansko smo naredili tisto, kar je na zemlji okras za to, da smo lahko test jih [,] katera od njih je najboljši v dejanju.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We will make that which is upon it [into] a barren ground.
trans-unit.target: In res, mi bo to, kar je na njem [v] neplodna tla.

trans-unit.source: Or have you thought that the companions of the cave and the inscription were, among Our signs, a wonder?
trans-unit.target: Ali ste pomislili, da tovariši v jamo in napis so, med naše znakov, čudno?

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when the youths retreated to the cave and said, "Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance."
trans-unit.target: [Navedba], ko mladi umaknili v jamo in reče: "Naš Gospod, podari nam od sebe usmiljenja in pripravimo za nas iz naše vodilo prav afero."

trans-unit.source: So We cast [a cover of sleep] over their ears within the cave for a number of years.
trans-unit.target: Tako smo oddanih [kritje spanja] njihove ušesa v jamo za več let.

trans-unit.source: Then We awakened them that We might show which of the two factions was most precise in calculating what [extent] they had remained in time.
trans-unit.target: Potem smo jih prebudil da lahko prikažemo, katera od dveh frakcij je najbolj natančen izračun kaj [obseg] so živeli v času.

trans-unit.source: It is We who relate to you, [O Muhammad], their story in truth. Indeed, they were youths who believed in their Lord, and We increased them in guidance.
trans-unit.target: Mi, ki se nanašajo na vas, [O Muhammad], svojo zgodbo, v resnici je. Dejansko so bili mladeniči, ki so verjeli v svojega Gospoda, in smo jih povečal v smernice.

trans-unit.source: And We made firm their hearts when they stood up and said, "Our Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth. Never will we invoke besides Him any deity. We would have certainly spoken, then, an excessive transgression.
trans-unit.target: In smo na trdno njihova srca ko vstal in rekel: "Naš Gospod je gospodar nebes in zemlje. Nikoli ne bo odpoklic poleg njega vsako božanstvo. Mi bi zagotovo govoril, nato, pretirano greh.

trans-unit.source: These, our people, have taken besides Him deities. Why do they not bring for [worship of] them a clear authority? And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie?"
trans-unit.target: To naše ljudi, so se poleg njega božanstva. Zakaj ne da bi za [čaščenje] jih jasno organ? In kdo je bolj nepravičen, kot tisti, ki Izumi o Allah laž?"

trans-unit.source: [The youths said to one another], "And when you have withdrawn from them and that which they worship other than Allah, retreat to the cave. Your Lord will spread out for you of His mercy and will prepare for you from your affair facility."
trans-unit.target: [Mladi dejal seboj], "in ko je izstopila iz njih in ki so častili razen Allah, umik v jamo. Svojega gospodarja bo razporejeni za vas njegova milost in pripravila za vas iz vaše afero objekta."

trans-unit.source: And [had you been present], you would see the sun when it rose, inclining away from their cave on the right, and when it set, passing away from them on the left, while they were [laying] within an open space thereof. That was from the signs of Allah. He whom Allah guides is the [rightly] guided, but he whom He leaves astray - never will you find for him a protecting guide.
trans-unit.target: In [bi si bil prisoten], bi videli sonce ob to, nagibanje od svoje jame na desni, in ko to nastavite, ki poteka od njih na levi, medtem ko so bili [kokoši] v prazen prostor. To je bilo znakov Allah. Katere vodi Allah je [pravilno] vodeni, ampak on, ki zapusti zašel - nikoli ne boste našli zanj zaščito vodnik.

trans-unit.source: And you would think them awake, while they were asleep. And We turned them to the right and to the left, while their dog stretched his forelegs at the entrance. If you had looked at them, you would have turned from them in flight and been filled by them with terror.
trans-unit.target: In ti misliš, jih budni, medtem ko so bili zaspal. In smo jih obrnili na desno in levo, medtem ko njihov pes raztegne svoje noge na vhodu. Če bi si pogledal na njih, bi imate obrnil od njih v polet in bilo jih polna groze.

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We awakened them that they might question one another. Said a speaker from among them, "How long have you remained [here]?" They said, "We have remained a day or part of a day." They said, "Your Lord is most knowing of how long you remained. So send one of you with this silver coin of yours to the city and let him look to which is the best of food and bring you provision from it and let him be cautious. And let no one be aware of you.
trans-unit.target: In podobno, smo jih da morda vprašanje drugega prebudil. Je dejal govornik med njimi, "kako dolgo boste ostali [tukaj]?" So rekli, "Smo ostali dan ali del dan." So rekli, "vaš Gospod je večina vedoč, kako dolgo boste ostali. Tako od vas s tem srebrnik tvoje pošlje mesto in pustil pogledati ki je najboljših hrane in prinašajo določba od nje in naj bo previden. In naj nihče ne zavedati vi.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if they come to know of you, they will stone you or return you to their religion. And never would you succeed, then - ever."
trans-unit.target: Res, če so prišli vedeti od vas, bo kamen vas ali vrnete v svojo vero. In nikoli ne bi vam uspelo, nato, kdaj."

trans-unit.source: And similarly, We caused them to be found that they [who found them] would know that the promise of Allah is truth and that of the Hour there is no doubt. [That was] when they disputed among themselves about their affair and [then] said, "Construct over them a structure. Their Lord is most knowing about them." Said those who prevailed in the matter, "We will surely take [for ourselves] over them a masjid."
trans-unit.target: In podobno, smo zaradi njih najdemo, da [ki jih najde] bi vedo, da obljuba Allah je resnica in da ure ni nobenega dvoma. [Ki je] Ko sporno med seboj o njihovi aferi in [torej] je dejal, "gradnjo nad njimi strukturo. Njihovega gospodarja je večina vedel zanje." Rekel tistim, ki so prevladovale v snovi, "Zagotovo bomo [zase] nad njimi na masjid."

trans-unit.source: They will say there were three, the fourth of them being their dog; and they will say there were five, the sixth of them being their dog - guessing at the unseen; and they will say there were seven, and the eighth of them was their dog. Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord is most knowing of their number. None knows them except a few. So do not argue about them except with an obvious argument and do not inquire about them among [the speculators] from anyone."
trans-unit.target: Bodo rekli, tam so bili trije, četrti najpomembnejši svoj pes; in ti bo rekel, je bilo pet, šesti od njih pa svojih pes - ugibati na nevidno; in ti bo rekel, je bilo sedem, in osmo od jih je svoj pes. Recimo, [O Muhammad], "moj gospodar je večina poznavanje njihovega števila. Brez ve jih razen nekaj. Tako ne trdijo o njih, razen z očitno argument in ne pozanima o njih med [špekulantov] od kogarkoli."

trans-unit.source: And never say of anything, "Indeed, I will do that tomorrow,"
trans-unit.target: In nikoli ne reci ničesar, "res, bom to naredil jutri"

trans-unit.source: Except [when adding], "If Allah wills." And remember your Lord when you forget [it] and say, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to what is nearer than this to right conduct."
trans-unit.target: Razen [pri dodajanju], "Če je Allah hoče." In ne pozabite svojega Gospoda, ko pozabi [] in reči, "Morda moj gospodar bo vodič mi je bližjega kot to pravilen voditi."

trans-unit.source: And they remained in their cave for three hundred years and exceeded by nine.
trans-unit.target: In ostali v svoje jame tristo let in presegla devet.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah is most knowing of how long they remained. He has [knowledge of] the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He and how Hearing! They have not besides Him any protector, and He shares not His legislation with anyone."
trans-unit.target: Pravijo, da "Allah je večina vedoč, kako dolgo so ostali. Je [znanje] [vidike] nevidno nebes in zemlje. Kako videnje je in kako sluha! Oni življati ne poleg njega poljuben zaščitnik, in je delnice ne svojo zakonodajo z nikomer. "

trans-unit.source: And recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord. There is no changer of His words, and never will you find in other than Him a refuge.
trans-unit.target: In pripovedovati, [O Muhammad], kaj je pokazala, da vam knjige svojega gospodarja. Ni nobenega menjalec njegove besede, in nikoli ne boste našli v razen njega zatočišče.

trans-unit.source: And keep yourself patient [by being] with those who call upon their Lord in the morning and the evening, seeking His countenance. And let not your eyes pass beyond them, desiring adornments of the worldly life, and do not obey one whose heart We have made heedless of Our remembrance and who follows his desire and whose affair is ever [in] neglect.
trans-unit.target: In vodil sami bolnik [se] s tistimi, ki pozivajo svojega Gospoda, zjutraj in zvečer, iščejo njegov obraz. In naj ne oči gre preko njih, z željo okovom posvetno življenje, in ne ubogajo, ena katerih srce, smo naredili Nepažljiv naše spomina in ki sledi Njegova želja in katerih afero ni nikoli [v] zanemarjanja.

trans-unit.source: And say, "The truth is from your Lord, so whoever wills - let him believe; and whoever wills - let him disbelieve." Indeed, We have prepared for the wrongdoers a fire whose walls will surround them. And if they call for relief, they will be relieved with water like murky oil, which scalds [their] faces. Wretched is the drink, and evil is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: In reče: "resnica je od svojega Gospoda, torej kdor hoče - naj mu verjeti; in kdor hoče - naj mu verjamem." Res, smo pripravili za na wrongdoers ogenj katerega stene bo jih obdajajo. In če ga imenujejo za oprostitev, bodo razbremenjena z vodo kot Taman olje, ki oparine [njihove] obraze. Bedno je pijača, in zlo je počivališče.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - indeed, We will not allow to be lost the reward of any who did well in deeds.
trans-unit.target: Osebe, ki so verjeli in naredil pravednici dejanja - res, mi ne bo izgubljena nagrada za vse, ki si tudi v dejanja.

trans-unit.source: Those will have gardens of perpetual residence; beneath them rivers will flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and will wear green garments of fine silk and brocade, reclining therein on adorned couches. Excellent is the reward, and good is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Oni hoteti življati vrtovi večne prebivališča; pod njimi reke tečejo. Bo v njem krasi zapestnice zlata in bo nosijo zelena oblačila in fine svile brokat, Zavaljen v njem na okrašeni kavči. Odlično je nagrada, in dobro je počivališče.

trans-unit.source: And present to them an example of two men: We granted to one of them two gardens of grapevines, and We bordered them with palm trees and placed between them [fields of] crops.
trans-unit.target: In jih predstavimo primer dveh moških: smo dodeli enemu od njih dveh vrtov grozdja, in smo jih obrobljen s palmami in med njimi [področje] pridelkov.

trans-unit.source: Each of the two gardens produced its fruit and did not fall short thereof in anything. And We caused to gush forth within them a river.
trans-unit.target: Vsako od dveh vrtov proizvedeno sadje in nisem ne zaostaja v nič. In smo zaradi Vrni tja v njih reka.

trans-unit.source: And he had fruit, so he said to his companion while he was conversing with him, "I am greater than you in wealth and mightier in [numbers of] men."
trans-unit.target: In je imel sadje, tako je dejal, da njegov spremljevalec medtem, ko je bil conversing z njim, "sem večji od tebe v bogastvu in močnejši v [število] moški."

trans-unit.source: And he entered his garden while he was unjust to himself. He said, "I do not think that this will perish - ever.
trans-unit.target: In je začel svoj vrt medtem, ko je bil nepravičen do sebe. On reče: "jaz ne mislim, da to bo pogubil - kdaj.

trans-unit.source: And I do not think the Hour will occur. And even if I should be brought back to my Lord, I will surely find better than this as a return."
trans-unit.target: In ne mislim, da bo prišlo na uro. In tudi če bi se prinese nazaj na moj gospodar, sem zagotovo našli rajši mimo to kot vrnitev. «

trans-unit.source: His companion said to him while he was conversing with him, "Have you disbelieved in He who created you from dust and then from a sperm-drop and then proportioned you [as] a man?
trans-unit.target: Njegov spremljevalec, je dejal, da mu medtem ko je bil conversing z njim, "so vam verjeli v tisti, ki ste jo ustvarili iz prahu in nato spermo spusti in nato velikost vas [kot] človek?

trans-unit.source: But as for me, He is Allah, my Lord, and I do not associate with my Lord anyone.
trans-unit.target: Ampak za mene, je Allah, moj gospodar, in sem ga ne povezujejo z moj Gospod kdorkoli.

trans-unit.source: And why did you, when you entered your garden, not say, 'What Allah willed [has occurred]; there is no power except in Allah '? Although you see me less than you in wealth and children,
trans-unit.target: In zakaj si, ko vnesete vaš vrt, ne reči, "kaj Allah volje [prišlo]; ni moč razen v Allah "? Čeprav ste me videli manj kot v bogastvu in otrok,

trans-unit.source: It may be that my Lord will give me [something] better than your garden and will send upon it a calamity from the sky, and it will become a smooth, dusty ground,
trans-unit.target: Je moj gospodar bo mi [nekaj] bolje kot vaš vrt in poslali na njem nesreča z neba, ki bo postala gladka, prašni tla,

trans-unit.source: Or its water will become sunken [into the earth], so you would never be able to seek it."
trans-unit.target: Ali svoje vode bo postala potopljeno [v zemljo], tako da vam nikoli ne bi mogli iščejo."

trans-unit.source: And his fruits were encompassed [by ruin], so he began to turn his hands about [in dismay] over what he had spent on it, while it had collapsed upon its trellises, and said, "Oh, I wish I had not associated with my Lord anyone."
trans-unit.target: In svoje sadje so zajete [propad], zato je začel vrteti svoje roke o [v razočaranje] nad kaj je preživel, medtem ko je propadel na svojo brajdami, in reče: "Oh, jaz želeti sem imel ne povezane z moj Gospod kdorkoli."

trans-unit.source: And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor could he defend himself.
trans-unit.target: In zanj ni bilo nobeno podjetje za pomoč mu razen Allah, prav tako lahko brani sam.

trans-unit.source: There the authority is [completely] for Allah, the Truth. He is best in reward and best in outcome.
trans-unit.target: Organ je [popolnoma] za Allah, resnica. On je najboljši v plačilo in najboljši izid.

trans-unit.source: And present to them the example of the life of this world, [its being] like rain which We send down from the sky, and the vegetation of the earth mingles with it and [then] it becomes dry remnants, scattered by the winds. And Allah is ever, over all things, Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: In jih predstavimo primer življenja tega sveta, [da] kot dež, ki smo poslali z neba, in vegetaciji zemlje druži z njim in [torej] postane suha ostankih, raztresene po vetrovi. In Allah je koli, nad vse stvari, odlično sposobnost.

trans-unit.source: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of the worldly life. But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for [one's] hope.
trans-unit.target: Bogastvo in otroci so [vendar] okras posvetno življenje. Pa trajno dobra dela bolje, da vaš gospod za nagrado in bolje za [eno] upanje.

trans-unit.source: And [warn of] the Day when We will remove the mountains and you will see the earth prominent, and We will gather them and not leave behind from them anyone.
trans-unit.target: In [opozarjajo] dan, ko bomo odstranili gore in boste videli na zemlji vidno, in bomo jih zberejo in ne pustiti za seboj iz njih vsakogar.

trans-unit.source: And they will be presented before your Lord in rows, [and He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time. But you claimed that We would never make for you an appointment."
trans-unit.target: Bo predstavljena svojega Gospoda v vrsticah [in bo rekel], "ste zagotovo prišli do nas tako, kot smo si ustvarili prvič. Vendar si trdil, da nikoli ne bi zate sestanek."

trans-unit.source: And the record [of deeds] will be placed [open], and you will see the criminals fearful of that within it, and they will say, "Oh, woe to us! What is this book that leaves nothing small or great except that it has enumerated it?" And they will find what they did present [before them]. And your Lord does injustice to no one.
trans-unit.target: In bodo dani zapis [dejanja] [odprto], in boste videli kriminalcev, ki so prestrašeni, da v njem, in bodo rekli, "Oh, Gorje nam!
