trans-unit.target: To je njihova vsota znanja. Res, vaš Gospod je večina vedoč, ki strays od poti, in je večina vedoč, ki je vodena.

trans-unit.source: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah pripada karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je v zemlji - ki je lahko nagraditi tiste, ki to zlo z [kazen] kaj naredil in nagraditi tiste, ki delajo dobro z najboljšimi [plačilo] -

trans-unit.source: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki se izognili glavnih grehov in immoralities, le [stori] tisti rahlo. Res, vaš Gospod je obsežen, odpuščanje. Je bil najbolj vedeti od vas, kdaj vam naslika iz zemlje in ko ste bili plodov v wombs svoje matere. Tako ne zahtevek sebe biti čisti; Je, da večina vedoč, ki se ga boji.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who turned away
trans-unit.target: Ste videli tisti, ki je obrnil

trans-unit.source: And gave a little and [then] refrained?
trans-unit.target: In dal malo in [torej] vzdržala?

trans-unit.source: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?
trans-unit.target: Ali ima znanje o nevidno, tako vidi?

trans-unit.source: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses
trans-unit.target: Ali on ni bila obveščena kaj je bilo v svetih spisih Moses

trans-unit.source: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -
trans-unit.target: In [o] Abraham, ki izpolni [svoje obveznosti]-

trans-unit.source: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another
trans-unit.target: Da ni nosilec obremenitev bo nositi bremena drugega

trans-unit.source: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives
trans-unit.target: In da ni za človeka razen da [dobro] ki stremi

trans-unit.source: And that his effort is going to be seen -
trans-unit.target: In da je njegov trud bo videl-

trans-unit.source: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense
trans-unit.target: Torej on bo treba izplačati nadomestilo za to s polno paro zaracunati

trans-unit.source: And that to your Lord is the finality
trans-unit.target: In da za svojega gospodarja je dokončnost

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep
trans-unit.target: In da je tisti, ki naredi [eno] smejali in jokali

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who causes death and gives life
trans-unit.target: In da je on, ki povzroča smrt in daje življenje

trans-unit.source: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -
trans-unit.target: In da ustvarja dva mates - moški in ženske-

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted
trans-unit.target: Sperme spustnem od trenutka, ko se

trans-unit.source: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation
trans-unit.target: In da [naložene] mu je poleg mest

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who enriches and suffices
trans-unit.target: In da je on, ki bogati in zadostuje

trans-unit.source: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius
trans-unit.target: In da je on, ki je gospod Sirius

trans-unit.source: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad
trans-unit.target: In da je uničil prvi [ljudje] "Sad

trans-unit.source: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -
trans-unit.target: In Thamud - in on ni storil rezervni [jih]-

trans-unit.source: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.
trans-unit.target: In ljudje Noah pred. Res, bilo je oni, ki so bili [tudi] bolj nepravičen in zatira.

trans-unit.source: And the overturned towns He hurled down
trans-unit.target: Prevrne mest, je vrgel dol

trans-unit.source: And covered them by that which He covered.
trans-unit.target: In tisto, kar je iz njih zajete.

trans-unit.source: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?
trans-unit.target: Nato, ki favorizira svojega gospodarja ali dvomiš?

trans-unit.source: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.
trans-unit.target: Ta [prerok] je warner kot nekdanji warners.

trans-unit.source: The Approaching Day has approached.
trans-unit.target: Dan približuje približala.

trans-unit.source: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.
trans-unit.target: Pa [od] Poleg Allah, ni nobenega odstranitelj.

trans-unit.source: Then at this statement do you wonder?
trans-unit.target: Nato na to izjavo ali se sprašujem?

trans-unit.source: And you laugh and do not weep
trans-unit.target: In smejati in ne jokati

trans-unit.source: While you are proudly sporting?
trans-unit.target: Medtem ko so ponosno športne?

trans-unit.source: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].
trans-unit.target: Tudi prostracije Allah in častili [mu].

trans-unit.source: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].
trans-unit.target: Uri je prišel blizu, in luna je razdeljen [v dveh].

trans-unit.source: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."
trans-unit.target: In če se jim zdi čudež, obrniti stran in reči, "Ki poteka magije."

trans-unit.source: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
trans-unit.target: In zanikal in upoštevati njihova nagnjenja. Ampak za vsako zadevo je naselje [čas].

trans-unit.source: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -
trans-unit.target: In je že prišel do njih informacij, ki v katerem ni odvračanja-

trans-unit.source: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].
trans-unit.target: Obsežno modrosti - vendar opozorilo ne izkoristijo [jih].

trans-unit.source: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,
trans-unit.target: Torej, pustite jih, [O Muhammad]. Klicatelj kliče nekaj prepovedujejo, dan

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
trans-unit.target: Oči poniža, ki se bo pojavljajo iz grobov, kot če bi bili kobilic, širjenje,

trans-unit.source: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."
trans-unit.target: Dirke naprej proti klicatelja. Na disbelievers rekel, "To je težak dan."

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.
trans-unit.target: Ljudje Noah zavrnjen pred njimi, in zanikal naša služabnik in reče: "Norec", in je bil odganja.

trans-unit.source: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."
trans-unit.target: Tako bi se skliceval njegov gospodar, "Res, sem overpowered, tako pomoč."

trans-unit.source: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
trans-unit.target: Nato smo odprli vrata neba z dež lije navzdol

trans-unit.source: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.
trans-unit.target: Zaradi zemlje, da se razpoči s vzmeti in vodah srečal tiče, že že vnaprej določen.

trans-unit.source: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,
trans-unit.target: In smo ga izvedli v a [gradnjo] deske in nohti,

trans-unit.source: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.
trans-unit.target: Plujejo pod naše opazovanje kot nagrado za tisti, ki je bila zavrnjena.

trans-unit.source: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: In smo levo kot znak, tako je torej vse, ki si bo zapomnil?

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: In kako [hudo] so moja kazen in opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: In smo gotovo na Koranu enostaven za spomin, tako je tam vse ki se boste spomnili?

trans-unit.source: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: "Alarmna zavrnjen; in kako [hudo] so moja kazen in opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, smo poslali na njih kričal veter na dan neprekinjeno nesrečo,

trans-unit.source: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.
trans-unit.target: Pridobivanje ljudi, kot če bi bili debla palme, prisiljeni zapustiti svoje domove.

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: In kako [hudo] so moja kazen in opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: In smo gotovo na Koranu enostaven za spomin, tako je tam vse ki se boste spomnili?

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied the warning
trans-unit.target: Thamud zanikal opozorilo

trans-unit.source: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: In rekel, "je eno človeško bitje med nami, ki smo morali slediti? Res, potem bomo napake in norost.

trans-unit.source: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."
trans-unit.target: Je sporočilo bilo poslano na njem med nami? Namesto tega je Ohol lažnivec."

trans-unit.source: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.
trans-unit.target: Da bo jutri vedo, kdo je Ohol lažnivec.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
trans-unit.target: Res, smo pošiljanje kamela ona kot poskus zanje, tako jih gledam in biti potrpežljiv.

trans-unit.source: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].
trans-unit.target: In jih obvesti, da vodo razdeli, vsak [dan] pijačo udeležilo [pa].

trans-unit.source: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].
trans-unit.target: Ampak oni oklic svoj tovariš, in on upal in nosti [jo].

trans-unit.source: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: In kako [hudo] so moja kazen in opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, smo poslali na njih eno trobljenje iz neba, in so postali kot suha vejica fragmenti [živali] pero.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: In smo gotovo na Koranu enostaven za spomin, tako je tam vse ki se boste spomnili?

trans-unit.source: The people of Lot denied the warning.
trans-unit.target: Ljudje veliko zanikal opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, smo poslali na njih vihar kamni, razen družino veliko - smo jih shranili pred zoro

trans-unit.source: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.
trans-unit.target: Kot uslugo od nas. Tako smo nagrado Kdor je hvaležen.

trans-unit.source: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.
trans-unit.target: In je imel že opozoril jih naše napad, vendar jim nasprotovale opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."
trans-unit.target: In je zahteval od njega gosti, vendar smo zabrisati svoje oči, [pravijo,], »Okus moje kazen in opozorilo. «

trans-unit.source: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.
trans-unit.target: In je prišel na njih jutro zakone kazen.

trans-unit.source: So taste My punishment and warning.
trans-unit.target: Tako okus moje kazen in opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: In smo gotovo na Koranu enostaven za spomin, tako je tam vse ki se boste spomnili?

trans-unit.source: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.
trans-unit.target: In tam zagotovo prišel do ljudi Faraon opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: Zanikali so naše znake, vse od njih, tako smo jim zasegli z zasegom za eno Exalted v oblast in odlično sposobnost.

trans-unit.source: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?
trans-unit.target: So vaše disbelievers bolje kot [nekdanji tistim], ali imajo imuniteto v Svetem pismu?

trans-unit.source: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?
trans-unit.target: Ali pa bodo rekle, "Smo sklop podporo [seboj]"?

trans-unit.source: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].
trans-unit.target: [Njihovega] skupščina bo treba premagati, in se obrnejo hrbet [v umik].

trans-unit.source: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.
trans-unit.target: Uro pa za njihovo imenovanje [ustrezno kazen], in uro je bolj katastrofalne in bolj grenak.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.
trans-unit.target: Dejansko, kriminalci so v napake in norost.

trans-unit.source: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."
trans-unit.target: Dan so se vlekli v ogenj na obrazih, [pravijo,], "Okus dotik Saqar."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.
trans-unit.target: Res, vse stvari, ki smo ustvarili z usojenosti.

trans-unit.source: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.
trans-unit.target: In naše ukaz je le eden, kot kratko očesa.

trans-unit.source: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?
trans-unit.target: In smo že uničeni svoje vrste, torej je tam vse ki se boste spomnili?

trans-unit.source: And everything they did is in written records.
trans-unit.target: In vse, kar so naredili je na koncu zapisov.

trans-unit.source: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.
trans-unit.target: In vsak majhen in velik [stvar] je vpisanih.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,
trans-unit.target: Res, pravični bo med vrtovi in rek,

trans-unit.source: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.
trans-unit.target: V sedež časti v bližini suverena, popoln v sposobnost.

trans-unit.source: The Most Merciful
trans-unit.target: Najbolj usmiljen

trans-unit.source: Taught the Qur'an,
trans-unit.target: Učil Koranu,

trans-unit.source: Created man,
trans-unit.target: Ustvaril človek,

trans-unit.source: [And] taught him eloquence.
trans-unit.target: [In] naučil zgovornost.

trans-unit.source: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,
trans-unit.target: Sonce in luna [potezo] natančen izračun,

trans-unit.source: And the stars and trees prostrate.
trans-unit.target: In zvezde in drevesa prostracije.

trans-unit.source: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance
trans-unit.target: In nebeško dvignil in uvedene ravnovesje

trans-unit.source: That you not transgress within the balance.
trans-unit.target: Da vas ne prestopijo v ravnovesje.

trans-unit.source: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.
trans-unit.target: In vzpostavitev težo v pravosodju in ne bi pomanjkljiva ravnovesje.

trans-unit.source: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.
trans-unit.target: In zemlja je, določenimi [] za bitja.

trans-unit.source: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]
trans-unit.target: V njej ima sadje in palmami [datumi] obloge

trans-unit.source: And grain having husks and scented plants.
trans-unit.target: In žito pleve in dišeče rastline.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.
trans-unit.target: Je ustvaril človeka iz gline kot [da] keramike.

trans-unit.source: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.
trans-unit.target: In je ustvaril v jinn iz brezdimnega plamen ognja.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.
trans-unit.target: [Je] Gospodar dveh sunrises in gospodar dveh sončnih zahodov.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
trans-unit.target: Je izdal dve morji, srečanje [ob bok];

trans-unit.source: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.
trans-unit.target: Med njimi je ovira [tako] nobeden od njih transgresses.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.
trans-unit.target: Iz obeh teh pojavijo biser in koral.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.
trans-unit.target: In mu pripadajo ladij [z jadri] visok v morju kot gore.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: Everyone upon the earth will perish,
trans-unit.target: Vsi na zemlji bo pogubil,

trans-unit.source: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
trans-unit.target: In tam ostane obraz Gospoda, lastnik veličanstvo in čast.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.
trans-unit.target: Kdor je v nebesa in zemlja vpraša; vsak dan je prinaša stvar.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.
trans-unit.target: Mi bo udeležil si, O vidno bitja.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].
trans-unit.target: O družbi jinn in človeštvo, če ste sposobni prenesti izven regije nebes in zemlje, potem mimo. Da ne boste izkaznica razen organa [od Allah].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.
trans-unit.target: Tam bo poslano na vas plamen ognja in dima in ne bo branite.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -
trans-unit.target: In ko nebeško razdeli odprta in postane Rose barve kot olje-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala? -

trans-unit.source: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.
trans-unit.target: Nato na ta dan nič vprašal o njegov greh med moškimi ali jinn.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.
trans-unit.target: Kriminalci bo znan po svojih znamk, in jih bo zasegli na forelocks in na nogah.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.
trans-unit.target: To je pekel, ki zanikajo kriminalci.

trans-unit.source: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].
trans-unit.target: Bodo šli med in poparjenje vodo, segreto [na izredno stopnjo].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -
trans-unit.target: Ampak za tisti, ki se je bal položaj svojega Gospoda dveh vrtov-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala? -

trans-unit.source: Having [spreading] branches.
trans-unit.target: Ob [širjenje] veje.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are two springs, flowing.
trans-unit.target: V oba so dve vzmeti, teče.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.
trans-unit.target: V oba so vsak sadja, dve vrsti.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.
trans-unit.target: [So] Zavaljen na postelje katere obloge so svile brokat in plod dveh vrtov je visi nizko.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -
trans-unit.target: V njih so ženske omejevanje [njihovega] poglede, nedotaknjene pred njimi človeka ali jinni -

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala? -

trans-unit.source: As if they were rubies and coral.
trans-unit.target: Kot da so rubini in koral.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?
trans-unit.target: Je nagrada za dobro, [nič], ampak dobro?

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -
trans-unit.target: In pod njimi sta oba [v odličnosti] dve [druge] vrtovi-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala? -

trans-unit.source: Dark green [in color].
trans-unit.target: Temno zelene [Barva].

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are two springs, spouting.
trans-unit.target: V oba so dve vzmeti, spouting.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.
trans-unit.target: V oba so sadje in palmami in granatna jabolka.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: In them are good and beautiful women -
trans-unit.target: V njih so dobre in lepe ženske-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala? -

trans-unit.source: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -
trans-unit.target: Sejem tisti pridržane v paviljoni-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala? -

trans-unit.source: Untouched before them by man or jinni -
trans-unit.target: Neprizadet pred njimi človek ali jinni-

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala? -

trans-unit.source: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.
trans-unit.target: Zavaljen na zeleno blazine in lep lep preproge.

trans-unit.source: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
trans-unit.target: Torej, ki favorizira svojega Gospoda bi zanikala?

trans-unit.source: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
trans-unit.target: Blagoslovljen je ime Lord, lastnik veličanstvo in čast.

trans-unit.source: When the Occurrence occurs,
trans-unit.target: Ko pride do pojava,

trans-unit.source: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.
trans-unit.target: Je na njegovega pojava, ni zanikanje.

trans-unit.source: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].
trans-unit.target: Bo znižala [nekaj] in dvignili [druge].

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with convulsion
trans-unit.target: Ko je zemlja stresamo s krči

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling
trans-unit.target: In gore so razčlenjene, razpada

trans-unit.source: And become dust dispersing.
trans-unit.target: In postane prah, ki se razprši.

trans-unit.source: And you become [of] three kinds:
trans-unit.target: In postanete [o] tri vrste:

trans-unit.source: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
trans-unit.target: Nato tovariši pravice - kaj so tovariši pravice?

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
trans-unit.target: In tovariši levo - kaj so tovariši levi?

trans-unit.source: And the forerunners, the forerunners -
trans-unit.target: In predniki, predhodniki-

trans-unit.source: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]
trans-unit.target: To so tisti, ki prinaša v bližini [Alahove]

trans-unit.source: In the Gardens of Pleasure,
trans-unit.target: V vrtovih užitka,

trans-unit.source: A [large] company of the former peoples
trans-unit.target: [Veliko] podjetje nekdanjih narodov

trans-unit.source: And a few of the later peoples,
trans-unit.target: In nekaj kasneje narodi,

trans-unit.source: On thrones woven [with ornament],
trans-unit.target: Na prestolov, tkano [z okras],

trans-unit.source: Reclining on them, facing each other.
trans-unit.target: Zavaljen na njih, obrnjena drug proti drugemu.

trans-unit.source: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal
trans-unit.target: Tam bo krožijo med njimi mladih fantov, ki večno

trans-unit.source: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -
trans-unit.target: S plovila, vrče in skodelice [vina] iz tekoče pomlad-

trans-unit.source: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -
trans-unit.target: Ni glavobol bo imajo iz njih, niti ne bodo imele vinjen-

trans-unit.source: And fruit of what they select
trans-unit.target: In sadje kaj izbrati

trans-unit.source: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.
trans-unit.target: In meso kokoši, od kar želijo.

trans-unit.source: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,
trans-unit.target: In [zanje so] pošteno ženske z velikimi, [čudovite] oči,

trans-unit.source: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,
trans-unit.target: Upodobitve iz biserov, ki so dobro zaščiteni,

trans-unit.source: As reward for what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Kot nagrado za kaj se uporabljajo za početi.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -
trans-unit.target: Ne boste slišali v njej slabo govora ali Komisija sin-

trans-unit.source: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."
trans-unit.target: Samo rekel: "Mir, mir."

trans-unit.source: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
trans-unit.target: Tovariši desni - kakšne so tovariši pravice?

trans-unit.source: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed
trans-unit.target: [Bodo] med drevesi lote trnje, odstranjena

trans-unit.source: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]
trans-unit.target: In [] bananovcev večplastna [s sadjem]

trans-unit.source: And shade extended
trans-unit.target: In senca podaljšati

trans-unit.source: And water poured out
trans-unit.target: In vode, ki se razlije

trans-unit.source: And fruit, abundant [and varied],
trans-unit.target: In sadje, bogat in raznolik

trans-unit.source: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,
trans-unit.target: Niti omejena [na sezono] niti prepovedano,

trans-unit.source: And [upon] beds raised high.
trans-unit.target: In [na] postelj postavljeno visoko.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation
trans-unit.target: Res, izdelali smo ženske raj v ustvarjanje [novo]

trans-unit.source: And made them virgins,
trans-unit.target: In so jim devic,

trans-unit.source: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,
trans-unit.target: Posvečen [njihovi možje] in enake starosti,

trans-unit.source: For the companions of the right [who are]
trans-unit.target: Za tovarišice pravico, [ki je]

trans-unit.source: A company of the former peoples
trans-unit.target: Podjetje nekdanji narodi

trans-unit.source: And a company of the later peoples.
trans-unit.target: In podjetje kasneje narodi.

trans-unit.source: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
trans-unit.target: In tovariši levo - kaj so tovariši levi?

trans-unit.source: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water
trans-unit.target: [Bodo] v Užasna požara in opeklin vode

trans-unit.source: And a shade of black smoke,
trans-unit.target: In senci črnega dima,

trans-unit.source: Neither cool nor beneficial.
trans-unit.target: Kul niti koristno.

trans-unit.source: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,
trans-unit.target: Res so bili, pred tem, uživate v obilja,

trans-unit.source: And they used to persist in the great violation,
trans-unit.target: In se uporabljajo v veliko kršitev, še vedno

trans-unit.source: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
trans-unit.target: In se uporablja za reči, "ko bomo umrli, in postane prah in kosti, smo dejansko vstali?

trans-unit.source: And our forefathers [as well]?"
trans-unit.target: In naši predniki [tudi]?"

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples
trans-unit.target: Recimo, [O Muhammad], "dejansko, nekdanji in kasneje narodi

trans-unit.source: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."
trans-unit.target: So se zbrali za imenovanje znan dan."

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,
trans-unit.target: Potem res, O tistih zašel, [ki je] deniers,

trans-unit.source: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum
trans-unit.target: Bo treba jesti iz drevesa zaqqum

trans-unit.source: And filling with it your bellies
trans-unit.target: In polnjenje z njim vaše prsi

trans-unit.source: And drinking on top of it from scalding water
trans-unit.target: In pitje na vrhu od opeklin vode

trans-unit.source: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.
trans-unit.target: In pili kot pitje žejen kamele.

trans-unit.source: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: To je njihova nastanitev na dan nagraditi.

trans-unit.source: We have created you, so why do you not believe?
trans-unit.target: Smo ustvarili, torej zakaj vi ne verjamete?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen that which you emit?
trans-unit.target: Ste videli to, kar si izžarevati?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?
trans-unit.target: To je vas, ki ga ustvari, ali smo ustvarjalca?

trans-unit.source: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone
trans-unit.target: Smo odredil smrti med vami, in ne, da se outdone

trans-unit.source: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.
trans-unit.target: V tem smo spremeniti vaš upodobitve in proizvodnjo si v tej [obliki], ki ne veste.

trans-unit.source: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?
trans-unit.target: In že so znani prvi ustvarjanje, tako se ne spomnite?

trans-unit.source: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?
trans-unit.target: In ste videli da [seme] kar seješ?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?
trans-unit.target: Je to vas, ki omogoča rast, ali pa smo pridelovalca?

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,
trans-unit.target: Če smo volje, lahko naredimo to [suho] razbitin, in bi ostala v čudno,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;
trans-unit.target: [Pravijo,] "dejansko smo [zdaj] v dolga;

trans-unit.source: Rather, we have been deprived."
trans-unit.target: Namesto tega smo bili prikrajšani."

trans-unit.source: And have you seen the water that you drink?
trans-unit.target: In ste videli vodo, da pijete?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?
trans-unit.target: Je to ki jo prinesel navzdol od oblaki, ali pa smo, ki bi jo dol?

trans-unit.source: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?
trans-unit.target: Če smo volje, lahko naredimo to grenko, torej zakaj ste ne hvaležen?

trans-unit.source: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?
trans-unit.target: In ste videli ogenj, ki ga ignite?

trans-unit.source: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?
trans-unit.target: Je to vi ki proizvaja svoje drevo, ali smo proizvajalec?

trans-unit.source: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,
trans-unit.target: Posebej smo se opomin in določbe za potnike,

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Tako poveličujejo ime svojega Gospoda, najbolj super.

trans-unit.source: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,
trans-unit.target: Potem prisegam pri nastavitvi zvezd,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.
trans-unit.target: In res, je prisego - če bi vedeli - [najbolj] velik.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Res, da je plemenito Koran

trans-unit.source: In a Register well-protected;
trans-unit.target: V Register dobro zaščiteni;

trans-unit.source: None touch it except the purified.
trans-unit.target: Dotakniti nihče razen očiščeni.

trans-unit.source: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: [Je] razodetje od Gospoda svetov.

trans-unit.source: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent
trans-unit.target: Nato je s to izjavo, da ste brezbrižni

trans-unit.source: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?
trans-unit.target: In da [hvala] za vaš določbe, ki preprečujejo [ponudnik]?

trans-unit.source: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat
trans-unit.target: Zakaj, potem ko duša ob smrti doseže grla

trans-unit.source: And you are at that time looking on -
trans-unit.target: In ste v tem času videti na -

trans-unit.source: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -
trans-unit.target: In naši angeli so bližje ga od tebe, ampak ne vidite-

trans-unit.source: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,
trans-unit.target: Potem zakaj ne boste, če se ne izplačati,

trans-unit.source: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?
trans-unit.target: Prinesi nazaj, če bi morali biti resnične?

trans-unit.source: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,
trans-unit.target: In če je bil pokojni tistih prinesel blizu Allah,

trans-unit.source: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Nato [zanj je] počitek in radodarnosti in vrt užitka.

trans-unit.source: And if he was of the companions of the right,
trans-unit.target: In če je bil tovariši pravico,

trans-unit.source: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."
trans-unit.target: Nato [angeli bo rekel], "mir za vas; [ti si] iz tovariši pravice. "

trans-unit.source: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,
trans-unit.target: Ampak če je bil deniers, [ki so] zašel,

trans-unit.source: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water
trans-unit.target: Nato [zanj je] namestitev poparjenje vode

trans-unit.source: And burning in Hellfire
trans-unit.target: In pekoč občutek v Hellfire

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is the true certainty,
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, to je res varnosti,

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Tako poveličujejo ime svojega Gospoda, najbolj super.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Karkoli je v nebesih in zemlji vas povede Allah, in on je Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Njegova je gospostvo nebes in zemlje. On daje življenje in povzroči smrt, in on je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni.

trans-unit.source: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: On je prvi in zadnji, naslednika in intimno, in on je vse stvari, poznavanje.

trans-unit.source: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: To je on, ki je ustvaril nebo in zemljo v šestih dneh in nato uveljavil zgoraj prestol. On ve, kaj prodre v zemljo in kar izhaja iz nje in kaj spušča iz nebes in kaj vzpenja v njej; in on je z vami, kjerkoli že ste. In Alah, kaj vam, je videl.

trans-unit.source: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: Njegova je gospostvo nebes in zemlje. In da Allah ne vrne [vse] zadevah.

trans-unit.source: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: On povzroča noč vstopiti dan in povzroča dan vstopiti noč, in on je poznavanje tega v prsi.

trans-unit.source: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Vernik v Allah in njegov sel in porabili iz tega, v katerem je, ki ste nasledniki. Za tiste, ki so verjeli, med vami in preživel, bo veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers?
trans-unit.target: In zakaj ne verjamete v Allah pa sel vas vabi, da verjamejo v svojega Gospoda in on je sprejela zaveze, če [resnično] Bodite verniki?

trans-unit.source: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Je bil kdo pošlje, na njegov služabnik [Muhammad] verzov jasnih dokazov, da je lahko popeljal iz darknesses v svetlobo. In res, Allah je vas vrste in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: In zakaj ne boste porabili v vzrok od Allah v Allah pripada dediščina nebes in zemlje? Ni enako med vami so tisti, ki je preživel pred osvojitvijo [Makkah] in se borili [in tiste, ki po njej]. So večje stopnje kot oni, ki je preživel po njem in se borili. Vendar v vseh Allah je obljubil najboljši [nagrado]. In Alah, z kaj delate, je seznanjen.

trans-unit.source: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward?
trans-unit.target: Kdo je to, da bi posojila Allah lep posojilo, tako da on bo množijo zanj in bo imel plemenito nagrado?

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Na dan vidite prepričanje moških in prepričanje žensk, njihovega svetlobe postopka pred njimi in na njihove pravice, [to bo omenjeni], "dobrih novic so danes [o] vrtovi pod kateri rek pretoka, pri čemer bo upošteval večno." To je tisto, kar je velik doseganje.

trans-unit.source: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment.
trans-unit.target: Dne [] hinavec moških in žensk, hinavec rekel tistim, ki menijo, »Čakati za nas, da smo lahko pridobili nekaj svoje svetlobe. « Treba bo rekel, "Pojdi nazaj za tabo in iščejo svetlobo." In steno uvrsti med njimi z vratc, njegova notranjost, ki vsebujejo milost, vendar na zunanji strani pa je muka.

trans-unit.source: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah.
trans-unit.target: Hinavci bo zahtevalo, da verniki, "Bili smo z vami?" Bodo rekli, "ja, ampak sami zbolijo in pričakovano [nesrečo za nas] in dvomil, in pobožne deluded, si dokler ni prišel ukaz od Allah. In Prevarant prevaral si v zvezi Allah.

trans-unit.source: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Tako danes odkupnine bo nekaj od vas ali od tistih, ki so verjeli. Vaš zatočišče je ogenj. Je največ vredno, in nesrečne je destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Je prišel čas, ne za tiste, ki so verjeli, da njihova srca postane ponižno Pokoran v spomin Allah in kaj je prišel resnice? In naj ne bodo kot tiste, ki so imele pismo pred, in dolgem obdobju opravili nad njimi, tako utrjene njihova srca; in mnogi od njih so kljubovalno neposlušni.

trans-unit.source: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand.
trans-unit.target: Vem, da Allah, daje življenje na zemlji po svoje lifelessness. Smo naredili jasno vam znaki; Morda boste razumeli.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward.
trans-unit.target: Res, moški, ki praksi dobrodelnost in ženske, ki prakticirajo dobrodelni in [so ki] so posodili Allah lep posojilo - to pomnoži za njih, in bodo imeli plemeniti nagrado.

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki so verjeli v Allah in svoje glasnike - so [v vrstah] zagovorniki resnice in mučenci, s svojega Gospoda. Za njih je svoje nagrade in njihova svetloba. Ampak tiste, ki so verjeli in zanikal naše verzi - so tovariši Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.
trans-unit.target: Vedo, da je življenje tega sveta, vendar zabaviščni in zlorabe in okras in Razmetanje drug drugega in konkurence v povečanje bogastva in otroci - kot primer dež, katerih [rezultat] vzgoja rastlin po volji motokultivatorji; nato posuši in jo vidite barve; nato postane [razpršeni] razbitin. In v nadaljevanju je huda kazen in odpuščanje od Allah in odobritev. In kaj je posvetno življenje razen uživanje blodnje.

trans-unit.source: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: Tekmi proti odpuščanje iz svojega Gospoda in vrt, katere širina je kot širina nebes in zemlje, pripravljen za tiste, ki so verjeli v Allah in svoje glasnike. Ki je bounty Allah, ki mu daje, za katere je oporok in Allah je lastnik veliko radodarnosti.

trans-unit.source: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy -
trans-unit.target: Ni nesrečah na zemlji ali med sebe razen, da je v register preden dosežemo to v čemer - res da za Allah, je enostavno-

trans-unit.source: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful -
trans-unit.target: Da vas ne obupa nad kaj ti ušel in ne Likovati [v ponos] nad kaj je dal. Ter Allah ni všeč vsem self-deluded in Hvalisav-

trans-unit.source: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: [Tistih] ki so Škrt, da se pridružijo na stinginess ljudi. In kdor se obrne stran - potem res, Allah je prost potreba, s Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Smo že poslali naše kurirje z jasno dokazov in poslan z njimi pismo in ravnotežje, da ljudje lahko vodijo svoje zadeve v pravosodju. Smo poslali po železa, pri čemer je veliko vojaško oblast in koristi za ljudi, in tako da Allah lahko očitno tisti, ki podpirajo njega in njegovo sli nevidna. Res, Allah je močan in Exalted v oblast.

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: In smo že poslali Noah in Abraham in postavi v njihovi potomci prophethood in Sveto pismo; in med njimi je on, ki je vodena, vendar mnogi od njih so kljubovalno neposlušni.

trans-unit.source: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Nato smo poslali po njihovih stopinjah naše kurirje in [jih] pripadnik z Jezus, sin Marije, in mu dal evangelij. In smo ga dali v srcih tistih, ki mu je sledil, sočutje in usmiljenje in meniško življenje, ki so novosti; Smo si ne predpiše za njih, razen [da so to storili] iščejo odobritev Allah. Vendar so to ne opazujejo z ustreznim upoštevanjem. Tako mi je dal sam sebe, sebi, se kdo verjel, med njimi svoje nagrade, vendar mnogi od njih so kljubovalno neposlušni.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, strah Allah in verjamejo v njegov sel; On bo [torej] dal ti dvojno del njegovega usmiljenja in da zate svetlobe, s katerim bo sprehod in odpustil; in Alah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: [Je], da ljudje Sveto pismo lahko vedo, da ne morejo [pridobiti] ničesar od bounty Allah in da [vse] nagrada je v roki od Allah; On daje komu je oporok. In Alah je lastnik veliko radodarnosti.

trans-unit.source: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Zagotovo je Allah slišal govor tisti, ki trdi, z vami, [O Muhammad], o možu in usmerja njene pritožbe v Allah. Ter Allah sliši vaš dialog; res, Allah je sluh in videnje.

trans-unit.source: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki se izgovori thihar med vam [ločevanje] od svoje žene - niso [zato] svoje matere. Njihove matere so nič, ampak tiste, ki jih je rodila. In res, govorijo sporno izjavo in laž. Ampak res, Allah je Pardoning in tolerantna.

trans-unit.source: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki se izgovori thihar od svoje žene in nato [želijo] Pojdi nazaj na tisto, kar so rekli - pa [ne sme biti] sprostitev suženj, preden se dotikajo se drug drugega. To je tisto, kar ste admonished; in Alah je vešč kaj.

trans-unit.source: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: In kdor ne najde [suženj] - nato hitro za dva meseca zaporedoma, preden dotikanju drugega; in kdor ne more - nato hranjenje šestdeset revnih oseb. To je za vas, da [popolnoma] vernik v Allah in njegov sel; in to so meje [privzeto] Allah. In na disbelievers je boleča kazen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Res, so tiste, ki nasprotujejo Allah in njegov sel abased kot tiste, pred njimi so bili abased. In smo zagotovo poslan verzov jasnih dokazov. In za na disbelievers ni ponižujoče kazni.

trans-unit.source: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: Na dan, ko bo Alah obudila vse in jih obvesti o tem, kaj so naredili. Allah je našteti, medtem ko so pozabili in Alah je nad vse stvari, priča.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Ste se ne šteje, da Allah ve, kaj je v nebesih in kaj je na zemlji? Obstaja noben zasebni pogovor tri, ampak da je četrti od njih, niti obstajajo pet, ampak da je šestina jih - in nič manj kot to in nič več, razen, da je z njimi [znanje] kjer so. Nato pa obvesti jim kaj naredil, na dan vstajenja. Res je Allah, vse stvari, poznavanje.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Ste ne šteje tisti, ki so prepovedana iz zasebni pogovor, potem se vrnejo tistemu, ki so prepovedana in pogovarjati med seboj o greh in agresije in neposlušnost, da sel? In ko pridejo za vas, vas lahko pozdravim s [besede] ki Allah ne pozdravljam vas in reči med seboj, "Zakaj ne Allah kaznuje nas za kaj smo rekli?" Dovolj jim je pekel, ki jih bo [Vnesite da] zapisovanje in bedno je destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered.
trans-unit.target: O ki ste verjeli, ko ste zasebno, pogovor ne pogovarjati o greh in agresije in neposlušnost, da sel šele pogovarjati o pravičnosti in pobožnosti. In strah Allah, komu bo mogoče zbrati.

trans-unit.source: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Zasebni pogovor je le od Satan, ki je lahko žalujejo, tiste, ki ste verjeli, ampak on ne bo škodovalo jih sploh razen z dovoljenjem Allah. In na Alah naj bi se verniki.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, ko si rekel, "Space sebe" v skupščinah, potem bo prostor; Alah bo prostor za vas. In ko si rekel, "Izhajajo", potem izhajajo; Alah bo dvignila, tiste, ki ste verjeli med vami in tiste, ki so imele znanja, ki jih stopinj. In Alah je vešč kaj.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki ste verjeli, ko vas [želja] zasebni posvetuje sel, predstavi pred svojo posvetovanje dobrodelne namene. To je bolje za vas in čistejše. Ampak če ne najdete [pomeni] - potem res, Allah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Ste Bali predstaviti pred posvetovanje dobrodelne? Potem, ko ne in Allah vam je odpustil, nato [vsaj] vzpostavi molitev in dal zakah in ubogati Allah in njegov sel. In Alah je vešč kaj.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying].
trans-unit.target: Vi ne štejejo tiste, ki bi zaveznike ljudi, s katerimi Allah je postal jezen? So vas niti od njih, ter oni kletvica za neresnico, medtem ko vedo [ležijo].

trans-unit.source: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.
trans-unit.target: Allah je pripravljen zanje huda kazen. Res, to je zlo, ki delajo.

trans-unit.source: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: Vzeli so svoje prisega [lažno] kot kritje, zato jih preprečiti [ljudje] iz pot Allah, in zanje ni ponižujoče kazni.

trans-unit.source: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally
trans-unit.target: Nikoli ne bo svoje bogastvo ali njihovi otroci izkoristijo jih zoper Alah sploh. So tovariši ogenj; bo upošteval v njem večno

trans-unit.source: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars.
trans-unit.target: Na dan Alah bo obudila vse, in kar bo prisegam nanj, saj prisegam vam in mislijo, da so [stoji] na nekaj. Nedvomno, to je oni, ki so lažnivci.

trans-unit.source: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers.
trans-unit.target: Satan je premaga in jih pozabi spomina Allah. So stranke Satan. Nedvomno, stranka satan - bodo poraženci.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled.
trans-unit.target: Res, tisti, ki nasprotujejo Allah in njegov sel - tisti bodo med najbolj ponižen.

trans-unit.source: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: Allah je napisal, "Bo zagotovo premagati, jaz in moj sli." Res, Allah je močan in Exalted v oblast.

trans-unit.source: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful.
trans-unit.target: Ne boste našli ljudi, ki verjamejo v Allah in zadnji dan ob naklonjenosti za tiste, ki nasprotujejo Allah in njegov sel, tudi če so bili njihovi očetje ali njihovi sinovi ali svoje brate svoje sorodnike. Tiste - mu je odredilo, v vero srca in jih podpira duh od njega. In bomo priznati Gardens pod kateri rek pretoka, pri čemer se ravnajo večno. Alah je zadovoljen z njimi, in so zadovoljni z njim - to so stranke Allah. Nedvomno, stranka Allah - so uspešno.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji vas povede Allah, in on je Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision.
trans-unit.target: Je bil kdo izgnan tisti, ki so verjeli med ljudmi Sveto pismo iz svoje domove na prvo srečanje. Jih ne mislite, da bi pustila, in so mislili, da bi svoje utrdbe zavarujejo pred Allah; vendar [Odlok o] Allah prišel na njih iz kjer je ne pričakuje, in je oddanih terorja v svoje srce [tako] uničijo svoje hiše [lastno] roke in roke verniki. Tako se opozorilo O ljudi vida.

trans-unit.source: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in [this] world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: In če ne da Allah je razglašena za njihovo evakuacijo, on bi se kaznuje jih [ta] svetu, in zanje v nadaljevanju je kazen ogenj.

trans-unit.source: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: To je zato, ker so nasprotovali Allah in njegov sel. In kdor nasprotuje Allah - potem res, Allah je huda kazen.

trans-unit.source: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: Karkoli boste posekali [njihovega] palme ali levi stoji na svojih kovčki - je bil z dovoljenjem Allah in tako je Blamaža kljubovalno neposlušni.

trans-unit.source: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: In kaj Allah [premoženja] njegov sel od njih - si storil ne bi pospešila za to [v ekspedicijo] konji ali kamele, vendar Allah daje svojo moč sli nad katerim je oporok, in Alah je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni.

trans-unit.source: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.
trans-unit.target: In kaj Allah povrniti njegov sel iz ljudi iz mest - je Allah in sel in [njegovi] v bližini sorodnikov in sirot in [nasedlih] popotnik - tako, da ne bo večni porazdelitev bogati izmed vas. In karkoli sel je dal - sprejmejo; in kar je je prepovedano - vzdržati. In strah Allah; res, Allah je huda kazen.

trans-unit.source: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful.
trans-unit.target: Za slabo izseljenci, ki so bili izgnani iz svoje domove in njihove lastnosti, iščejo radodarnosti od Allah in [njegovi] odobritev in podporne Allah in njegov sel, [je tudi delež]. To so resnične.

trans-unit.source: And [also for] those who were settled in al-Madinah and [adopted] the faith before them. They love those who emigrated to them and find not any want in their breasts of what the emigrants were given but give [them] preference over themselves, even though they are in privation. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: In [tudi] tiste, ki so se naselili v al-Madinah in [sprejet] vero pred njimi. Ljubezen tista, ki je emigriral v njih in najti ne koli želijo v svoje prsi, kaj so imeli za izseljenci, vendar jim [] prednost v sami, čeprav so lahko. In kdor je zaščiten pred stinginess svojo dušo - to je tisti, ki bo uspešno.

trans-unit.source: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts [any] resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful."
trans-unit.target: In [je delež za] tisti, ki je prišel po njih, reče: "Naš Gospod, oprosti nas in naše brate, ki nas v veri, ki ji dal ne v naših srcih [vse] zamere proti tistim, ki so verjeli. Naš Gospod, res ste vrste in usmiljen."

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." But Allah testifies that they are liars.
trans-unit.target: Ste šteje tisti, ki praksi hinavščino, rekel, da svoje brate, ki so verjeli med ljudmi Sveto pismo, "če so izgnani, pustimo bo zagotovo z vami in mi bo ne ubogati, zvezi z vami, kdo - kdaj; in če so se borili, mi bo zagotovo pomoč." Toda Allah je priča, da so lažnivci.

trans-unit.source: If they are expelled, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not aid them. And [even] if they should aid them, they will surely turn their backs; then [thereafter] they will not be aided.
trans-unit.target: Če so izgnani, ne bo pustil z njimi, in če so se borili, bo ne pomoč jih. In [tudi] Če so morajo pomoč njih, bo zagotovo obrnejo hrbet; nato [kasneje] se bo ni podprto.

trans-unit.source: You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who do not understand.
trans-unit.target: [Verniki] ste bolj strah v svoj prsi mimo Allah. To je zato, ker so ljudje, ki ne razumejo.

trans-unit.source: They will not fight you all except within fortified cities or from behind walls. Their violence among themselves is severe. You think they are together, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people who do not reason.
trans-unit.target: Oni hoteti ne boj vi vse razen v utrdbah ali izza stene. Njihovo nasilje med seboj je hudo. Mislite, da so skupaj, vendar svoj srčne karte ste mnogovrstsen. To je zato, ker so ljudje, ki ne razlog.

trans-unit.source: [Theirs is] like the example of those shortly before them: they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: [Njihovo je] kot na primer tistih, ki so tik pred njimi: so okusili slabo posledica njihove afere, in bodo imeli boleča kazen.

trans-unit.source: [The hypocrites are] like the example of Satan when he says to man, "Disbelieve." But when he disbelieves, he says, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: [Hinavci so] kot na primer Satan, ko pravi, da človek, "Verjamem." Ampak ko jih je disbelieves pravi, "res, jaz sem prekinjena od vas. Res, bojim se Allah, Lord of the worlds."

trans-unit.source: So the outcome for both of them is that they will be in the Fire, abiding eternally therein. And that is the recompense of the wrong-doers.
trans-unit.target: Torej rezultat za oba je, da bodo v ogenj, upoštevanje večno tam. In to je zaracunati kršitelje.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, fear Allah. And let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: O, ki ste verjeli, strah Allah. In naj vsaka duša pogledati kaj je dana tako za jutri - in strah Allah. Res, Allah je vešč kaj.

trans-unit.source: And be not like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. Those are the defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: In ne sme biti kot tisti, ki je pozabil Allah, tako naredil jih pozabite sami. To so kljubovalno neposlušni.

trans-unit.source: Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers [of success].
trans-unit.target: Ni enako so tovariši ogenj in tovariši raj. Tovarišice raj - so attainers [za uspeh].

trans-unit.source: If We had sent down this Qur'an upon a mountain, you would have seen it humbled and coming apart from fear of Allah. And these examples We present to the people that perhaps they will give thought.
trans-unit.target: Če smo imeli poslali po tej Qur'an na goro, si bi videl ga poniža in prihajajo poleg strahu pred Allah. In ti primeri predstavljamo ljudje, ki morda se bodo mislili.

trans-unit.source: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed. He is the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
trans-unit.target: On je Allah, ki jim tam ni nobene božanstva, poznavalec nevidno in je priča. On je v celoti usmiljen, zlasti usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: He is Allah, other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior. Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: On je Allah, ki jim tam ni nobene božanstva, suvereno, je Pure, popolnost, Bestower vere, je nadzornik, Exalted v oblast, v Compeller, Superior. Vzvišeno je Allah nad karkoli povezujejo z njim.

trans-unit.source: He is Allah, the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner; to Him belong the best names. Whatever is in the heavens and earth is exalting Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: On je Allah, ustvarjalca, izumitelj, Fashioner; mu pripada najboljši imena. Karkoli je v nebesih in zemlji mu je exalting. In on je Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not take My enemies and your enemies as allies, extending to them affection while they have disbelieved in what came to you of the truth, having driven out the Prophet and yourselves [only] because you believe in Allah, your Lord. If you have come out for jihad in My cause and seeking means to My approval, [take them not as friends]. You confide to them affection, but I am most knowing of what you have concealed and what you have declared. And whoever does it among you has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way.
trans-unit.target: O ki ste verjeli, ne vzemite moje sovražnike in sovražnike kot zavezniki, razširitev do njih naklonjenost, medtem ko oni so verjeli v kaj prišel, da vas resnica, da je pogon, preroka in sebe [samo], ker vi vernik v Allah, svojega Gospoda. Če ste prišli za džihad v svoj vzrok in iskanje načinov za privolitev, [vzeti ne kot prijatelje]. Vam zaupam jim naklonjenosti, vendar sem večina vedo, kaj so skriti in kaj so izjavili. In kdor to počne med vami je gotovo zašel iz smotrnost način.

trans-unit.source: If they gain dominance over you, they would be to you as enemies and extend against you their hands and their tongues with evil, and they wish you would disbelieve.
trans-unit.target: Če so pridobiti prevlado nad vami, bi se vam kot sovražniki in razširiti proti vam, rokami in njihovi jeziki z zlo, in želijo, da bi verjamem.

trans-unit.source: Never will your relatives or your children benefit you; the Day of Resurrection He will judge between you. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Nikoli vaše sorodnike ali vaš otrok vam bo koristilo; Vstajenja dan on bo sodnik med vami. In Alah, kaj vam, je videl.

trans-unit.source: There has already been for you an excellent pattern in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, "Indeed, we are disassociated from you and from whatever you worship other than Allah. We have denied you, and there has appeared between us and you animosity and hatred forever until you believe in Allah alone" except for the saying of Abraham to his father, "I will surely ask forgiveness for you, but I have not [power to do] for you anything against Allah. Our Lord, upon You we have relied, and to You we have returned, and to You is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Je bilo za vas odličen vzorec v Abraham in tiste z njim, ko so dejali, da svoje ljudi, "res, smo prekinjena, od vas in od karkoli boste častili razen Allah. Smo zavrnili ste, in tam se je pojavil med nami in vami sovraštvo in sovraštvo večno dokler vi vernik v Allah sam"razen rekel Abraham svojega očeta," bo zagotovo prosi odpuščanja za vas, vendar nimate [sila uganjati] za vas nič zoper Alah. Naš Gospod, na vas mi sklicuje, in vam bomo so se vrnili, in vam je cilj.

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, make us not [objects of] torment for the disbelievers and forgive us, our Lord. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
trans-unit.target: Našega Gospoda, da nas ne [predmeti] muke za na disbelievers in odpusti nam, našem Gospodu. Res, to je vas, ki je Exalted v oblast, pametno."

trans-unit.source: There has certainly been for you in them an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: Zagotovo prišlo za vas v njih odlično vzorec za vsakogar, čigar upanje je v Allah in zadnji dan. In kdor se obrne stran - potem res, Allah je prost potreba, s Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps Allah will put, between you and those to whom you have been enemies among them, affection. And Allah is competent, and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Morda bo dal Alah, med vami in tiste, ki so bili sovražniki med njimi, naklonjenost. Allah je pristojni in Alah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Allah does not forbid you from those who do not fight you because of religion and do not expel you from your homes - from being righteous toward them and acting justly toward them. Indeed, Allah loves those who act justly.
trans-unit.target: Allah ne prepovedujejo od tistih, ki ne boriš zaradi vere in vam ne izžene iz svoje hiše - od pravični do njih in deluje upravičeno do njih. Res, Allah ljubi tiste, ki delujejo upravičeno.

trans-unit.source: Allah only forbids you from those who fight you because of religion and expel you from your homes and aid in your expulsion - [forbids] that you make allies of them. And whoever makes allies of them, then it is those who are the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Allah le prepoveduje vam od oni kdo boj vi zaradi vere in ga izžene iz svoje domove in pomoč v izgon - [prepoveduje], da bi zavezniki od njih. In kdor naredi zavezniki od njih, potem je tisti, ki so na wrongdoers.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when the believing women come to you as emigrants, examine them. Allah is most knowing as to their faith. And if you know them to be believers, then do not return them to the disbelievers; they are not lawful [wives] for them, nor are they lawful [husbands] for them. But give the disbelievers what they have spent. And there is no blame upon you if you marry them when you have given them their due compensation. And hold not to marriage bonds with disbelieving women, but ask for what you have spent and let them ask for what they have spent. That is the judgement of Allah; He judges between you. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, ko prepričanje žensk prišel k vam kot izseljenci, jih preuči. Allah je večina vedoč, da svojo vero. In če veste, da se verniki, potem ne vračanje disbelievers; oni niso zakonite [žene] za njih, niti niso zakonita [možje] za njih. Pa je disbelievers kaj so porabili. In ni brez krivde na vas, če ste jih poročiti, ko ste jih dali svoje ustrezno odškodnino. In imeti ne v zakonu obveznice z disbelieving ženske, ampak vprašati za kaj si porabil in jim vprašati za kaj so porabili. To je sodba Allah; Presodi, da je med vami. In Alah je poznavanje in pametno.

trans-unit.source: And if you have lost any of your wives to the disbelievers and you subsequently obtain [something], then give those whose wives have gone the equivalent of what they had spent. And fear Allah, in whom you are believers.
trans-unit.target: In če ste izgubili vse svoje žene da se disbelievers in nato dobite [nekaj], nato pa tiste, katerih žene so šli enakovredno kaj bi preživel. In strah Allah, v katero ste verniki.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, when the believing women come to you pledging to you that they will not associate anything with Allah, nor will they steal, nor will they commit unlawful sexual intercourse, nor will they kill their children, nor will they bring forth a slander they have invented between their arms and legs, nor will they disobey you in what is right - then accept their pledge and ask forgiveness for them of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O preroku, ko pridejo do vas obljubo, da vam, da bo povezujejo vse s Allah, ne bo ukradeš, niti bo storijo nezakonito spolnim odnosom, niti bo ubijejo svoje otroke, ne bo jih prinašajo obrekovanja, ki so jih izumili med svoje roke in noge, niti bodo ste kršijo v kaj je prav - potem sprejeti svojo obljubo in prosi odpuščanja za njih Allah, prepričanje žensk. Res, Allah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, do not make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry. They have despaired of [reward in] the Hereafter just as the disbelievers have despaired of [meeting] the inhabitants of the graves.
