trans-unit.target: O kdo verjel, ne bi zavezniki ljudi, s katerimi Allah je postal jezen. Oni so obupal [nagrado v] v nadaljevanju samo kot je disbelievers so obupal [prostori] prebivalci grobov.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji vas povede Allah, in on je Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do?
trans-unit.target: O ki ste verjeli, zakaj praviš, kaj ne?

trans-unit.source: Great is hatred in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do.
trans-unit.target: Veliko je sovraštvo v očeh Allah, da praviš, kaj ne storiti.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly.
trans-unit.target: Res, Allah ljubi tiste, ki se borijo v svoj vzrok v vrsti, da so [en] pridružil trdno strukturo.

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, "O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?" And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.
trans-unit.target: In [omenja, O Muhammad], kdaj Moses dejal, da svoje ljudi, "O moj ljudi, zakaj si me škode, medtem ko je gotovo veste, da sem sel od Allah za vas?" In ko se je oddaljil, Allah zaradi svoje srce odstopajo. Ter Allah ni vodnik kljubovalno neposlušni ljudje.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic."
trans-unit.target: In [navedba], ko je Jezus, sin Marije, reče: "O otroke Izraela, res sem sel od Allah vam potrjuje izviral mi Tore in prinaša dobrih novic sel prišel po mene, čigar ime je Ahmad." Toda ko je prišel do njih s jasne dokaze, so rekli, "to je očitno magije."

trans-unit.source: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: In kdo je bolj nepravičen, kot tisti, ki Izumi o Allah neresnico, medtem ko je je povabljen, da Islam. Ter Allah ni vodnik protipravna dejanja ljudi.

trans-unit.source: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.
trans-unit.target: Želijo pogasiti luči Allah z usta, vendar Allah bo popoln svojo svetlobo, čeprav je disbelievers všeč.

trans-unit.source: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it.
trans-unit.target: To je on, ki je poslal njegov sel z vodstvom in vera v resnico, da je očitno nad vse vere, čeprav tisti, ki povezujejo druge z Alahove ni všeč.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki ste verjeli, se jaz vas vodijo do posla, ki vam bo prihranilo od boleče kazen?

trans-unit.source: [It is that] you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know.
trans-unit.target: [To je, da] ste vernik v Allah in njegov sel, in si prizadevajo v vzrok od Allah z vašega premoženja in vaše življenje. To je najboljša za vas, če morate vedeti.

trans-unit.source: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: On bo zate odpuščati svoje grehe in si priznati, da vrtovi pod kateri pretok rek in prijetno stanovanj v vrtovih večne prebivališča. To je velik doseganje.

trans-unit.source: And [you will obtain] another [favor] that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers.
trans-unit.target: In [boš pridobila] drugo [uslugo], ki ga ljubiš - zmaga od Allah in neizbežno osvajanja; in da dobrih novic z vernike.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant.
trans-unit.target: O, ki ste verjeli, se zagovorniki Allah, kot ko je dejal Jezus, sin Marije, učencem, "ki so moje navijačev za Allah?" Učencem dejal, "Smo zagovorniki Allah." In frakcije otrok Izrael verjeli in frakcije verjeli. Tako smo podprli tisti, ki je verjel zoper njihovega sovražnika, in so postali prevladujoči.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji je exalting Allah, suvereno, v čisto, Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: It is He who has sent among the unlettered a Messenger from themselves reciting to them His verses and purifying them and teaching them the Book and wisdom - although they were before in clear error -
trans-unit.target: To je on, ki je poslal med v unlettered sel od sebe recitiramo nanje njegovi verzi in čiščenje jih in jih poučevanje, knjige in modrost - čeprav so bili pred v jasno napaka-

trans-unit.source: And [to] others of them who have not yet joined them. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: In [na] druge, ki so še ni pridružen jih. In on je Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: That is the bounty of Allah, which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
trans-unit.target: To je nagrada Allah, ki mu daje, za katere je oporok, in Allah je posestnik Velika nagrada.

trans-unit.source: The example of those who were entrusted with the Torah and then did not take it on is like that of a donkey who carries volumes [of books]. Wretched is the example of the people who deny the signs of Allah. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki je bila Tora in nato ni storil traja primer je kot osel, ki nosi [Knjige] količine. Bedno je primer ljudi, ki zanikajo znaki Allah. Ter Allah ni vodnik protipravna dejanja ljudi.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O you who are Jews, if you claim that you are allies of Allah, excluding the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "O ki so Judje, če trdijo, da so zavezniki od Allah, razen [druge] ljudi, potem si za smrt, če bi morali biti resnični."

trans-unit.source: But they will not wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: Vendar bo ne želijo za to, kdaj, zaradi kaj roke dal tja. In Alah je poznavanje je wrongdoers.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, the death from which you flee - indeed, it will meet you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, and He will inform you about what you used to do."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "res, smrti, ki jo zbežati - res, je spoznala. Potem bo treba vrniti poznavalec nevidno in je priča, in bo vas obvestim o tem, kaj je za narediti."

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, when [the adhan] is called for the prayer on the day of Jumu'ah [Friday], then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade. That is better for you, if you only knew.
trans-unit.target: O nato ki ste verjeli, ko [adhan] pozval molitev na dan Jumu'ah [petek], nadaljevati spomina Allah in pustite trgovine. To je bolje za vas, če ste le vedel.

trans-unit.source: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah, and remember Allah often that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: In ko sklene molitev, razpršijo v zemljo in prosite bounty Allah, in ne pozabite pogosto Allah, ki vam lahko uspe.

trans-unit.source: But when they saw a transaction or a diversion, [O Muhammad], they rushed to it and left you standing. Say, "What is with Allah is better than diversion and than a transaction, and Allah is the best of providers."
trans-unit.target: Toda ko so videli transakcijo ali preusmeritev, [O Muhammad], planila nanj in pustil stoji. Reči, "kaj je z Alah je bolje kot zlorabe in kot transakcijo, in Alah je najboljši ponudniki."

trans-unit.source: When the hypocrites come to you, [O Muhammad], they say, "We testify that you are the Messenger of Allah." And Allah knows that you are His Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars.
trans-unit.target: Ko pridejo do vas, hinavci, [O Muhammad], pravijo, "Smo priča, da je sel Allah." Ter Allah ve, da si njegov sel, in Alahove priča, da hinavci so lažnivci.

trans-unit.source: They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.
trans-unit.target: So jih sprejele svoje prisega kot kritje, zato jih preprečiti [ljudje] iz pot Allah. Res, to je zlo, ki delajo.

trans-unit.source: That is because they believed, and then they disbelieved; so their hearts were sealed over, and they do not understand.
trans-unit.target: To je zato, ker so verjeli, in potem so verjeli; tako njihova srca so bili zaprti v, in ne razumejo.

trans-unit.source: And when you see them, their forms please you, and if they speak, you listen to their speech. [They are] as if they were pieces of wood propped up - they think that every shout is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded?
trans-unit.target: In ko jih vidiš, obrazce, prosim vas, in če govorijo, poslušate svoj govor. [So] kot če bi bili kosov lesa, privzdignil - mislijo, da vsakih Dovikivati je proti njim. So sovražnika, zato pazi nanje. Lahko Allah uničijo; kako se deluded?

trans-unit.source: And when it is said to them, "Come, the Messenger of Allah will ask forgiveness for you," they turn their heads aside and you see them evading while they are arrogant.
trans-unit.target: In ko je dejal, da njih, "Pridi, sel od Allah bo prosi odpuščanja za vas", oni pa so glave vstran in vidite jih izogibali, medtem ko oni so predrznosr.

trans-unit.source: It is all the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or do not ask forgiveness for them; never will Allah forgive them. Indeed, Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people.
trans-unit.target: To je vse isto zanje prosi odpuščanja za njih ali ne prosi odpuščanja za njih; nikoli ne bo Alah jih odpusti. Res, Allah ni vodnik kljubovalno neposlušni ljudje.

trans-unit.source: They are the ones who say, "Do not spend on those who are with the Messenger of Allah until they disband." And to Allah belongs the depositories of the heavens and the earth, but the hypocrites do not understand.
trans-unit.target: So tisti, ki pravijo, »Ne preživijo na tiste, ki so s sel od Allah, dokler se razpusti. « Ter Allah pripada depozitarji nebes in zemlje, ampak ne razumem, hinavci.

trans-unit.source: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored [for power] will surely expel therefrom the more humble." And to Allah belongs [all] honor, and to His Messenger, and to the believers, but the hypocrites do not know.
trans-unit.target: Pravijo, da "Če se bomo vrnili v al-Madinah, bolj počaščen [za moč] bo zagotovo izžene iz njih bolj ponižen." Ter Allah pripada [vse] časti, in njegov sel, ter verniki, ampak ne vem, hinavci.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, let not your wealth and your children divert you from remembrance of Allah. And whoever does that - then those are the losers.
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki ste verjeli, naj ne vašega premoženja in vaše otroke vas preusmeri iz spomina Allah. In kdor ne da - potem tistih, so poraženci.

trans-unit.source: And spend [in the way of Allah] from what We have provided you before death approaches one of you and he says, "My Lord, if only You would delay me for a brief term so I would give charity and be among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: In preživijo [na poti Allah] iz kaj damo vam pred smrt pristopov od vas in pravi, "moj Gospod, če le bi me zamude za kratek čas, zato bi dal dobrodelne namene in se med pravednika."

trans-unit.source: But never will Allah delay a soul when its time has come. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Vendar nikoli ne bo Alah zamudo duša, ko je prišel njegov čas. In Alah je vešč kaj.

trans-unit.source: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth is exalting Allah. To Him belongs dominion, and to Him belongs [all] praise, and He is over all things competent.
trans-unit.target: Karkoli je v nebesih in karkoli je na zemlji je exalting Allah. Mu pripada oblast, in mu pripada [vse] pohvale, in on je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni.

trans-unit.source: It is He who created you, and among you is the disbeliever, and among you is the believer. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.
trans-unit.target: To je on, ki je ustvaril, in med vami je na Nevjernik in med vami je vernik. In Alah, kaj vam, je videl.

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth and formed you and perfected your forms; and to Him is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: Je ustvaril nebo in zemljo, v resnici in si oblikujejo in izpopolnil obrazce; in mu je [končno] destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is within the heavens and earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare. And Allah is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: On ve, kaj je v nebesih in zemlji in ve, kaj vam prikriva in kaj deklarirate. In Alah je poznavanje tega v prsi.

trans-unit.source: Has there not come to you the news of those who disbelieved before? So they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tam ni prišel vam novice o tistih, ki so verjeli pred? Tako so okusili slabo posledica njihove afere, in bodo imeli boleča kazen.

trans-unit.source: That is because their messengers used to come to them with clear evidences, but they said, "Shall human beings guide us?" and disbelieved and turned away. And Allah dispensed [with them]; and Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: To je zato, ker svoje glasnike, ki se uporabljajo za se jim z jasno dokazov, vendar so rekli, "Ljudmi vodil nas?" in verjeli in se obrnil proč. Ter Allah ukinil [z njimi]; in Alah je brezplačno potrebe in Praiseworthy.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieve have claimed that they will never be resurrected. Say, "Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected; then you will surely be informed of what you did. And that, for Allah, is easy."
trans-unit.target: Tistim, ki verjamem so trdili, da nikoli ne bodo vstali. Rekel, "ja, z moj gospodar, vam bo zagotovo treba vstali; potem boste zagotovo obveščeni kaj si naredil. In to, zakaj Allah, je enostavno."

trans-unit.source: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and the Qur'an which We have sent down. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do.
trans-unit.target: Tako verjamejo v Allah in njegov sel in Koran, ki smo poslali navzdol. In Alah je vešč kaj.

trans-unit.source: The Day He will assemble you for the Day of Assembly - that is the Day of Deprivation. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will remove from him his misdeeds and admit him to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Dan on bo vam zbrati za montažo dan - to je dan odvzema. In Kdor verjame v Allah in ne pravičnosti - on bo mu odstranite svoje zločine in priznati mu vrtovi pod kateri rek pretoka, pri čemer bo upošteval večno. To je velik doseganje.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of the Fire, abiding eternally therein; and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Ampak tisti, ki so verjeli in zanikal naše verzi - to so tovariši ogenj, upoštevanje večno v njej; in bedno je destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: No disaster strikes except by permission of Allah. And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
trans-unit.target: Ni nesrečah razen z dovoljenjem Allah. In Kdor verjame v Allah - on bo vodil njegovo srce. In Alah je poznavanje vseh stvari.

trans-unit.source: And obey Allah and obey the Messenger; but if you turn away - then upon Our Messenger is only [the duty of] clear notification.
trans-unit.target: Allah ubogati in ubogati sel; Če stran - potem pa na naši Messenger je le [dolžnost] jasno obvestilo.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. And upon Allah let the believers rely.
trans-unit.target: Allah - ni nobene božanstva, razen njega. In na Alah naj bi se verniki.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, indeed, among your wives and your children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon and overlook and forgive - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki ste verjeli, res, med vaše žene in otroci so sovražniki vam, zato pazi nanje. Vendar če boste pomilostitev in spregledati in odpusti - potem res, Allah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.
trans-unit.target: Vašega premoženja in vaše otroke, so vendar sojenja, in Alah je z njim veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: So fear Allah as much as you are able and listen and obey and spend [in the way of Allah]; it is better for your selves. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.
trans-unit.target: Tako strah Allah, kolikor lahko in poslušati in ubogati in preživijo [na poti Allah]; To je bolje za vaše sebe. In kdor je zaščiten pred stinginess svojo dušo - to je tisti, ki bo uspešno.

trans-unit.source: If you loan Allah a goodly loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. And Allah is Most Appreciative and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Če ste posojila Allah lep posojilo, bo množijo zate in oprostim. In Alah je najbolj hvaležni in Forbearing.

trans-unit.source: Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Poznavalec nevidno in priča, Exalted v oblast, pametno.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, when you [Muslims] divorce women, divorce them for [the commencement of] their waiting period and keep count of the waiting period, and fear Allah, your Lord. Do not turn them out of their [husbands'] houses, nor should they [themselves] leave [during that period] unless they are committing a clear immorality. And those are the limits [set by] Allah. And whoever transgresses the limits of Allah has certainly wronged himself. You know not; perhaps Allah will bring about after that a [different] matter.
trans-unit.target: O preroku, ko ste [muslimani] razvezo ženske, jih razvezi za [začetek] svoje čaka obdobje in vztrajati štetje čakalna doba, in strah pred Allah, svojega Gospoda. Ne pa jih iz hiše [možje], niti sami [] zapustiti [v navedenem obdobju] Če so obvezala jasno nemoralnosti. In to so meje [privzeto] Allah. In kdor transgresses mejah Allah je zagotovo krivico sam. Veste, ne; morda Alah bo prinesla po tem [različni] stvar.

trans-unit.source: And when they have [nearly] fulfilled their term, either retain them according to acceptable terms or part with them according to acceptable terms. And bring to witness two just men from among you and establish the testimony for [the acceptance of] Allah. That is instructed to whoever should believe in Allah and the Last day. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out
trans-unit.target: In ko bi izpolnile [skoraj] mandata, bodisi, da jih ohranijo po sprejemljivih pogojih ali dela z njimi po sprejemljivih pogojih. In bi priča dva samo moški, med vas in ugotoviti pričevanje za [sprejetje] Allah. To je naročeno, da kdor mora vernik v Allah in zadnji dan. In kdor boji Allah - on bo zanj izhod

trans-unit.source: And will provide for him from where he does not expect. And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose. Allah has already set for everything a [decreed] extent.
trans-unit.target: In bo zanj iz kjer je ne pričakujemo. In kdor je odvisno od Allah - potem pa je dovolj za njega. Res, Allah dosegli svoj namen. Allah je že nastavljen za vse [sprejet] obsegu.

trans-unit.source: And those who no longer expect menstruation among your women - if you doubt, then their period is three months, and [also for] those who have not menstruated. And for those who are pregnant, their term is until they give birth. And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease.
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki ne pričakujem menstruacijo pri ženskah - Če dvomiš, potem je njihovo obdobje treh mesecev, in [tudi] tiste, ki so ne menstruated. In za tiste, ki so noseče, njihov mandat je dokler se rodi. In kdor boji Allah - on bo zanj svojo zadevo lažje.

trans-unit.source: That is the command of Allah, which He has sent down to you; and whoever fears Allah - He will remove for him his misdeeds and make great for him his reward.
trans-unit.target: To je ukaz od Allah, ki mu je poslan in kdor boji Allah - on bo odstraniti zanj svoje zločine in veliko zanj nagrado.

trans-unit.source: Lodge them [in a section] of where you dwell out of your means and do not harm them in order to oppress them. And if they should be pregnant, then spend on them until they give birth. And if they breastfeed for you, then give them their payment and confer among yourselves in the acceptable way; but if you are in discord, then there may breastfeed for the father another woman.
trans-unit.target: Vložiti jih [v odseku] kjer živijo iz vaša sredstva in ne škodovalo da jih zatirajo. In če bi morali biti noseča, potem porabili za njih, dokler se rodi. In če se dojenje za vas, potem jim njihovo plačilo in dajejo med seboj na sprejemljiv način; vendar če ste v razdora, potem lahko dojiti za očeta drugo žensko.

trans-unit.source: Let a man of wealth spend from his wealth, and he whose provision is restricted - let him spend from what Allah has given him. Allah does not charge a soul except [according to] what He has given it. Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.
trans-unit.target: Naj človek porabiti bogastvo iz svojega premoženja, in katerih uporaba je omejena - naj ga porabili od kaj Allah je mu dal. Allah ne zaračunava duše razen [po] kaj je to dal. Alah bo o, po stiske, enostavnost.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city was insolent toward the command of its Lord and His messengers, so We took it to severe account and punished it with a terrible punishment.
trans-unit.target: In kako veliko mesto je bil Ohol proti ukaz Lord in svoje glasnike, tako mi je hudo račun in kaznovani s strašno kazen.

trans-unit.source: And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair, and the outcome of its affair was loss.
trans-unit.target: In okusili slabo posledica njegove afere, in njegovo afero je izguba.

trans-unit.source: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment; so fear Allah, O you of understanding who have believed. Allah has sent down to you the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Allah je pripravljen zanje huda kazen; tako strah Allah, O si o soglasju, ki so verjeli. Allah je poslan vam Koranu.

trans-unit.source: [He sent] a Messenger [Muhammad] reciting to you the distinct verses of Allah that He may bring out those who believe and do righteous deeds from darknesses into the light. And whoever believes in Allah and does righteousness - He will admit him into gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein forever. Allah will have perfected for him a provision.
trans-unit.target: [Mu poslal] sel [Muhammad] recitiramo vam različni verzov Allah, ki je lahko prinesejo tiste, ki verjamejo in ne pravičen dejanja iz darknesses v svetlobo. In Kdor verjame v Allah in ne pravičnosti - on bo priznati mu v vrtovih pod kateri rek tok v njem vedno spoštovati. Alah bo izpopolnili zanj določba.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who has created seven heavens and of the earth, the like of them. [His] command descends among them so you may know that Allah is over all things competent and that Allah has encompassed all things in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Je Allah, ki je ustvaril sedem nebes in zemlje, kot od njih. [Njegovi] ukaz spušča med njimi, tako da lahko vedeli, da Allah je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni in da Allah je obsegala vse stvari v znanje.

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, why do you prohibit [yourself from] what Allah has made lawful for you, seeking the approval of your wives? And Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: O prerok, zakaj prepovedati [sami] kaj Allah je predvideti zakonite si želijo pridobiti odobritev za vaše žene? In Alah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: Allah has already ordained for you [Muslims] the dissolution of your oaths. And Allah is your protector, and He is the Knowing, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Allah je že posvečen zate [muslimani] raztapljanje vaše prisege. Allah je vaš zaščitnik in je poznavanje, pametno.

trans-unit.source: And [remember] when the Prophet confided to one of his wives a statement; and when she informed [another] of it and Allah showed it to him, he made known part of it and ignored a part. And when he informed her about it, she said, "Who told you this?" He said, "I was informed by the Knowing, the Acquainted."
trans-unit.target: In zapomni [si] kdaj prerok zaupal enemu od svoje žene izjavo; in ko je obvestil [drugo] in Alah je pokazala mu, je znanih del in prezreti del. In ko je on njo obvestil o tem, je rekla, "kdo ti je povedal to?" On reče: "Sem bil obveščen s poznavanje, je Acquainted."

trans-unit.source: If you two [wives] repent to Allah, [it is best], for your hearts have deviated. But if you cooperate against him - then indeed Allah is his protector, and Gabriel and the righteous of the believers and the angels, moreover, are [his] assistants.
trans-unit.target: Če se dva [žene] pokesajo v Allah, [je najbolje], za svoja srca so oddaljil. Vendar če sodelujete proti njemu - potem res Allah je njegov zaščitnik in Gabriel in pravičnih verniki in angeli, poleg tega so [njegovih] pomočnikov.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps his Lord, if he divorced you [all], would substitute for him wives better than you - submitting [to Allah], believing, devoutly obedient, repentant, worshipping, and traveling - [ones] previously married and virgins.
trans-unit.target: Morda njegov gospodar, če je ločila [vse], bi nadomestek za njega žene bolje kot vi - predloži [Alahove], prepričanje, pobožno ubogljiv, Pokajnički, worshipping in potovanja - [tistih] prej poročen in devic.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, over which are [appointed] angels, harsh and severe; they do not disobey Allah in what He commands them but do what they are commanded.
trans-unit.target: O ki ste verjeli, zaščititi sebe in svoje družine pred požarom, katerih gorivo je ljudi in kamni, preko katerih so [imenovan] angeli, kruto in hudo; ne kršijo Allah v tisto, kar je ukaze, jih pa storiti, kaj so ukazal.

trans-unit.source: O you who have disbelieved, make no excuses that Day. You will only be recompensed for what you used to do.
trans-unit.target: O vas, ki so verjeli, da ne bo izgovorov da dan. Vas bo samo izplačati za kaj ste že rabljen uganjati.

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, repent to Allah with sincere repentance. Perhaps your Lord will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you into gardens beneath which rivers flow [on] the Day when Allah will not disgrace the Prophet and those who believed with him. Their light will proceed before them and on their right; they will say, "Our Lord, perfect for us our light and forgive us. Indeed, You are over all things competent."
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki ste verjeli, se pokesajo v Allah z iskrenim kesanjem. Morda vaš gospod bo odstraniti iz ste svoje zločine in si priznati v vrtovi pod katero tok reke [na] dan, kdaj bo Alah ne Blamaža prerok in tistih, ki menijo, z njim. Njihova svetloba nadaljuje pred njimi in njihove pravice; bodo rekli, "Naš Gospod, kot nalašč za nas naše luči in odpusti nam. Res, ste nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni."

trans-unit.source: O Prophet, strive against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be harsh upon them. And their refuge is Hell, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: O prerok, boj proti je disbelievers in hinavci in stroga na njih. Svoje zatočišče je pekel in nesrečne je destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. They were under two of Our righteous servants but betrayed them, so those prophets did not avail them from Allah at all, and it was said, "Enter the Fire with those who enter."
trans-unit.target: Allah predstavlja primer tistih, ki so verjeli: žena Noah in žena veliko. So bili po dva naš pravični uslužbencev ampak izdal, tako ti preroki niso uporabljale jih od Allah sploh, in je bilo rečeno, "Vnesite ogenj s tistimi, ki vstopajo."

trans-unit.source: And Allah presents an example of those who believed: the wife of Pharaoh, when she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh and his deeds and save me from the wrongdoing people."
trans-unit.target: Ter Allah predstavlja primer tistih, ki so verjeli: žena Faraon, ko je rekla, "Moj Gospodar, gradnjo za mene v vaši bližini hiše v raju in zaščititi mi s faraon in njegova dela in reši me iz protipravna dejanja ljudi."

trans-unit.source: And [the example of] Mary, the daughter of 'Imran, who guarded her chastity, so We blew into [her garment] through Our angel, and she believed in the words of her Lord and His scriptures and was of the devoutly obedient.
trans-unit.target: In [primer] Marija, hči "mucek, ki varovano njeno čistost, tako da mi je uničil v [njeno oblačilo] skozi naš angel, in je verjel v besede ji gospod in njegova pisma in je pobožno ubogljiv.

trans-unit.source: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -
trans-unit.target: Blagoslovljen je on, v čigar roki je oblast, in on je nad vse stvari, ki so pristojni-

trans-unit.source: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -
trans-unit.target: [Mu] kdo je ustvaril smrt in življenje, da se preskus [,] katera od vas je najboljši v dejanju - in on je Exalted v oblast, tolerantna -

trans-unit.source: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?
trans-unit.target: [In] kdo je ustvaril sedem nebes v plasti. Ne vidite v nastanek najbolj usmiljen morebitnih neskladnosti. Tako vrnete [] vida [sky]; Vidiš vsi prelomi?

trans-unit.source: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.
trans-unit.target: Nato spet dvakrat vrnil [] vida. [] Vida boste vrnili poniža, medtem ko je utrujen.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: In smo zagotovo Uljepšan najbližje nebo z zvezdami in so [od] jih kaj je vržen v devils in pripravili za jih kazen Plamtjeti.

trans-unit.source: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Za tiste, ki so verjeli v njihovega gospodarja je kazen pekla in nesrečne je destinacijo.

trans-unit.source: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.
trans-unit.target: Ko so se vrgli v to, slišijo od njega [grozljiv] vdihavajo medtem ko vre.

trans-unit.source: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"
trans-unit.target: To skoraj razpoči z bes. Vsakič, ko podjetje je vržen v to, svoj rejci od njih zahteva, "Ni tam prišel k vam na warner?"

trans-unit.source: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"
trans-unit.target: Bodo rekli,"ja, a warner je prišel k nam, ampak smo zanikal in dejal," Allah ni poslan dol ničesar. Niste pa v veliki zmoti. ""

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."
trans-unit.target: In ti bo rekel, "Če samo smo imeli poslušanje ali obrazložitve, ne bomo med tovariši Plamtjeti."

trans-unit.source: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: In vam bodo priznali svojih grehov, tako [je] odtujenosti za tovarišice Plamtjeti.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.
trans-unit.target: Res, tisti, ki se bojijo svoje Gospoda nevidna bo odpuščanje in veliko nagrado.

trans-unit.source: And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: In prikriti svoj govor ali objavijo; Pravzaprav je poznavanje tega v prsi.

trans-unit.source: Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?
trans-unit.target: Ne on, ki je ustvaril ve, je pa fino, da Acquainted?

trans-unit.source: It is He who made the earth tame for you - so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision - and to Him is the resurrection.
trans-unit.target: To je on, ki je zemljo ukrotiti zate - tako hodi med pobočja in jesti njegova določba - in mu je vstajenje.

trans-unit.source: Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?
trans-unit.target: Se vam zdi varno da ki [ima organ] v nebeško ne bi povzročil zemlje, da vas pogoltniti in nenadoma bi vladala?

trans-unit.source: Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning.
trans-unit.target: Ali se vam zdi varno da ki [ima organ] v nebeško hoteti ne spodbuda proti vam vihar kamni? Potem bi vedel, kako [hudo] je moje opozorilo.

trans-unit.source: And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: In že tisti pred njimi zanikal, in kako [grozno] je bil moj sramoti.

trans-unit.source: Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Ne ne vidijo ptice zgoraj jih s krili outspread in [včasih] zložiti? Nič drži [gor] razen najbolj usmiljen. Res je, vse stvari, videnje.

trans-unit.source: Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion.
trans-unit.target: Ali kdo je to, da bi lahko vojsko za vas za pomoč, razen najbolj usmiljen? Na disbelievers niso pa v zmoti.

trans-unit.source: Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion.
trans-unit.target: Ali kdo je to, da bi lahko za vas, če je zadrži njegovo določbo? Ampak oni so vztrajno nesramnost in odpor.

trans-unit.source: Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?
trans-unit.target: Potem je tisti, ki hodi padel na obraz bolje vodeni ali tisti, ki hodi pokončno na ravno pot?

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "to je on, ki je proizvedel vas in za vas sluh in vid in srca; malo ste hvaležni."

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "to je on, ki je pomnožena po vsej zemlji, in mu boste zbrali."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: In pravijo, "ko je to obljubo, če bi morali biti resnične?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "znanje je samo z Allah, in jaz sem samo jasno warner."

trans-unit.source: But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, "This is that for which you used to call."
trans-unit.target: Ampak ko vidijo, da se približuje, obrazov tistih, ki verjamem bo stiski, in bo rekel, "to je ali za katerega ste uporabili klic."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?"
trans-unit.target: Recimo, [O Muhammad], "si šteje: ali naj Allah vzrok moje smrti in tiste z mano ali usmili na nas, ki lahko zaščiti na disbelievers iz boleče kaznovanje?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "je najbolj usmiljen; smo verjeli v njega, in na njem bomo oprli. In ste [bo] veš, kdo je, da je jasno napaka. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?"
trans-unit.target: Reči, "si šteje: če je vaša voda je postal potopljeno [v zemljo], potem ki bi tekoče vode?"

trans-unit.source: Nun. By the pen and what they inscribe,
trans-unit.target: Nuna. Pero in kaj zapisal,

trans-unit.source: You are not, [O Muhammad], by the favor of your Lord, a madman.
trans-unit.target: Vi ste ne, [O Muhammad], z uslugo svojega gospodarja, norec.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: In res, za vas je nagrada neprekinjeno.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you are of a great moral character.
trans-unit.target: In res, vi ste velik moralne narave.

trans-unit.source: So you will see and they will see
trans-unit.target: Tako boste videli in bodo videli

trans-unit.source: Which of you is the afflicted [by a devil].
trans-unit.target: Ki vas je prizadetih [po hudič].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.
trans-unit.target: Res, vaš Gospod je večina vedoč, ki je šla zašel s poti, in je večina poznavanje [pravilno] vodeni.

trans-unit.source: Then do not obey the deniers.
trans-unit.target: Potem ne ubogajo bi deniers.

trans-unit.source: They wish that you would soften [in your position], so they would soften [toward you].
trans-unit.target: Želijo, da bi omilila [v vaš položaj], tako da bi omilila [proti sebi].

trans-unit.source: And do not obey every worthless habitual swearer
trans-unit.target: In da ne ubogajo na vsak ničvredno običajno swearer

trans-unit.source: [And] scorner, going about with malicious gossip -
trans-unit.target: [In] scorner, bo o z zlonamerne čenče -

trans-unit.source: A preventer of good, transgressing and sinful,
trans-unit.target: Protipovratne dobrega, benih in pregrešno,

trans-unit.source: Cruel, moreover, and an illegitimate pretender.
trans-unit.target: Krutim, poleg tega in nezakonski Pretendent.

trans-unit.source: Because he is a possessor of wealth and children,
trans-unit.target: Ker je lastnik premoženja in otrok,

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Ko se naše verze recitirajo mu, pravi, "Legende nekdanji narodi."

trans-unit.source: We will brand him upon the snout.
trans-unit.target: Smo mu bo čisto na gobca.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have tried them as We tried the companions of the garden, when they swore to cut its fruit in the [early] morning
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, smo poskušali jih kot smo poskusili tovariši na vrtu, ko so prisegel, da rezano sadje [že] navsezgodaj zjutraj

trans-unit.source: Without making exception.
trans-unit.target: Brez izjeme.

trans-unit.source: So there came upon the garden an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.
trans-unit.target: Tako je prišel na vrtu sili iz svojega Gospoda medtem, ko so bili zaspal.

trans-unit.source: And it became as though reaped.
trans-unit.target: In postalo je kot da požela.

trans-unit.source: And they called one another at morning,
trans-unit.target: In klicali drug drugega na zjutraj,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Go early to your crop if you would cut the fruit."
trans-unit.target: [Pravijo,] "iti zgodaj v svoj pridelek če bi Izreži sadja."

trans-unit.source: So they set out, while lowering their voices,
trans-unit.target: Tako so določeni, medtem ko znižanje njihove glasove,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "There will surely not enter it today upon you [any] poor person."
trans-unit.target: [Pravijo,] "tam bo zagotovo ne vnesete danes na vas [vse] slaba oseba."

trans-unit.source: And they went early in determination, [assuming themselves] able.
trans-unit.target: In so šli zgodaj v določanje, [prevzeti sami] lahko.

trans-unit.source: But when they saw it, they said, "Indeed, we are lost;
trans-unit.target: Toda ko so videli, so rekli, "res, smo izgubili;

trans-unit.source: Rather, we have been deprived."
trans-unit.target: Namesto tega smo bili prikrajšani."

trans-unit.source: The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, 'Why do you not exalt [Allah]?' "
trans-unit.target: Najbolj zmerno od njih rekel, "Sem ne rekel,"zakaj ne ste povzdignil [Alahove]?" "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: So rekli, "vzvišeno je naš gospod! Pravzaprav smo bili wrongdoers."

trans-unit.source: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.
trans-unit.target: Nato so se približali drug drugemu, ki krivijo drug drugega.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O woe to us; indeed we were transgressors.
trans-unit.target: So rekli, "O Gorje nam; res smo bili kršiteljev.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps our Lord will substitute for us [one] better than it. Indeed, we are toward our Lord desirous."
trans-unit.target: Morda naš gospod bo nadomestek za nas [eno] bolje kot to. Dejansko smo proti našega Gospoda, ki je v želji, da."

trans-unit.source: Such is the punishment [of this world]. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
trans-unit.target: Tako je kaznovanje [ta svet]. In kazen v nadaljevanju je večja, če bi le vedeli.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for the righteous with their Lord are the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Res, za pravičen s svojega Gospoda so vrtovi užitek.

trans-unit.source: Then will We treat the Muslims like the criminals?
trans-unit.target: Nato obravnaval muslimane kot kriminalci?

trans-unit.source: What is [the matter] with you? How do you judge?
trans-unit.target: [Vprašanje] kaj je z vami? Kako sodnik?

trans-unit.source: Or do you have a scripture in which you learn
trans-unit.target: Ali imaš pismo, v katerem boste izvedeli

trans-unit.source: That indeed for you is whatever you choose?
trans-unit.target: To res zate je karkoli izberete?

trans-unit.source: Or do you have oaths [binding] upon Us, extending until the Day of Resurrection, that indeed for you is whatever you judge?
trans-unit.target: Ali imate zapriseg [zavezujoč] na nas, sega do dan od vstajenje, da res zate je karkoli sodite?

trans-unit.source: Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.
trans-unit.target: Vprašajte jih, katera od njih, za to [zahteva], je odgovoren.

trans-unit.source: Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: Ali imajo partnerji? Nato naj jih prinese svoje partnerje, če morajo biti resnične.

trans-unit.source: The Day the shin will be uncovered and they are invited to prostration but the disbelievers will not be able,
trans-unit.target: Dan je shin bodo odkrili in da izčrpanost, vendar je disbelievers ne bo mogel,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. And they used to be invited to prostration while they were sound.
trans-unit.target: Oči poniža, poniževanje jih bo pokril. In uporabljajo, ki bodo povabljeni k izčrpanost, medtem ko so bili zvok.

trans-unit.source: So leave Me, [O Muhammad], with [the matter of] whoever denies the Qur'an. We will progressively lead them [to punishment] from where they do not know.
trans-unit.target: Torej, pusti Me, [O Muhammad], z [vprašanje] kdor zanika Koranu. Mi bo postopoma vodila jih [kazen] iz kjer ne vedo.

trans-unit.source: And I will give them time. Indeed, My plan is firm.
trans-unit.target: In dam jim čas. Pravzaprav, moj načrt je trdno.

trans-unit.source: Or do you ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
trans-unit.target: Ali vas vprašati so plačilo, zato so ga dolga obremenjena navzdol?

trans-unit.source: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
trans-unit.target: Ali imajo [znanje] nevidno, tako so zapisale []?

trans-unit.source: Then be patient for the decision of your Lord, [O Muhammad], and be not like the companion of the fish when he called out while he was distressed.
trans-unit.target: Potem bodite potrpežljivi pri odločitvi svojega Gospoda, [O Muhammad], in ne biti kot spremljevalec ribe, ko je zaklical, ko je bil v stiski.

trans-unit.source: If not that a favor from his Lord overtook him, he would have been thrown onto the naked shore while he was censured.
trans-unit.target: Če ne da prehitela uslugo od svojega Gospoda, mu, on bi bil vržen na obali gola medtem, ko je bil kaznovala.

trans-unit.source: And his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: In njegov gospodar se je odločil mu in mu pravičnih.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, those who disbelieve would almost make you slip with their eyes when they hear the message, and they say, "Indeed, he is mad."
trans-unit.target: In res, tistim, ki verjamem skoraj bi vas zdrs s svojimi očmi, ko slišijo sporočilo, in pravijo, "Res, on je nor."

trans-unit.source: But it is not except a reminder to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Vendar to ni razen opomnik za svetove.

trans-unit.source: The Inevitable Reality -
trans-unit.target: Neizogibno realnost-

trans-unit.source: What is the Inevitable Reality?
trans-unit.target: Kaj je neizogiben realnost?

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?
trans-unit.target: In kaj lahko veš, kaj je neizogiben realnost?

trans-unit.source: Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity.
trans-unit.target: Thamud in "alarmna zanikal presenetljivo nesreča.

trans-unit.source: So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].
trans-unit.target: Tako kot za Thamud, so bile uničene s Nadmoćan [pišu].

trans-unit.source: And as for 'Aad, they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind
trans-unit.target: In kot za "Sad, so bile uničene s kričal, nasilno veter

trans-unit.source: Which Allah imposed upon them for seven nights and eight days in succession, so you would see the people therein fallen as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.
trans-unit.target: Ki Allah, ki so jim naložene za sedem noči in osem dni zapored, tako da bi videti ljudi v njem padel, kot če bi bili votlega debla palme.

trans-unit.source: Then do you see of them any remains?
trans-unit.target: Nato ali vidite od njih ostanki?

trans-unit.source: And there came Pharaoh and those before him and the overturned cities with sin.
trans-unit.target: In je prišel faraon in tisti pred njim in prevrne mesta s greh.

trans-unit.source: And they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord, so He seized them with a seizure exceeding [in severity].
trans-unit.target: In pa upošteval navodila sel svojega Gospoda, zato je njih zaseženo zaseg presega [v resnost].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship
trans-unit.target: Res, ko voda prekoračil, smo izvedli vaši predniki v pluje ladja

trans-unit.source: That We might make it for you a reminder and [that] a conscious ear would be conscious of it.
trans-unit.target: Da bomo lahko to za vas opomnik in [da] bo zavestno uho zavedate.

trans-unit.source: Then when the Horn is blown with one blast
trans-unit.target: Potem ko rog je Pregorjeli z eno trobljenje

trans-unit.source: And the earth and the mountains are lifted and leveled with one blow -
trans-unit.target: In zemlja in gore so odpravili in zravnal z enim zamahom-

trans-unit.source: Then on that Day, the Resurrection will occur,
trans-unit.target: Nato na ta dan, vstajenje bo prišlo,

trans-unit.source: And the heaven will split [open], for that Day it is infirm.
trans-unit.target: In nebeško bo razdeljen [odprto], za ta dan je bolnih.

trans-unit.source: And the angels are at its edges. And there will bear the Throne of your Lord above them, that Day, eight [of them].
trans-unit.target: In angeli so pri njegovih robov. In tam bo nosil na prestol svojega gospodarja nad njimi, da dan, osem [so].

trans-unit.source: That Day, you will be exhibited [for judgement]; not hidden among you is anything concealed.
trans-unit.target: Ta dan, vam bodo razstavljeni [za sodbe]; niso skriti med vami je ničesar skriti.

trans-unit.source: So as for he who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, "Here, read my record!
trans-unit.target: Tako kot on, ki je dal njegov zapis v desno roko, bo rekel, "beri moj zapis!

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I was certain that I would be meeting my account."
trans-unit.target: Res, sem bil prepričan da bi se moj račun srečanje."

trans-unit.source: So he will be in a pleasant life -
trans-unit.target: Tako bo v prijetno življenje-

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: V povišani vrt,

trans-unit.source: Its [fruit] to be picked hanging near.
trans-unit.target: [Sadje] treba pobral visi v bližini.

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you put forth in the days past."
trans-unit.target: [Ti bo povedal], "Jej in pijačo v zadovoljstvo za kaj si dal tja v zadnjih dneh."

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, "Oh, I wish I had not been given my record
trans-unit.target: Ampak kot on, ki je dal njegov zapis v levo roko, bo rekel, "Oh, jaz želeti sem imel ne dan mojega zapisa

trans-unit.source: And had not known what is my account.
trans-unit.target: In ni vedela, kaj je moj račun.

trans-unit.source: I wish my death had been the decisive one.
trans-unit.target: Želim, da moje smrti je bil odločilen tisti.

trans-unit.source: My wealth has not availed me.
trans-unit.target: Svoje premoženje je ni koristil, mi.

trans-unit.source: Gone from me is my authority."
trans-unit.target: Odšla od mene je moj organ."

trans-unit.source: [Allah will say], "Seize him and shackle him.
trans-unit.target: [Rekel Allah], "izkoristite ga in mu shackle.

trans-unit.source: Then into Hellfire drive him.
trans-unit.target: Nato v Hellfire pogon mu.

trans-unit.source: Then into a chain whose length is seventy cubits insert him."
trans-unit.target: V verigi katerih dolžina je sedemdeset lakata vstavite njega."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he did not used to believe in Allah, the Most Great,
trans-unit.target: Dejansko, je nisem ne za vernik v Allah, večina velikih,

trans-unit.source: Nor did he encourage the feeding of the poor.
trans-unit.target: Prav tako je spodbujati, hranjenje revnih.

trans-unit.source: So there is not for him here this Day any devoted friend
trans-unit.target: Torej ni za njega tukaj to dan kateri koli posvečen prijatelj

trans-unit.source: Nor any food except from the discharge of wounds;
trans-unit.target: Niti koli živila razen odvajanja rane;

trans-unit.source: None will eat it except the sinners.
trans-unit.target: Nobeden hoteti trošiti to razen grešnike.

trans-unit.source: So I swear by what you see
trans-unit.target: Tako sem prisegajo kar vidite

trans-unit.source: And what you do not see
trans-unit.target: In kaj ne vidiš

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is the word of a noble Messenger.
trans-unit.target: [Da] res, Koranu je beseda plemenito Messenger.

trans-unit.source: And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.
trans-unit.target: In to ni beseda pesnik; malo verjamejo.

trans-unit.source: Nor the word of a soothsayer; little do you remember.
trans-unit.target: Niti besede Vedež; malo se spomnite.

trans-unit.source: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: [Je] razodetje od Gospoda svetov.

trans-unit.source: And if Muhammad had made up about Us some [false] sayings,
trans-unit.target: In če Muhammad, ki o nas nekaj [lažno] govora,

trans-unit.source: We would have seized him by the right hand;
trans-unit.target: Smo bi zasegli ga z desno roko;

trans-unit.source: Then We would have cut from him the aorta.
trans-unit.target: Potem bi jih odrežemo od njega aorto.

trans-unit.source: And there is no one of you who could prevent [Us] from him.
trans-unit.target: In nikogar ni, ki [nas] bi lahko preprečila od njega.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder for the righteous.
trans-unit.target: In res, Koranu je opomnik za pravednika.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.
trans-unit.target: In res, vemo, da je med vami so deniers.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it will be [a cause of] regret upon the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: In res, bo [vzrok] žal na je disbelievers.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, it is the truth of certainty.
trans-unit.target: In res, to je resnica varnosti.

trans-unit.source: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
trans-unit.target: Tako poveličujejo ime svojega Gospoda, najbolj super.

trans-unit.source: A supplicant asked for a punishment bound to happen
trans-unit.target: A prosilec prosil za kazen vezane zgodilo

trans-unit.source: To the disbelievers; of it there is no preventer.
trans-unit.target: Da disbelievers; to ni nobena Sprečilac.

trans-unit.source: [It is] from Allah, owner of the ways of ascent.
trans-unit.target: [Je] od Allah, lastnik načinov za vzpon.

trans-unit.source: The angels and the Spirit will ascend to Him during a Day the extent of which is fifty thousand years.
trans-unit.target: Angeli in duh vzpon nanj podnevi, katerega obseg je petdeset tisoč let.

trans-unit.source: So be patient with gracious patience.
trans-unit.target: Zato bodite potrpežljivi z milostiv potrpljenje.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they see it [as] distant,
trans-unit.target: Dejansko vidijo [kot] daleč,

trans-unit.source: But We see it [as] near.
trans-unit.target: Vendar vidimo, da [kot] v bližini.

trans-unit.source: On the Day the sky will be like murky oil,
trans-unit.target: Na dan nebo bo kot Taman olje,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will be like wool,
trans-unit.target: In gore bo kot volna,

trans-unit.source: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,
trans-unit.target: In ne prijatelj vpraša [nič] prijatelja,

trans-unit.source: They will be shown each other. The criminal will wish that he could be ransomed from the punishment of that Day by his children
trans-unit.target: Oni hoteti obstati razstava med seboj. Kazensko bodo želeli, da je lahko odkupnino, iz kazen ta dan njegovi otroci

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his brother
trans-unit.target: In njegova žena in njegov brat

trans-unit.source: And his nearest kindred who shelter him
trans-unit.target: In svoje najbližje sorodnike, ki mu zavetje

trans-unit.source: And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.
trans-unit.target: In kdor je na zemlji v celoti [tako], potem bi ga rešil.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, it is the Flame [of Hell],
trans-unit.target: ne! Res, da je plamen [Hell],

trans-unit.source: A remover of exteriors.
trans-unit.target: Odstranjevalec zunanjost.

trans-unit.source: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]
trans-unit.target: Vabi, kdo obrnil hrbet [resnico] in odšel [iz poslušnosti]

trans-unit.source: And collected [wealth] and hoarded.
trans-unit.target: In zbranih [bogastva] in hoarded.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, mankind was created anxious:
trans-unit.target: Res, je bila ustanovljena človeštvo tesnobe:

trans-unit.source: When evil touches him, impatient,
trans-unit.target: Ko zlo dotakne ga, nestrpni,

trans-unit.source: And when good touches him, withholding [of it],
trans-unit.target: In ko dobri dotakne ga, zadržanje [je],

trans-unit.source: Except the observers of prayer -
trans-unit.target: Razen opazovalca na molitev -

trans-unit.source: Those who are constant in their prayer
trans-unit.target: Tisti, ki so stalno v svoje molitve

trans-unit.source: And those within whose wealth is a known right
trans-unit.target: In tiste, v katerih bogastvo je znano prav

trans-unit.source: For the petitioner and the deprived -
trans-unit.target: Za vlagatelja in ogroženim-

trans-unit.source: And those who believe in the Day of Recompense
trans-unit.target: In tisti, ki verjamejo v dan nagraditi

trans-unit.source: And those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord -
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki so prestrašeni kazen gospodar-

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the punishment of their Lord is not that from which one is safe -
trans-unit.target: Res, kazen svojega Gospoda ni to iz katerega je varen-

trans-unit.source: And those who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: In kdor zaščita svojih zasebnih delih

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they are not to be blamed -
trans-unit.target: Razen od svoje žene ali tiste svoje prave roke imajo, dejansko, saj so ne da očitati-

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: Vendar kdor želi po tem, nato pa so kršiteljev-

trans-unit.source: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki so za svoje sklade in obljube pozoren

trans-unit.source: And those who are in their testimonies upright
trans-unit.target: In tiste, ki so v njihovih pričevanj pokonci

trans-unit.source: And those who [carefully] maintain their prayer:
trans-unit.target: In tistih, ki vzdržujejo [skrbno] njihova molitev:

trans-unit.source: They will be in gardens, honored.
trans-unit.target: Bodo v vrtovih, počaščen.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with those who disbelieve, hastening [from] before you, [O Muhammad],
trans-unit.target: Torej, kaj je [vprašanje] s tistim, ki verjamem, pospešijo [od] pred vami, [O Muhammad]

trans-unit.source: [To sit] on [your] right and [your] left in separate groups?
trans-unit.target: [Da bi sedel] na [vaše] in [vaše] desno v različnih skupinah?

trans-unit.source: Does every person among them aspire to enter a garden of pleasure?
trans-unit.target: Does vsakdo med njimi si prizadevajo vstopiti vrt užitka?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, We have created them from that which they know.
trans-unit.target: ne! Res, smo jih ustvarili od tiste, ki vedo.

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the Lord of [all] risings and settings that indeed We are able
trans-unit.target: Tako sem prisegajo gospodar [vse] risings in nastavitve, da smo res lahko

trans-unit.source: To replace them with better than them; and We are not to be outdone.
trans-unit.target: Jih nadomestiti z boljši od njih; in ne, da se outdone.

trans-unit.source: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised -
trans-unit.target: Tako pustimo, da pogovor zaman in zabavajo, dokler ne izpolnijo svoj dan, ki so obljubljene-

trans-unit.source: The Day they will emerge from the graves rapidly as if they were, toward an erected idol, hastening.
trans-unit.target: Dan se bo pojavljajo iz grobov, hitro, kot če bi bili, proti postavili idol, pospešijo.

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. That is the Day which they had been promised.
trans-unit.target: Oči poniža, poniževanje jih bo pokril. To je dan, ki so obljubili.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, smo poslali Noah svojemu ljudstvu, [pravijo,] "Opozori ljudi, preden tam prihaja z njimi boleče kaznovanje."

trans-unit.source: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,
trans-unit.target: Je dejal, "O moj ljudi, res sem vam jasno warner,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.
trans-unit.target: [Pravijo,] "čaščenje Allah, ga strah in me ubogajo.

trans-unit.source: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "
trans-unit.target: Alah bo vam svoje grehe odpusti in zamudo si za določeno obdobje. Res, čas [ki jih] Allah, ko gre, ne bo treba odložiti, če ste le vedel. " "

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.
trans-unit.target: On reče: "moj Gospod, res sem povabil moj ljudi [za resnico] noč in dan.

trans-unit.source: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.
trans-unit.target: Ampak moje povabilo, jih ne razen povečala med letom.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.
trans-unit.target: In res, vsakič, ko sem povabljen, da lahko odpusti jim, so dal svoj prst na roki v ušesih, ki sami s svojih oblačil, vztrajal, in so bili aroganten z [velik] arogance.

trans-unit.source: Then I invited them publicly.
trans-unit.target: Potem sem jih povabil javno.

trans-unit.source: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly
trans-unit.target: Nato sem napovedal, da jih in [tudi] zaupal jim skrivaj

trans-unit.source: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.
trans-unit.target: In rekel, "prosi odpuščanja svojega gospodarja. Res, on je vedno večni Forgiver.

trans-unit.source: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers
trans-unit.target: Bo poslal [dež] tuši nebo na vas v [nadaljevanje]

trans-unit.source: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.
trans-unit.target: In da povečanje bogastva in otroke in zagotoviti za vas vrtovi in zagotoviti za vas rek.

trans-unit.source: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur
trans-unit.target: [Vprašanje] kaj je z vami, ki ne pripisujejo Allah [zaradi] veličino

trans-unit.source: While He has created you in stages?
trans-unit.target: Medtem, ko vas je ustvaril v fazah?

trans-unit.source: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers
trans-unit.target: Ne menite, kako je Allah ustvaril sedem nebes v plasti

trans-unit.source: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?
trans-unit.target: In luna v njej [odraža] svetlobo in sonce gori svetilka?

trans-unit.source: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.
trans-unit.target: In Alah je povzročila, da rastejo iz zemlje [postopno] rast.

trans-unit.source: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.
trans-unit.target: Potem bo vrnete v to in ste citat [drugo] ekstrakcijo.

trans-unit.source: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse
trans-unit.target: In Alah je narejena zate zemlje prostranstva

trans-unit.source: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "
trans-unit.target: Da lahko sledite tam ceste prehoda. " "

trans-unit.source: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.
trans-unit.target: Noah je rekel, "moj Gospod, res so poslušao me in mu je sledil, katerih premoženje in otrok ne bo povečala mu razen v izgubo.

trans-unit.source: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.
trans-unit.target: In jih zaroto neverjetno ploskve.

trans-unit.source: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.
trans-unit.target: In rekel: "nikoli ne pustite vaš bogov in nikoli ne pusti Wadd ali Suwa" ali Yaghuth in Ya'uq in Nasr.

trans-unit.source: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."
trans-unit.target: In že so zavedeni veliko. In [gospod], ne povečujejo wrongdoers razen v napake. "

trans-unit.source: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.
trans-unit.target: Zaradi svoje grehe so utonil in dal v ogenj, in so ugotovili, ne zase, poleg Allah [vse] pomočnice.

trans-unit.source: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.
trans-unit.target: In Noah je rekel: »moj Gospod, ne puščajte na zemlji med je disbelievers prebivalec.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.
trans-unit.target: Res, če jih pustite, bodo zavajale vaš Sluge in ne porodi razen [vsakega] zloga in [potrjenih] Nevjernik.

trans-unit.source: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
trans-unit.target: Moj Gospodar, odpusti mi, in moji starši in kdor vstopi v mojo hišo vernik in prepričanje moških in prepričanje žensk. In ne povečujejo wrongdoers razen v uničenje."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: Recimo, [O Muhammad], "to je pokazala mi, da skupina v jinn poslušal in je dejal," dejansko slišali smo neverjetno Koran.

trans-unit.source: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.
trans-unit.target: To vodi v pravo smer, in smo verjeli v to. In nikoli ne povežemo z našega Gospoda kdorkoli.

trans-unit.source: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son
trans-unit.target: In [uči] je ki vzvišeno plemenitost našega Gospoda; On ni sprejela ženo in sina

trans-unit.source: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.
trans-unit.target: In da je bilo naše neumno eno rekel o Allah pretirano greh.

trans-unit.source: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.
trans-unit.target: In smo mislili, da človeštvo in je jinn bi nikoli ne govori o Allah laž.

trans-unit.source: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.
trans-unit.target: In tam so moški iz človeštva, ki so se zatekli v moški iz jinn, zato so jih [samo] povečati v breme.

trans-unit.source: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].
trans-unit.target: In je mislil, kot ste mislili, da Allah bi nikoli ne pošiljajte nikomur [kot sel].

trans-unit.source: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
trans-unit.target: In smo iskali [do] neba pa ugotovila, da napolni z močno varovala in kurjenje ognja.

trans-unit.source: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.
trans-unit.target: In sva se v njem sedi na položajih za zaslišanje, vendar Kdor posluša zdaj našli na gori plamen ki leži v počakajte za njega.

trans-unit.source: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.
trans-unit.target: In ne vem [zato] zlo je namenjena za tiste na zemlji ali ali svojega Gospoda nameravati zakaj jim pravo pot.

trans-unit.source: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.
trans-unit.target: Med nami so pravični in med nami niso [drugi] tako; smo bili [o] razdeljena načine.

trans-unit.source: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.
trans-unit.target: In smo postali nekaterih, da mi bo nikoli ne povzroči okvare v Allah po zemlji, niti mu lahko pobegniti z let.

trans-unit.source: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.
trans-unit.target: In ko smo slišali vodstvom, smo verjeli v to. In Kdor verjame v njegov gospod ne bojim odvzem ali breme.

trans-unit.source: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.
trans-unit.target: Med nami so muslimani [v predložitev Allah], in med nami so nepravično. In kdor je postal musliman - tiste poiskala na pravi poti.

trans-unit.source: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'
trans-unit.target: Pa za nepravično, bodo, za vraga, drva. "

trans-unit.source: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
trans-unit.target: In [pokazala Allah] da če so ostali naravnost na poti, mi bi jih dali obilno določba

trans-unit.source: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.
trans-unit.target: Tako smo lahko testirali v njej. In kdor odvrne od spomina je njegov gospodar bo v napornih kazen.

trans-unit.source: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
trans-unit.target: In [je pokazala], ki je masjids, so za Allah, tako ne uveljavlja s Allah kdorkoli.

trans-unit.source: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."
trans-unit.target: In da ko služabnik Allah vstal supplicating mu, skoraj postal o njem stisnjeno maso. «

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
trans-unit.target: Recimo, [O Muhammad], "Le jaz sklicevala na moj gospodar in ne povezujejo z njim kdo."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "dejansko imeti za vas [moči] škoduje ali desno smer."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
trans-unit.target: Rekel, "res, tam bo nikoli me zaščiti od Allah kdorkoli [če bi kršijo], niti sem našli v razen njega zatočišče.

trans-unit.source: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.
trans-unit.target: [Imam za vas], vendar samo obvestilo od Alaha in njegovega sporočila. « In kdor ne poslušaj Allah in njegov sel - potem res, zanj je ogenj pekla; se bo upošteval v njem večno.

trans-unit.source: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.
trans-unit.target: [Naprej na disbelievers] do, ko vidijo tisto, kar so obljubili, potem bodo vedeli kdo je šibkejši v pomočnice in manj v številko.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
trans-unit.target: Reči, "ne vem, če kar si obljubil je blizu ali če moj gospodar odobri za to [] dalj."

trans-unit.source: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
trans-unit.target: [Je] Poznavalec nevidno, in je razkrila svoje [znanje je] nevidno vsakomur

trans-unit.source: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
trans-unit.target: Razen katere je odobril glasniki, in res, je poslal pred vsako sel in za njim opazovalci

trans-unit.source: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.
trans-unit.target: Da bi lahko vedel, da jih prenaša sporočila svojega Gospoda; in on se je vključil, kar je z njimi in je našteti vse stvari v številko.

trans-unit.source: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki sam obloge [v oblačila],

trans-unit.source: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -
trans-unit.target: Pojavijo [moliti] noč, razen malo -

trans-unit.source: Half of it - or subtract from it a little
trans-unit.target: -Polovico ali odštejemo od njega malo

trans-unit.source: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.
trans-unit.target: Ali dodamo in recitirati Korana z izmerjeno recitacijo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.
trans-unit.target: Dejansko smo oddanih na vas težke besede.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.
trans-unit.target: Dejansko, urah noči so učinkovitejše za soglasje [srce in jezik] in bolj primerna za besede.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.
trans-unit.target: Res, zate s dan je daljši poklic.

trans-unit.source: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.
trans-unit.target: In ne pozabite na ime svojega gospodarja in namenijo sami k njemu z [popolna] predanost.

trans-unit.source: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.
trans-unit.target: [Je] Gospodar na vzhodu in zahodu; ni nobene božanstva, razen njega, tako da mu kot odstranjevalec [vaše] zadeve.

trans-unit.source: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.
trans-unit.target: In bodite potrpežljivi, kaj reči in se jim izogne z milostiv izogibanje.

trans-unit.source: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.
trans-unit.target: In Me pustil z [vprašanje] deniers, tiste, ki lažje [v življenju], in jim omogoči predaha malo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire
trans-unit.target: Res, pri nas [zanje] so obešala in ogenj

trans-unit.source: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -
trans-unit.target: In hrane, ki duši in boleče kazen-

trans-unit.source: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.
trans-unit.target: Dan bo Potresti zemlja in gore in gore bo kup peska, lije navzdol.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
trans-unit.target: Dejansko smo poslal vam sel kot priča na vas tako, kot smo poslali Pharaoh messenger.

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.
trans-unit.target: Vendar Faraon poslušao sel, zato smo mu zaseženo porušen zaseg.

trans-unit.source: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?
trans-unit.target: Torej kako lahko vas je strah, če vam verjamem, dan, ki bo otroke belo - las?

trans-unit.source: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.
trans-unit.target: V nebesih bo razpade Kdaj je izpolnil svojo obljubo.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.
trans-unit.target: Pravzaprav, to je opomnik, tako da kdor hoče lahko svojemu gospodar način.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: Res, vaš Gospod ve, [O Muhammad], da stojiš [v molitvi], skoraj dve tretjini noč ali polovica ali tretjina je, in [to] skupino tistih z vami. Ter Allah določa [obseg] noč in dan. On je znano, da [muslimani] ne bo sposoben narediti to in se je obrnila na vas v odpuščanje, tako recitiranjem, kar je preprosto [] o Koranu. On je znano, da bo med vami tiste, ki so slabo in drugi potujejo po na zemljišča iskanje [nekaj] Bounty Allah in drugi boj za vzrok Allah. Tako recitiranjem, kar je enostavno iz nje in vzpostaviti molitev in zakah in posojila Allah lep posojilo. In ne glede na dobro si dal foward zase - boste našli z Allah. Je boljše in večje plačilo. In iščejo odpuščanje Allah. Res, Allah je tolerantna in usmiljen.

trans-unit.source: O you who covers himself [with a garment],
trans-unit.target: O vi, ki zajema sam [z oblačilo],

trans-unit.source: Arise and warn
trans-unit.target: Nastanejo in opozarjajo

trans-unit.source: And your Lord glorify
trans-unit.target: In slavi svojega Gospoda

trans-unit.source: And your clothing purify
trans-unit.target: In oblačila naj

trans-unit.source: And uncleanliness avoid
trans-unit.target: In se izognili nečistoče

trans-unit.source: And do not confer favor to acquire more
trans-unit.target: Ne daje korist pridobiti več

trans-unit.source: But for your Lord be patient.
trans-unit.target: Vendar bodite potrpežljivi, za svojega Gospoda.

trans-unit.source: And when the trumpet is blown,
trans-unit.target: In ko je prepihani trobento,

trans-unit.source: That Day will be a difficult day
trans-unit.target: Ta dan bo težko dan

trans-unit.source: For the disbelievers - not easy.
trans-unit.target: Za disbelievers - ni enostavno.

trans-unit.source: Leave Me with the one I created alone
trans-unit.target: Me pustil z eno, ki sem ustvaril sam

trans-unit.source: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
